column12: PROCESO PARA LA OBTENCION DE ESPUMADOS PARA USO AGRICOLA
column13: PRPORSIONAR UN PROCESO PARA LA OBTENCION DE ESPU- MADOS PARA EL USO AGRICOLA , EL CUAL SE REALIZA A UN TIEMPO RELATIVAMENTE CORTO, MEDIANTE MEZCLA- DO DE LOS COMPONENTES PREVIAMENTE DOSIFICADOS, MOLDEO, DESGASIFICACION Y CORTE. EL PRODUCTO ASI OBTENIDO CONSISTE EN UN ESQUEMA DE CELDAS SEMIABI- ERTAS, RIGIDAS Y UNIFORMES CUYAS CARACTERISTICAS GARANTIZAN UNA MAYOR ABSORSION Y RETENCION DE AGUA A LA VEZ QUE HACEN QUE SEA UN METRIAL SONORO, AISLANTE Y ALTAMENTE RESISTENTE AL CALOR.
column15: TRUJILLO ANGEL JORGE ANGEL

column12: System for transforming energy from ocean waves into electrical energy
column13: System for transforming energy from ocean waves into electrical energy.The system is designed to utilise the movement of ocean waves and transforming it into a rotation movement capable of moving a generator that produces electrical energy. Said system can be mounted in any appropriate location in a coastal area; it is comprised of a support structure (1) on which a mast (3) is placed whose lower end is next to a buoy (2), that is partially submerged over the sea water, so that the movements of the waves are transmitted through the buoy (2) to the mast (3) moving the latter in an ascending/descending direction; its movements are transmitted to traction wheels (7) that, with a mechanism or gear box, transmit to an inertia wheel (15) and from the latter to a generator (19) or other device that it is designed to activate.<IMAGE>
column15: JORGE ALBERTO ANGEL

column12: FRAME FOR PICKING UP BALLS AND OTHER SPORTS ARTICLES, WITH SUPPORT FOR GRAPHICS
column13: The subject of this invention is a frame for picking up balls and other sports articles, with support for graphics, which is configured by tubular (1), straight or curved elements of various lengths, which may optionally be telescopic and padded and which are fitted together in a horizontal, vertical and oblique arrangement in order to form a framework with two lateral support zones, and the front, rear, base and side parts thereof may be defined solely by the tubular segments (1), delimiting zones or spaces (2) and (3) that are empty or coupled to flexible or rigid laminar plates suitable for graphics. The sides, of regular or irregular geometrical shapes, have anchoring points for a variety of longitudinal supports (5) for sports equipment formed, without distinction, by two parallel bars in the manner of a guide or by a combination of linear portions and structures (6) for supporting objects. The sides may be hinged and incorporate wheels. The frame may incorporate a possibly compartmentalized additional container and an upper cover or plate.
column15: CALZON ANGEL JORGE

column12: FUNDA PARA HERNIA
column15: SCHLESINGER JORGE ANGEL

column12: SISTEMA DE TRANSFORMACION DE LA ENERGIA DE LAS OLAS DEL MAR EN ENERGIA ELECTRICA.
column13: Sistema de transformación de la energía de las olas del mar en energía eléctrica. El sistema está concebido para el aprovechamiento del movimiento de las olas del mar y transformarlo en un movimiento de giro capaz de mover un generador que produzca energía eléctrica. Dicho sistema es susceptible de montarse en cualquier lugar adecuado de una zona costera; constituyéndose a partir de una estructura soporte (1) sobre la que va situado un mástil (3) solidarizado por su extremo inferior a una boya (2) semisumergida sobre el agua del mar, de manera que los movimientos del oleaje se transmiten a través de la boya (2) al mástil (3) desplazando a éste en sentido ascendente/descendente, transmitiéndose sus movimientos a unas ruedas de tracción (7) que, mediante un mecanismo o caja de engranajes se transmite a un volante de inercia (15) y de éste a un generador (19) u otro dispositivo que se pretenda accionar.
column15: JORGE ALBERTO ANGEL

column12: PROCESO DE RECICLADO DE MATERIALES PLASTICOS
column13: El mismo consiste en separar residuos plásticos con alto contenido de estireno y los de bajo contenido de estireno, fraccionarlos lavados previamente serán sometidos a su disolución total por un conjunto de solventes que mezclados entre sí en pasos sucesivos darán como resultado una resina transparente en el caso de los plásticos con alto contenido de estireno y otro de color blanco o de color según sea el color del plástico elegido, los solventes se componen en estos casos por nafta común, metacrilato y monómero de estireno.
column15: CARRERAS ANGEL JORGE

column12: BASTIDOR PARA LA RECOGIDA DE BALONES Y OTROS ARTICULOS DEPORTIVOS CON SOPORTE PARA GRAFISMOS
column13: El objeto de esta invención es un bastidor para la recogida de balones y otros artículos deportivos con soporte para grafismos, configurado por elementos tubulares (1), rectos o curvados y de longitudes diversas, optativamente telescópicos y acolchados, ajustados entre sí en disposición horizontal, vertical y oblicua para conformar un armazón con dos zonas laterales de apoyo, y cuya parte anterior, posterior, base y laterales pueden quedar únicamente definidos por los segmentos tubulares (1), delimitando zonas o espacios (2) y (3) vacíos o bien acoplados a placas laminares, flexibles o rígidas, aptas para grafismos. Los laterales, de formas geométricas regulares o irregulares, tienen puntos de anclaje para varios soportes longitudinales (5) para material deportivo, conformado indistintamente por dos barras paralelas a modo de guía o por una combinación de tramos lineales y estructuras (6) para soportar objetos. Los laterales pueden ser abisagrados e incorporar ruedas. El bastidor puede incorporar un contenedor anexo que puede ser compartimentado y una placa o tapa superior.
column15: CALZON ANGEL JORGE

column12: PORTABLE PALM AND WRIST REST FOR COMPUTER
column13: The invention relates to the production of a portable palm and wrist rest for a computer, which may be used for both hands, which belongs to the sector of products designed to protect the user from the discomfort and consequences deriving from continuous use of a computer. It is composed of a securing band that has the special feature of supporting a pad of anatomical shape, which rapidly moulds to the palm of the hand and the wrist and has, as its function, the protection of the palm of the hand and the wrist from pain, swelling, discomfort and cumulative lesions that are all generated through continued use of a computer (mouse and keyboard). Lastly, the portable palm and wrist rest has a lightweight, functional and economical attractive appearance that does not present any inconvenience and may be used by all workers who interact with a machine or with a computer for an extended time period, where a keyboard and a mouse are the components concerned.
column14: ARROYAVE CASTRILLON CARLOS ALB;;MALPARTIDA CHAUPIN VIOLETA TRI;;ABREGU LARA ANGEL JORGE
column15: ABREGU LARA ANGEL JORGE

column12: REPOSA PALMAS Y SOPORTE DE MUNECA
column13: SE REFIERE A UN REPOSAPALMAS Y MUNECAS PORTATIL PARA UN ORDENADOR, QUE PUEDE UTILIZARSE EN AMBAS MANOS, QUE COMPRENDE: UNA BANDA QUE ES UN SUJETADOR DESGLOSABLE DE FORMA LONGITUDINAL, QUE LA MANO Y MUNECA; DICHA ALMOHADILLA SE UBICA EN UNA ABERTURA DEL SUJETADOR, Y QUE ES CUBIERTA EN SU PARTE INTERNA Y EXTERNA POR UNA CAPA DE TELA ALYCRADA QUE SIRVE COMO FORRO INTERIRO,. ADEMAS EN DICHO REPOSAPALMAS Y MUNECAS SE HA IMPLEMENTADO UN DOBLE CIERE VELCRO, UN PRIMER CIERRE PARA SUJETADOR Y UN SEGUNDO CIERRE EN LA MUNECA. ADEMAS SE REMATAN LOS BORDES DEL SUJETADOR CON RIBETES DE CINTA ELASTICA SUAVE Y DELGADA DISTRIBUIDOS EN TODO SU CONTORNO AMOLDANDO EL SUJETADOR YA LA ALMOHADILLA A LA MANO

column12: LIQUID SEALER COMPOSITION BASED ON ANTICORROSIVE WATERPROOF LIQUID POLYMER.
column13: The present invention is related to the production of an insulating impermeable sealer based on waterproof rubber The main advantage of the invention is that it may be applied onto diverse surfaces and materials without reducing the capacity thereof to comply with its main anchoring and sealing functions, thus extending the useful life of objects since it has a suitable elasticity and resistance. The inventive sealer technically consists in an impermeable elastic membrane characterized in that it is plastic elastomers-free, the sealer does not need external factors to be used and is manually cold applied.
column15: LAGUNES JORGE MIGUEL ANGEL CASTILLO

column12: LIQUID, ANTICORROSIVE, ANTIOXIDANT AND WATER RESISTANT COMPOSITION BASED ON SEALING RUBBER.
column13: The present invention is a liquid, anticorrosive, antioxidant and water resistant composition based on sealing rubber, which avoids oxidation since the application of liquid rubber on any surface or material may encapsulate and sequester the oxygen and the humidity; thus the oxide being trapped and the degenerative process automatically stopped in the external portion of the applied surface, the properties of the rubber prevent water, saline humidity, acids and alkalis from penetrating the protected part, these properties being elasticity, resistance to low and high temperatures, resistance to UV beams, ozone, water and salinity, the composition supporting temperature changes up to 1800°C with an elongation of 400%, which in case the surface, where the material is applied, is expanded or contracted due to weather changes and/or manufacturing processes, this will always return to its original state without losing its properties, the material will not be detached from the applied surfac e.
column15: LAGUNES JORGE MIGUEL ANGEL CASTILLO

column12: BELT TRACKING
column13: A belt-tracking apparatus for a printing device has a steering roller, a guiding roller and a continous belt encompassing them. A belt-steering mechanism is arranged to counteract a lateral belt movement by adjusting the distance between one end of the steering roller and. the corresponding end of the guiding roller by means of an actuator. The actuator is movably mounted on a base structure and arranged to rotate a threaded control rod having two differentially pitched threaded sections. The first and second sections cooperate with corresponding threads of a base structure and of said end of the steering roller, respectively, so that a rotation of the control rod shifts said end of the steering roller relative to the corresponding end of the guiding roller, and the actuator relative to the base structure.
column15: MENENDEZ JORGE;;FERRER MIGUEL ANGEL

column12: Overlap mechanism for the exterior rear-view mirrors of motor vehicles
column13: An actuated toothed wheel serves as an axis of rotation for a mirror support structure in relation to a support frame fixed to a vehicle. The wheel's tooth has a position fixing element for engaging the tooth to frame, and a position fixing element which together with an end stop, limits the rotation of the structure around the tooth in preset direction. The end stop is loaded by an integrally formed elastic element.
column15: ANGEL ERRANDO SMET JORGE MIGUE

column12: INSULATING IMPERMEABLE SEALER BASED ON WATERPROOF RUBBER.
column13: The present invention is related to the production of an insulating impermeable sealer based on waterproof rubber. The main advantage of the invention is that it may be applied onto diverse surfaces and materials without reducing the capacity thereof to comply with its main anchoring and sealing functions, thus extending the useful life of objects since it has a suitable elasticity and resistance. The inventive sealer technically consists in an impermeable elastic membrane characterized in that it is plastic elastomers-free, the sealer does not need external factors to be used and is manually cold applied.

column12: Self-extinguishing and fire-insulating upholstery material
column13: The composite material, for use on seats of aircraft or other forms of transport, is composed of 3 fabrics, two of which form the obverse or outside face in use, while the third appears only on the back and constitutes the anti-fire barrier. Each of the fabrics has a min. density of threads per cm. of yarns from suitable raw materials. They are combined during the weaving process by use of special bonds. The two fabrics forming the front only carbonise by the action of fire, without flame or melting or loss of weight. The materials in the fabric forming the anti-fire barrier, do not produce flame by fire action, nor is the fabric structure destroyed.
column15: HERNENDEZ SERRADILLA ANGEL;;GORINA BAYES JORGE

column12: Perfeccionamientos en discos para lustrar y bruñirsuperficies pintadas
column13: El presente modelo de utilidad se refiere a perfeccionamientos en discos para lustrar y brunir superficies pintadas. Son conocidos discos con panospegados o trabados a una cara del disco mediante aletas o lo similar, pero que en la práctica rayanla superficie si son aplicadas de costado. Para solucionareste problema el presente modelo de utilidad propone un disco formado por un par de platos circulares superpuestos y espaciados entre sí que delimiten unespacio de alojamiento y retenciónde una porción marginal del pano, que recubre la cara del plato superior, y que se extiende más allá de dicho platopara quedar doblada abrazando el borde perimetral del plato superior y circundando perimetralmente el borde correspondiente del plato inferior paraformar un recubrimiento protector de los bordes de ambos platos, presentando el plato inferior, en su cara puesta a la de fijación del pano, una pluralidad depaletas removedoras del aire circundante, y orientadoras de esteúltimo hacia la superficie pintada para enfriamiento de la misma, estando ambos platosprovistos de respectivos manguitos, telescópicamente acoplables, con medios de entrabe mutuo, para la fijación simultánea de dichos platos en formasuperpuesta y de la porción marginal del pano entre los mismos.
column15: RAPAGNANI HORACIO ANGEL;;CASTELLANI JORGE JOSE

column12: Vehicle safety system and method of use
column13: A method to notify a third party if a child is left behind in a vehicle includes securing a motion detector system within a vehicle, the motion detector being secured to a roof of an inner cabin of the vehicle and directed to a rear seat; detecting via the motion detector if a child is left behind in the rear seat after the vehicle is locked and after a driver exits; if the child is left behind, activating an air conditioner via a computer system operably associated with the motion detector; after activating the air conditioner, detecting if the driver has returned to the vehicle; if the driver has not returned, activating a car alarm via the computer system; after activating the car alarm for a predetermined time, determining if the driver has returned; and if the driver has not returned, notifying a third party via a transceiver operably associated with computer system.
column15: GARCIA MIGUEL ANGEL;;H JORGE AYALA

column12: DISPOSITIVO PARA ELEVAR LA TEMPERATURA DEL LÍQUIDO PARA LIMPIAR PARABRISAS Y LUNETAS EN VEHÍCULOS
column13: Un dispositivo que posea una resistencia que se adapte o sea parte constitutiva del circuito de agua del lavaparabrisas y luneta de los automóviles, constituyéndose en la tapa del reservorio o en el mismo reservorio, o en su defecto en el conducto que lleva el agua al parabrisas o luneta, y en donde esta resistencia actúe con los componentes respectivos útiles para controlar la acción con el agua respecto de la temperatura que esta obtendrá. Destinada a cumplimentar el equipamiento del vehículo en lo que respecta al sistema de limpieza del parabrisas, lunetas y ocasionalmente faros. De este modo el agua se encuentra a una temperatura determinada y controlada, y que al momento de accionar el dispositivo, lo haga con una temperatura determinada en un rango de 40ºC a 70ºC con el fin de facilitar la limpieza de grasas, barros, agua escarchada, etc.; así el dispositivo genera un aumento de temperatura en el agua a utilizar pero que a la vez pueda controlar la misma en un rango de temperatura, logrando que el tiempo de lavado se reduzca notablemente generando a su vez un importante ahorro de la cantidad de agua a utilizar, contribuyendo con el cuidado del medio ambiente. Un ejemplo sería a partir de una resistencia junto con un termostato, incorporados a un conducto metálico que es parte constitutiva del conducto que expulsa el líquido del reservorio hacia el pico aplicador se controlan actuando al mismo tiempo conectados por intermedio de un relé y por el mismo pulsador que activa a la bomba de expulsión del líquido del reservorio, por lo que el conducto metálico a la vez que aloja al termostato, y a la resistencia, debe tener en su material constitutivo que es el metal, la capacidad de transmitir la temperatura que entrega la resistencia conectada, en la medida que pasa el agua por el conducto metálico.
column15: ANDRICH JORGE MARIO;;ANDRICH MIGUEL ANGEL

column12: MOTORCYCLIST PROTECTION SYSTEM
column13: The invention relates to a motorcyclist protection system, of the type of those formed by a continuous lower rail (5) closing the space under an upper rail (3), fixed, through spacers (2), to posts (1) of anchorage to the ground. According to this system, the continuous lower rail (5) is assembled through post arms (6) and/or intermediate arms (7) each post arm (6) is formed by a single part made of sheet metal with a stepped profile having an upper expansion or pin through which each post arm (6) is directly fixed to the corresponding post (1), without having to loosen or tighten any part of the already installed barrier.
column15: ANTON SANZ JORGE;;VINUESA HERNANDEZ ANGEL;;RUIZ ORCAJO JORGE TEODORO

column12: MOTORCYCLIST PROTECTION SYSTEM
column13: The invention relates to a system for protecting motorcyclists, consisting of a continuous lower barrier that closes off the space beneath an upper barrier that is attached to ground-anchoring posts (1) by means of spacers (2). According to said system, the continuous lower barrier is installed using post arms (6) and/or intermediate arms (7), each post arm (6) comprising a single sheet metal part with a stepped profile having an upper tab or expansion, by means of which each post arm (6) is attached directly to the corresponding post (1) without any parts of the installed barrier having to be disengaged or adjusted.

column12: ELECTRICITY SUPPLY SYSTEM FOR VEHICLES
column13: The invention relates to an electrical supply system for vehicles, which has a connector device that includes an electronic board provided with a data microprocessor; a plurality of connector plugs arranged in parallel and connected to one another to couple to a plurality of removable rechargeable batteries; a connection to the electronic board provided with a continuous current BUS to couple to the electrical system of the engine of the corresponding vehicle; and a discriminator such that the electronic board is able to identify the electrical supply from any of the plurality of removable batteries, such that when the rechargeable batteries are discharged or low they can be recharged from an external electricity source such as the general electricity grid.

column12: COMPOSITION FOR CORRECTING MALNUTRITION AND DECREASING OBESITY IN CHILDREN.
column13: The present invention discloses a composition that provides quality nutrition, and contributes to decrease overweight and obesity. The composition provides approximately 25% of a daily energy requirement, mostly from slow-release carbohydrates, therefore having a low glycemic index, also providing high biological value proteins, lipids with a high proportion of polyunsaturated fatty acids (90%) and vitamins and minerals required to correct their deficiency. The composition further contributes to eliminate anemia, enhances child development, prevents excessive accumulation of body fat and decreases the risk of obesity and chronic diseases. The composition may be used in School Lunch Programs aimed at improving nutrition and reducing obesity.
column15: VAZQUEZ MIGUEL ANGEL DUARTE;;ROSADO JORGE L

column12: composições e métodos para tratar diabetes do tipo ii e distúrbios relacionados
column13: composições e métodos para tratar diabetes do tipo ii e distúrbios relacionados. a presente invenção refere-se a métodos e composições para tratar diabetes do tipo ii. esta invenção revela uma formulação farmacêutica oralmente administrável, como terapia conveniente para reduzir os níveis de glicose no sangue, impedir o desenvolvimento de diabetes e uma exaustão precose do pâncreas. em certas modalidades, a invenção fornece combinação das formulações farmacêuticass oralmente administráveis, compreendendo pelo menos um sensibilizador de insulina (por exemplo, uma glitazona tal como pioglitazona ou rosiglitazona), pelo menos uma sulfonilureia (por exemplo, glimepirida), e pelo menos uma biguanida (por exemplo, metformina ou um sal ou éster farmaceuticamente aceitável da mesma, tal como hci de metformina). a presente invenção também fornece métodos de tratar diabetes do tipo ii e distúrbios relacionados em um mamífero, adequadamente um humano, administrando a um mamífero em necessidade do mesmo uma ou mais das composições da presente invenção.
column15: ROSADO JORGE LUIS;;DUARTE-VAZQUEZ MIGUEL ANGEL

column12: CHILD SAFETY SEAT ANCHOR ASSEMBLY
column13: The problem of a front seat occupant moving the front seatback so far so as to interfere with the proper positioning of a rear-facing child safety seat or to touch a child's legs while sitting in a front-facing child safety seat is solved by transforming the lower anchor into a segment of an electrical circuit with a normally open switch that is forced to the closed position when a child safety seat attachment system has attached to the lower anchor and the vehicle prevents the front seat from moving beyond a present distance toward the rear seat. The closing of the electrical circuit can be used to supply an input signal to a controller in the vehicle programmed to notify the operator that a child safety seat has been attached to prevent the front seat from moving beyond a fixed distance from the rear seat.
column15: MIRANDA NIETO JORGE ADOLFO;;ERALES MIGUEL ANGEL

column12: Verankerungsbaugruppe für Kindersicherheitssitz
column13: Das Problem eines Vordersitzbenutzers, der die Vordersitzlehne so weit bewegt, dass er die korrekte Positionierung eines rückwärts gerichteten Kindersicherheitssitzes stört oder die Beine eines Kindes berührt, während es in einem vorwärts gerichteten Kindersicherheitssitz sitzt, wird gelöst, indem die untere Verankerung in ein Segment einer elektrischen Schaltung mit einem normalerweise geöffneten Schalter umgewandelt wird, der in die geschlossen Position gezwungen wird, wenn ein Kindersicherheitssitz-Befestigungssystem an der unteren Verankerung befestigt wurde, und das Fahrzeug den Vordersitz daran hindert, sich über einen vorliegenden Abstand hinaus in Richtung Rücksitz zu bewegen. Das Schließen der elektrischen Schaltung kann genutzt werden, um ein Eingangssignal für eine Steuerung im Fahrzeug bereitzustellen, das programmiert ist, um den Benutzer darüber zu benachrichtigen, dass ein Kindersicherheitssitz befestigt wurde, um den Vordersitz daran zu hindern, sich über einen festgelegten Abstand vom Rücksitz hinaus zu bewegen.
column15: MIRANDA NIETO JORGE ADOLFO;;ERALES MIGUEL ANGEL

column12: ELECTRICITY SUPPLY SYSTEM FOR VEHICLES
column13: The invention relates to an electricity supply system for vehicles, which has a connector device that includes an electronic board provided with a data microprocessor; a plurality of connector plugs arranged in parallel and connected to one another to couple to a plurality of removable rechargeable batteries; a connection to the electronic board provided with a continuous current BUS to couple to the electrical system of the engine of the corresponding vehicle; and a discriminator such that the electronic board is able to identify the electrical supply from any of the plurality of removable batteries, such that when the rechargeable batteries are discharged or low they can be recharged from an external electricity source such as the general electricity grid.
column15: VENTURA FORES JORGE;;TOBIAS LOPEZ JOSE ANGEL

column12: Child safety seat anchor assembly
column13: The problem of a front seat occupant moving the front seatback so far so as to interfere with the proper positioning of a rear-facing child safety seat or to touch a child's legs while sitting in a front-facing child safety seat is solved by transforming the lower anchor into a segment of an electrical circuit with a normally open switch that is forced to the closed position when a child safety seat attachment system has attached to the lower anchor and the vehicle prevents the front seat from moving beyond a present distance toward the rear seat. The closing of the electrical circuit can be used to supply an input signal to a controller in the vehicle programmed to notify the operator that a child safety seat has been attached to prevent the front seat from moving beyond a fixed distance from the rear seat.
column15: MIRANDA NIETO JORGE ADOLFO;;ERALES MIGUEL ANGEL

column12: SISTEMA DE EVALUACION DE LA CONMUTACION DE MAQUINAS DE CORRIENTE CONTINUA.
column13: SISTEMA DE EVALUACION DE LA CONMUTACION DE LAS MAQUINAS DE CORRIENTE CONTINUA; EMPLEA PARA LA DETECCION DE LAS CHISPAS UNA ANTENA (1) ESPECIAL SITUADA EN EL EXTERIOR DE LAS MAQUINAS QUE CAPTA LA RADIACION ELECTROMAGNETICA ORIGINADA POR LAS CHISPAS. LA SEÑAL DE LA ANTENA, PULSOS DE ALTA FRECUENCIA AMORTIGUADOS, SE AMPLIFICA EN EL AMPLIFICADOR (2) CUYA SALIDA VA A UN COMPARADOR (3) QUE SELECCIONA LOS PULSOS MAYORES DE UN NIVEL (AJUSTABLE) Y LOS CONFORMA DANDO EN SU SALIDA PULSOS BINARIOS; ESTOS SE LLEVAN A UN CONTADOR (4) CUYA SALIDA NUMERICA EN EL INDICADOR (5) INDICA EL NIVEL DE CHISPEO SEGUN UN CODIGO ADECUADO (P.E. 0 - SIN CHISPAS; 100 - MAXIMO ADMISIBLE EN SERVICIO). LAS CHISPAS PRODUCEN UN FUERTE DESGASTE EN LAS MAQUINAS (COLECTOR Y ESCOBILLA) Y PUEDEN ORIGINAR AVERIAS GRAVES (ARCO O "FLASH") ENTRE ESCOBILLAS. EL INVENTO, APLICADO A LOS MOTORES DE TRACCION O A LAS EXCITATRICES DE LOS GRUPOS HIDROELECTRICOS AUMENTARA LA FIABILIDAD DE ESAS MAQUINAS, DISMINUYENDO LOS COSTES DE MANTENIMIENTO Y PERMITIENDO REALIZAR UN VERDADERO MANTENIMIENTO PREDICTIVO.
column15: ALONSO RODRIGUEZ ANGEL MATIAS;;ALONSO PASCUAL ANGEL MATIAS;;MORENO MOHINO JORGE

column12: System of assessing the commutation of direct current machines.
column13: System of assessing the commutation of direct current machines, uses a special Aerial 1 located outside the machine for detecting sparks, which picks up the electromagnetic radiation caused by the sparks. The aerial signal, damped high-frequency pulses, is amplified in the Amplifier 2 whose output goes to a Comparator 3, which selects the pulses greater than a particular level (adjustable) and forms them giving binary pulses at its output, these are conveyed to a Counter 4 whose numeric output in the Indicator 5 shows the level of sparking according to a suitable code (e.g. 0 - no sparks 100 - maximum acceptable in service). The sparks produce heavy wear on the machines (commutator and brushes) and can cause serious damage (arcing or "flashing") between brushes. The invention, applied to traction motors or to the exciters of hydroelectric generating sets will increase the reliability of these machines, reducing maintenance costs and enabling true Predictive Maintenance to be achieved.
column15: ALONSO RODRIGUEZ ANGEL MATIAS;;ALONSO PASCUAL ANGEL MATIAS;;MORENO MOHINO JORGE

column12: COMPOSITION FOR CORRECTING MALNUTRITION AND DECREASING OBESITY IN CHILDREN.
column13: The present invention discloses a composition that provides quality nutrition, and contributes to decrease overweight and obesity. The composition provides approximately 25% of a daily energy requirement, mostly from slow-release carbohydrates, therefore having a low glycemic index, also providing high biological value proteins, lipids with a high proportion of polyunsaturated fatty acids (90%) and vitamins and minerals required to correct their deficiency. The composition further contributes to eliminate anemia, enhances child development, prevents excessive accumulation of body fat and decreases the risk of obesity and chronic diseases. The composition may be used in School Lunch Programs aimed at improving nutrition and reducing obesity.

column12: COMPOSITIONS AND METHODS FOR TREATING TYPE II DIABETES AND RELATED DISORDERS
column13: The present invention relates to methods and compositions for treating type II diabetes. This invention discloses an orally administrable pharmaceutical formulation, as convenient therapy to reduce glucose levels in blood, preventing the development of diabetes and an earlier exhausting of the pancreas. In certain embodiments, the invention provides orally administerable combination pharmaceutical formulations, comprising at least one insulin sensitizer (e.g., a glitazone such as pioglitazone or rosiglitazone), at least one sulfonylurea (e.g., glimepiride), and at least one biguanide (e.g., metformin or a pharmaceutically acceptable salt or ester thereof, such as metformin HCl). The present invention also provides methods of treating type II diabetes and related disorders in a mammal, suitably a human, by administering to a mammal in need thereof one or more of the compositions of the present invention.
column15: ROSADO JORGE LUIS;;DUARTE-VAZQUEZ MIGUEL ANGEL

column12: Silo prensa con riel con mecanismo automático y regulable de compactacion y liberación del cajon
column13: RESUMEN SILO PRENSA CON RIEL CON MECANISMO AUTOMÁTICO Y REGULABLE DE COMPACTACIÓN Y LIBERACIÓN DEL CAJÓN Silo prensa con riel con mecanismo automático y regulable de compactación y liberación del cajón que está conformado por una sección de carga unida a una sección de traslado de material, donde se ubica una bolsa alrededor de la abertura de salida de la sección de traslado, la bolsa se va llenando de material que es ingresado por la parte superior de la sección de carga que es desplazado por un conjunto de trasmisión compuesto por un motor que trasmite el movimiento a un mecanismo de trasmisión conectado a un eje con hélice sinfín ubicada en la parte interior de la sección de traslado, la bolsa es recepcionada en el cajón, el cajón se desplaza sobre un mecanismo de traslación mientras la bolsa se va llenado de material. El mecanismo de regulación y compactación tiene un mecanismo de freno de disco y un mecanismo de palancas y elementos que permiten regular el desplazamiento y la compactación uniforme del material dentro de la bolsa. Además cuenta con un mecanismo de seguro y liberación del cajón para seguridad y comodidad en la operación, los cuales funcionan de forma mecánica sincronizada.

Trata-se da fabricação de plímeros termoplásticos e termoadesivos reforçados de aplicação na confecção de peças conformadas de reforço, provenientes da polimerização de monómeros, tal como lactonas, especificamente y-caprolactonas, e sistemas condensáveis de dois componentes, especificamente poliisocianatos, poliois ou polioispoliesteres, na presença de materiais de reforço e de acordo com o caso, de matérias de carga. column12: INTEGRAL TOOTHBRUSH
column13: The invention relates to an integral toothbrush consisting of: a hollow head (1) comprising fixed and rotating bristles and a hole for dispensing toothpaste onto the bristles; a conical section (15) which is joined to the head by means of threading and which is equipped with a tubular extension (12) that is introduced into the head (1), said extension (12) comprising a perforation which corresponds positionally to that of the head, such that the toothpaste can only be dispensed when the two perforations are in line; a toothpaste container (18) which is connected to the lower part of the conical section (15) and which has a hollow knob (25) coupled to the lower end thereof, a threaded rod (26) being fixed to said hollow knob, passing through the container (18) and having a plunger connected thereto, which, upon rotation of the knob (25), propels the toothpaste; a casing (40) housing an electric motor (39) is joined to the hollow knob (25); a motor (39) with a pair of eccentric weights (37, 38) connected thereto in order to produce vibrations; a shaft (36) which is joined to the upper eccentric weight (37) and which extends as far as the hollow head through the knob (25) and the rod (26), the end of said shaft being equipped with a gear (35) which is connected to a second gear (34) in order to rotate the bristles on the toothbrush; and a pin (21) which is connected to the container (19) and which is used to secure a scoop element (22).

column12: COMPOSITIONS AND METHODS FOR TREATING TYPE II DIABETES AND RELATED DISORDERS
column13: The present invention relates to methods and compositions for treating type II diabetes. This invention discloses an orally administrable pharmaceutical formulation, as convenient therapy to reduce glucose levels in blood, preventing the development of diabetes and an earlier exhausting of the pancreas. In certain embodiments, the invention provides orally administerable combination pharmaceutical formulations, comprising at least one insulin sensitizer (e.g., a glitazone such as pioglitazone or rosiglitazone), at least one sulfonylurea (e.g., glimepiride), and at least one biguanide (e.g., metformin or a pharmaceutically acceptable salt or ester thereof, such as metformin HCl). The present invention also provides methods of treating type II diabetes and related disorders in a mammal, suitably a human, by administering to a mammal in need thereof one or more of the compositions of the present invention.

column12: CHILD SAFETY SEAT ANCHOR ASSEMBLY
column13: The problem of a front seat occupant moving the front seatback so far so as to interfere with the proper positioning of a rear-facing child safety seat or to touch a child's legs while sitting in a front-facing child safety seat is solved by transforming the lower anchor into a segment of an electrical circuit with a normally open switch that is forced to the closed position when a child safety seat attachment system has attached to the lower anchor and the vehicle prevents the front seat from moving beyond a present distance toward the rear seat. The closing of the electrical circuit can be used to supply an input signal to a controller in the vehicle programmed to notify the operator that a child safety seat has been attached to prevent the front seat from moving beyond a fixed distancefrom the rear seat.

In one aspect, the invention provides compositions comprising enalapril and simvastatin for use in methods for the treatment and/or prevention of cardiovascular disease, and to the use of such compositions in the manufacture of products for such treatment and/or prevention. In another aspect, the invention provides methods for the treatment and/or prevention of cardiovascular disease using compositions comprising enalapril, simvastatin and acetylsalicylic acid. column12: LIPID ENCAPSULATION PROCESS BY SPRAY DRYING FOR USE IN CHILDREN SPECIALIZED FORMULATIONS.
column13: The present disclosure is related to the food industry in general, and to the manufacturing of food formulations for infants with special requirements. The advantages of the present invention with respect of state-of-the-art compositions, lies in that the present invention allows having lipid micro and nano-capsules of interest in infant nutrition with increased stability; furthermore, since the present invention is a protein-free formulation, it is useful in the development of specialized infant formulations such as those used for feeding infants showing cow's milk protein allergy or multiple food allergy. The capsules are formed by a wall and a core material (lipid). The wall material is formed by a combination of maltodextrin / modified starch in a ratio of 1:1. The preferred wall material-core material ratio is 1:3 and the micro and the nano-capsules are obtained by spay drying.

column12: COMPOSITION FOR THE TREATMENT OF OBESITY AND HYPERLIPIDAEMIA
column13: The invention relates to the pharmaceutical industry and, more specifically, the industry involved in the manufacture of pharmaceutical products used to reduce weight and to treat hyperlipidaemia. The invention is advantageous over similar existing compositions in that it eliminates the collateral effects normally caused by ingestion of a lipase inhibitor. According to the invention, both the lipase inhibitor component and the fat-trapper are optimised, using a suitable composition for, and very small quantities of each of the components. The invention relates to a composition for the treatment of obesity and hyperlipidaemia, which is characterised in that it combines a lipase inhibitor and a fat-trapper compound.

column12: processo para preparação de um catalisador de óxido de ferro suportado através de impregnação fìsica
column13: "PROCESSO PARA A PREPARAçãO DE UM CATALISADOR DE óXIDO DE FERRO SUPORTADO ATRAVéS DE IMPREGNAçãO FìSICA". é descrito um processo para a preparação de um catalisador conformado por óxido de ferro em uma matriz inerte que pode ser alumina, zeólita, hematita ou silica, para ser utilizado como catalisador de oxidação avançada catalítica. A preparação do catalisador é efetuada através da impregnação do suporte com um sal de ferro e depois a calcinação para a obtenção do óxido de ferro. Os catalisadores têm como função a produção da ruptura homolítica do peróxido de hidrogênio e ozónio, gerando radicais hidroxilas os quais destroem elementos contaminantes persistentes nos resíduos industriais líquidos (ril).

column12: METHOD FOR SELECTING BOVINE CATTLE FOR THE PRODUCTION OF COW'S MILK FREE OF BETACASEIN A1 AND ITS USE IN THE PREPARATION OF FOODS THAT STIMULATE MUSCLE RECOVERY IN ATHLETES.
column13: The present invention relates to the biotechnology industry and the specialized food manufacturing industry. It possesses the advantages of its ability to genotype cattle based on the CSN2 gene to identify and select the bulls and cows that carry the CSN2 A2/A2 genotype, to breed them, raise dairy cattle capable of producing BCAS A2 compound milk, and free from BCAS A1. Said milk is useful in the manufacture of supplements to promote muscle regeneration in athletes. The method includes the insertion of a point mutation in the codon, where the polymorphism of bovine BCAS A1 and BCAS A2 occurs, using a modified oligonucleotide. The CSR PCR product, which results from the amplification of CSN2 A2, has a restriction site for a specific endonuclease, which does not occur with the CSR PCR product of CSN2 A1. After amplification, the CSR PCR products are digested with the specific endonuclease and the restriction fragments are analyzed on a 1% agarose gel. The genotype of the animals is defi ned based on the pattern of the bands of the fragments, which result from the restriction enzymatic digestion.
column15: ROSADO LORIA JORGE LUIS;;DUARTE VÁZQUEZ MIGUEL ANGEL

column12: PROCESS FOR THE MANUFACTURE OF A NATURAL FERTILIZER BASED ON RESIDUES RESULTING FROM THE POST PRODUCTION OF MUSHROOMS.
column13: The present document refers to an invention process focussed on the manufacture of a novel natural fertilizer based on residues resulting from the post production of mushrooms, which purpose is to obtain a highly nutritive fertilizer used as a soil regenerator, nutrient enhancer and growth accelerator for any type of crop, either agricultural or of ornate. Said process comprises a plurality of activities or tasks, which may be strictly performed in a sequential manner, since each one of them depends on the previous activity so that the process may work properly. In addition, it is important to comply with the parameters established in each of the activities so as to obtain or generate a quality product, which accomplishes the results desired by the producer and the client. Said invention process reduces the transformation time required by the substrate (raw material) to turn into a natural fertilized by means of natural aerobic fermentation; which nowadays represents one of the most common and used methods. The process is also designed for removing most of the pollutants of the environment involved in the natural transformation process, such as plagues, malodour and chemical lixiviates that the substrate may contain.

column12: System and procedure for the diagnosis of faults in photovoltaic installations. (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)
column13: System and procedure for the diagnosis of faults in photovoltaic installations. It is applicable in photovoltaic systems with mppt (maximum power point tracking) distributed - e.g. Systems with power optimizers or microinverters. The system includes, at least, a photovoltaic generator, equipment tracking the maximum power point each module or every few modules, voltage and current sensors in each equipment follower of the maximum power point, an electronic communication in each module, a centralized communication card for data reception, physical memory for data storage and a small microprocessor for data processing. The automatic detection, the level of severity and the location of failures allows a quick solution of them, thus increasing the energy availability and, therefore, decreasing the cost of electricity produced by the installation. column12: composição para o tratamento da obesidade e hiperlipidemia
column13: COMPOSIçãO PARA O TRATAMENTO DA OBESIDADE E HIPERLIPIDEMIA. Onde a composição farmacêutica da presente invenção reduz a absorção de gordura proveniente da dieta através da inibição da enzima lipase gastrintestinal. Os inibidores utilizados são a polilisina e a protamina, ambas moléculas carregadas positivamente e têm a capacidade de interagir com o substrato emulsificado e impedir a absorção da enzima na interfase inibindo desta forma sua atividade. A combinação do inibidor de lipase com o polímero coletor de gordura (quitosano), aumenta o efeito inibidor da absorção de gordura, tal efeito sinérgico é atribuído à aceleração do trânsito gastrintestinal do alimento produzido pelo polímero insolúvel.
column15: LORIA JORGE LUIS ROSADO;;VASQUEZ MIGUEL ANGEL DUARTE

column12: EXTENSIVELY HYDROLYZED RICE PROTEIN-BASED INFANT FORMULA AND USE IN FEEDING INFANTS WITH FOOD ALLERGIES.
column13: An infant formula was developed. This formula was specially designed for infants with history of allergy to cow's milk proteins, which normally occurs in infants fed with infant formula. The invention represents a novelty, because in addition to its unique composition, the formula of the invention is more effective than the formulas commonly used to address the problem of protein allergy, and also it contains substances that support a proper physical and mental development of the infant.

column12: COMPOSITIONS AND METHODS FOR TREATMENT AND PREVENTION OF CARDIOVASCULAR DISEASE.
column13: The present invention is in the fields of medicine, pharmaceuticals, neutraceuticals and cardiology. In one aspect, the invention provides compositions comprising enalapril and simvastatin for use in methods for the treatment and/or prevention of cardiovascular disease, and to the use of such compositions in the manufacture of products for such treatment and/or prevention. In another aspect, the invention provides methods for the treatment and/or prevention of cardiovascular disease using compositions comprising enalapril, simvastatin and acetylsalicylic acid. The compositions and methods of the invention are useful in the treatment and prevention of cardiovascular disease in a variety of animals, particularly humans.

column12: INFANT FORMULA WITH HIGH IMMUNOLOGICAL VALUE COMPRISING A MIXTURE OF BOVINE COLOSTRUM AND OTHER COMPONENTS NORMALLY FOUND IN BREAST MILK.
column13: The present invention discloses a formula with high immunological value comprising bovine colostrum enriched with other components normally found in breast milk, which is especially useful for feeding the newborn infant during the first days. The formula is especially designed with highly digestible substances according to the immaturity of the digestive system in newborns, in addition to providing defensive substances which allow for the first immunization. The invention represents a novelty in that the nutritional components present in the colostrum have been modified so as to make it as similar as possible to breast milk, thereby reducing adverse effects produced by the consumption of an infant formula in the short and long term, and guaranteeing an optimum growth.

column12: SYNERGISTIC COMPOSITION FOR THE TREATMENT OF DIABETES AND THE COMORBIDITES THEREOF
column13: The invention relates to the pharmaceutical industry in general and to the industry involved in the manufacture of pharmaceutical products for the treatment of diabetes and the comorbidites thereof. The invention is advantageous over prior art compositions in that it enables long-term management of diabetic symptoms in order to maintain adequate glycaemic control, such as to produce a more powerful effect in relation to hyperglycaemia, thereby enabling a reduction in doses and, consequently, the individual collateral effects of the drugs utilised. In addition, the inventive composition improves insulin sensitivity of pancreatic beta receptors, simultaneously correcting insulin secretion disorders, and stimulates lipid metabolism, thereby improving the profile of same in the blood plasma. The composition is formed by a hypoglycaemic agent, glimepiride, and an anti-hypoglycaemic agent, pioglitazone. The composition contains between 5 and 2,500 mg pioglitazone and between 1 and 250 mg glimepiride.

column12: FORMULA INFANTIL A BASE DE PROTEINA DE ARROZ EXTENSAMENTE HIDROLIZADA PARA SU USO EN LA ALIMENTACION DE INFANTES CON ALERGIA ALIMENTICIA

Además por su composición es más efectiva para atender el problema de alergia a las proteínas, contiene sustancias que sustentan un adecuado desarrollo físico y mental del infante. Reivindicación 2: La composición de la reivindicación 1, caracterizada porque comprende proteína de arroz extensamente hidrolizada; azúcar, almidón de maíz, almidón de arroz, maltodextrina, oligosacáridos no digeribles; ácido grasos poliinsaturado de cadena larga (LC PUFAS); nucleótidos; vitaminas y minerales; inositol; colina, taurina; y carnitina.

column12: SYNERGISTIC COMPOSITION OF AN ANTIDIABETIC AGENT AND AN ANTIOXIDANT FOR THE TREATMENT OF DIABETES AND MICRO AND MACRO-VASCULAR COMPLICATIONS THEREOF.
column13: The present disclosure is related to the pharmaceutical industry in general and the pharmaceutical manufacturing industry for the treatment of diabetes and its complications. The advantages of the present invention with respect to state-of-the-art compositions, lies in that the present invention allows reducing both glycemia and micro and macro-vascular complications of the disease which are responsible in most cases of premature deaths from diabetes. The composition is formed by an antidiabetic and an antioxidant agent. The antidiabetic agent is metformin, while the antioxidant agent is Resveratrol. The metformin is present in the composition in an amount between 500 - 3000 mg, while resveratrol in an amount between 100 - 3000 mg. The combination may have any physical or pharmaceutical form.
column15: LORIA JORGE LUIS ROSADO;;VAZQUEZ MIGUEL ANGEL DUARTE

column12: APPETITE SUPPRESSANT COMPOSITION FOR TREATING OBESITY AND REDUCING THE RISK OF CARDIOVASCULAR DISEASE.
column13: Described is a food formula used as a partial substitute of food in obese or overweight subjects. It is a food supplement added with 26 vitamins and minerals, designed specially for people who require losing or maintaining a healthy weight. The supplement provides nutriments that have been identified with deficit in obese or overweight populations, which inclusion in the diet is beneficial and avoids fat deposition. In addition, the invention contains antioxidants that reduce the oxidation of serum lipoproteins and a soluble fibre which helps to reduce the levels of triglycerides and lipoproteins of high density, thus improving the cardiovascular health. Some additional benefits include the reduction of the plasmatic homocysteine due to the addition of folic acid. The composition comprises a natural appetite suppressor, which helps to avoid the consumption of food between meals. The composition may be used in control weight programs, also providing additional benefits in diseases clos ely related to obesity such as diabetes, insulin resistance, dyslipidemia and cardiovascular disease.
column15: LORIA JORGE LUIS ROSADO;;VAZQUEZ MIGUEL ANGEL DUARTE

column12: COMPOSITIONS AND METHODS FOR TREATING TYPE II DIABETES AND RELATED DISORDERS.
column13: The present invention relates to methods and compositions for treating type II diabetes. This invention discloses an orally administrable pharmaceutical formulation, as convenient therapy to reduce glucose levels in blood, preventing the development of diabetes and an earlier exhausting of the pancreas. In certain embodiments, the invention provides orally administerable combination pharmaceutical formulations, comprising at least one insulin sensitizer (e.g., a glitazone such as pioglitazone or rosiglitazone), at least one sulfonylurea (e.g., glimepiride), and at least one biguanide (e.g., metformin or a pharmaceutically acceptable salt or ester thereof, such as metformin HCl). The present invention also provides methods of treating type II diabetes and related disorders in a mammal, suitably a human, by administering to a mammal in need thereof one or more of the compositions of the present invention.
column15: LORIA JORGE LUIS ROSADO;;VAZQUEZ MIGUEL ANGEL DUARTE

column12: INFANT FORMULA FOR OPTIMAL GROWTH, GASTROINTESTINAL PROTECTION AND IMMUNOLOGICAL PROTECTION OF INFANTS
column13: The invention relates to formula for children of between 0 and 36 months, comprising per 100 g: 5 - 15 g protein, 40 - 70 g carbohydrates, and 15 - 40 g fat. The proteins contain a high concentration of alpha-lactalbumin and A2 beta-casein. The formula also contains palmitic acid, oligosaccharides, long-chain fatty acids, nucleotides and vitamins. The formula can take the form of a powder or be mixed with a liquid when it is to serve as food.

column12: COMPOSITION OF NUTRIENTS AND BIOACTIVE SUBSTANCES WHICH PROMOTE GROWTH AND REDUCE INTOLERANCE AND SIDE EFFECTS IN PREMATURE INFANTS
column13: The present disclosure is related to the obtaining of a nutritional formula for the feeding of preterm born infants. The formula comprises a mixture of casein; whey milk protein; alphalactalbumin; beta casein A2 protein, lactose; palmitic acid in beta position; non digestible oligosaccharides; long chain polyunsaturated fatty acids (LC PUFAS); nucleotides; vitamins and minerals; inositol, choline, taurine and carnitine in concentrations sufficient enough to satisfy nutritional requirements of premature children, besides being better-tolerated.

column12: Method implemented by computer, system and program product for computer to simulate the behavior of textile fabric at thread level (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)
column13: Method implemented by computer, system and computer program product to simulate the behavior of a woven textile at thread level. The method includes: - retrieve structural information of a woven textile; - representing each basting with four contact nodes (4) at the end of the two contacts (5) of basting between pair of loops (2), each contact nodule (4) being described by a coordinate (X) of 3d position and two sliding coordinates (u, v) representing the arc lengths of the two wires in contact; - measuring forces in each contact nodule (4) based on a force model that includes wrapping forces to capture the interaction of the yarns in the bastings; - calculating the movement of each contact nodule (4) in a plurality of time stages using derived equations of motion using the lagrange-euler equations, and integrating numerically with time, where the equations of motion take density into account of mass evenly distributed along the threads, as well as the measured forces and boundary conditions. (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)
column15: CIRIO GABRIEL;;OTADUY TRISTAN MIGUEL ANGEL;;LOPEZ MORENO JORGE

column12: Balancing yarn use in designing tufted patterns for textiles
column13: Tools are provided that communicate to a pattern designer how much yarn is being used on every needle for a given tuft height pattern and permit the designer to adjust the pattern accordingly to balance the yarn usage on the needles. An electronic representation of a pattern design is received for controlling a carpet tufting operation. The pattern design includes a pile height per tuft. A grid is provided for representing the pattern design using different visual cues to represent different pile heights. A graph depicting use-of-yarn per needle for the carpet tufting operation is generated. The grid and the graph are on a common user interface and are viewable at the same time on a display device.

column12: Thread COMPUTER-IMPLEMENTED METHOD SYSTEM AND COMPUTER PROGRAM PRODUCT FOR SIMULATING THE THREAD BEHAVIOUR OF WOVEN TEXTILES
column13: 원사 단위의 편물 거동을 시뮬레이션하는 컴퓨터 구현방법, 시스템 및 컴퓨터 프로그램 제품을 제공한다. 이 방법은: - 편물의 구조 정보를 검색하는 단계와; - 한 쌍의 루프들(2) 간의 2개의 스티치 접촉(5)의 말단에 4개의 접촉 노드(4)를 각는 각 스티치를 나타내는 단계로, 각 접촉 노드(4)는 3D 위치 좌표(x)와, 접촉에서 2개의 원사의 원호 길이를 나타내는 2개의 미끄럼 좌표(u, v)에 의해 묘사되는, 단계와; - 스티치에서 원사의 상호작용을 파악하기 위한 래핑력을 포함하는 힘 모델에 기초하여 각 접촉 노드(4) 상의 힘을 측정하는 단계와; - 라그랑주-오일러(Lagrange-Euler) 방정식을 이용하여 유도되고 시간에 따라 수치 적분한 운동방정식을 이용하여 복수의 시간단계에서 각 접촉 노드(4)의 동작을 계산하고, 이 운동방정식은 원사에 균일하게 분포하는 질량밀도, 및 측정된 힘과 경계 조건을 처리하는 단계를 포함한다.
column15: CIRIO GABRIEL;;OTADUY TRISTAN MIGUEL ANGEL;;LOPEZ MORENO JORGE

column12: Road side protective structures
column13: The invention relates to improvements in road side protective structures of the type comprising an upper rail (1) attached on support posts (3) and a lower screen (4) closing the gap to the ground, the lower screen (4) being attached on the upper rail (1) by means of arms (5) comprising a rigid profile section (6) attached at one end directly on the upper rail (1), whereas the other end is attached on the lower screen (4) by means of a J-shaped part (7) where parts (10) made of bent sheet are arranged between the lower screen (4) and the support posts (3).

column12: DEVICE FOR DETECTING EDGES AND IMPROVING THE QUALITY OF AN IMAGE
column13: The invention relates to a device for detecting edges and improving the quality of an image, which includes a group of elemental processor cells which are identical and locally interconnected. Each processor cell in turn is characterised by a comparator which compares, in parallel, each pair of adjacent pixels. The threshold voltage which establishes the voltage difference between pixels considered to be part of an edge is determined by a time adjustment of a control signal. Said adjustment, combined with that of the filtering control signal, also in time, are the only adjustments required in order to configure the desired processing. No external analog control signals are required, thus making it easier to program the hardware by the device used and reducing the number of digital-to-analog converters in the final system.

column12: BALANCING YARN USE IN DESIGNING TUFTED PATTERNS FOR TEXTILES
column13: Tools are provided that communicate to a pattern designer how much yarn is being used on every needle for a given tuft height pattern and permit the designer to adjust the pattern accordingly to balance the yarn usage on the needles. An electronic representation of a pattern design is received for controlling a carpet tufting operation. The pattern design includes a pile height per tuft. A grid is provided for representing the pattern design using different visual cues to represent different pile heights. A graph depicting use-of-yarn per needle for the carpet tufting operation is generated. The grid and the graph can be on a common user interface and can be viewable at the same time on a display device.
column15: JONES WILLIAM NATHAN;;DEL ANGEL JORGE;;RIPLEY GRAEME ROBERT

column12: LOWERING MECHANISM FOR THE EXTERIOR REAR-VIEW MIRRORS OF MOTOR VEHICLES
column13: The invention relates to a lowering mechanism for the exterior rear-view mirrors of a motor vehicle. The inventive mechanism comprises: a housing which is solidly connected to a mirror support structure, and an actuated crown wheel which serves as an axis of rotation for the mirror support structure in relation to a support frame which is fixed to the vehicle. The aforementioned crown is equipped with first position fixing means which can be used to connect the crown to the support frame and second position fixing means which, together with an end stop element which is solidly connected to the housing and loaded by an elastic member, limit the rotation of the structure around the crown in one direction of rotation. According to the invention, the end stop element and the elastic member form a single piece having elastic properties.
column14: FICO MIRRORS SA;;ERRANDO SMET JORGE;;MIGUEL SANZ SANTIAGO;;PEREZ TRUJILLO ANGEL

column12: Overlap mechanism for the exterior rear-view mirrors of motor vehicles
column13: An actuated toothed wheel serves as an axis of rotation for a mirror support structure in relation to a support frame fixed to a vehicle. The wheel's tooth has a position fixing element for engaging the tooth to frame, and a position fixing element which together with an end stop, limits the rotation of the structure around the tooth in preset direction. The end stop is loaded by an integrally formed elastic element.

column12: Folding Mechanism for Exterior Rear-View Mirrors in Automotive Vehicles
column13: The present invention relates to a folding mechanism for exterior rear-view mirrors in an automotive vehicle, comprising a housing integral with a mirror-carrying casing, and an actuated ring acting as an axis of rotation of the mentioned casing with respect to a support chassis fixed to the vehicle, the ring being provided with first positional fixing means susceptible to coupling the mentioned ring to the support chassis and with second positional fixing means which, in collaboration with a stop element integral with the housing and loaded by un elastic member, limit the rotation of the mentioned casing around the ring and according to one rotating direction, all this with the stop element and the elastic member being integrated in a single piece with elastic properties.
column15: ERRANDO SMET JORGE;;MIGUEL SANZ SANTIAGO;;PEREZ TRUJILLO ANGEL

column12: COMPUTER IMPLEMENTED METHOD, SYSTEM AND COMPUTER PROGRAM PRODUCT FOR SIMULATING THE BEHAVIOR OF A KNITTED FABRIC AT YARN LEVEL
column13: The invention relates to a computer-implemented method, a system and a computer program product for simulating the thread behaviour of a woven textile. The method comprises: obtaining structural information about a woven textile; representing each tack with four contact nodes (4) at the end of the two tack contacts (5) between each pair of loops (2), each contact node (4) being described by a 3D position coordinate (x) and two sliding coordinates (u, v) which represent the arc lengths of the two threads in contact; measuring forces on each contact node (4) on the basis of a force model including surrounding forces in order to capture the interaction of the threads in the tacks; and calculating the movement of each contact node (4) in a plurality of time intervals using equations of motion which are derived using the Euler-Lagrange equations and digitally time-integrated, where the equations of motion take into account the mass density uniformly distributed along the threads, as well as the measured forces and the boundary conditions.
column15: CIRIO GABRIEL;;OTADUY TRISTAN MIGUEL ANGEL;;LOPEZ MORENO JORGE

column12: Computer implemented method, system and computer program product for simulating the behavior of a knitted fabric at yarn level
column13: Computer implemented method, system and computer program product for simulating the behavior of a knitted fabric at yarn level. The method comprises: retrieving structural information of a knitted fabric;representing each stitch with four contact nodes ( 4 ) at the end of the two stitch contacts ( 5 ) between pair of loops ( 2 ), each contact node ( 4 ) being described by a 3D position coordinate (x) and two sliding coordinates (u, v) representing the arc lengths of the two yarns in contact;measuring forces on each contact node ( 4 ) based on a force model including wrapping forces to capture the interaction of yarns at stitches;calculating the movement of each contact node ( 4 ) at a plurality of time steps using equations of motion derived using the Lagrange-Euler equations, and numerically integrated over time, wherein the equations of motion account for the mass density distributed uniformly along yarns, as well as the measured forces and boundary conditions.

column12: Computer implemented method, system and computer program product for simulating the behavior of a knitted fabric at yarn level

The method comprises: retrieving structural information of a knitted fabric;representing each stitch with four contact nodes ( 4 ) at the end of the two stitch contacts ( 5 ) between pair of loops ( 2 ), each contact node ( 4 ) being described by a 3 D position coordinate (x) and two sliding coordinates (u, v) representing the arc lengths of the two yarns in contact;measuring forces on each contact node ( 4 ) based on a force model including wrapping forces to capture the interaction of yarns at stitches;calculating the movement of each contact node ( 4 ) at a plurality of time steps using equations of motion derived using the Lagrange-Euler equations, and numerically integrated over time, wherein the equations of motion account for the mass density distributed uniformly along yarns, as well as the measured forces and boundary conditions.
column15: CIRIO GABRIEL;;OTADUY TRISTAN MIGUEL ANGEL;;LOPEZ MORENO JORGE
column32: Jonathan Kaldor, “Simulating Yarn-Based Cloth”, May 2011, Cornell University (Year: 2011).;;Sueda et al, “Large-scale dynamic simulation of hihgly constrained strands”, Jul. 2011, ACM Transactions on Graphics, vol. 30 No. 4, Article 39, University of British Columbia (Year: 2011).;;Min et al, “Physically-based method of cloth deformation”, 2011, IEEE, Workshop of digital media and digital content management (Year: 2011).;;Yuksel et al, “stitch meshes for modeling knitted clothing with yarn-level detail”, 2012, ACM Transactions on Graphics, vol. 31 No. 4, Article 37 (Year: 2012).

column12: DEVICE FOR DETECTING EDGES AND IMPROVING THE QUALITY OF AN IMAGE
column13: The invention relates to a device for detecting edges and improving the quality of an image, which includes a group of elemental processor cells which are identical and locally interconnected. Each processor cell in turn is characterised by a comparator which compares, in parallel, each pair of adjacent pixels. The threshold voltage which establishes the voltage difference between pixels considered to be part of an edge is determined by a time adjustment of a control signal. Said adjustment, combined with that of the filtering control signal, also in time, are the only adjustments required in order to configure the desired processing. No external analog control signals are required, thus making it easier to program the hardware by the device used and reducing the number of digital-to-analog converters in the final system.
column15: FERNANDEZ BERNI JORGE;;RODRIGUEZ VAZQUEZ ANGEL;;CARMONA GALAN RICARDO

column12: mecanismo dobrável para espelhos retrovisores externos de veìculos automotores
column13: An actuated toothed wheel serves as an axis of rotation for a mirror support structure in relation to a support frame fixed to a vehicle. The wheel's tooth has a position fixing element for engaging the tooth to frame, and a position fixing element which together with an end stop, limits the rotation of the structure around the tooth in preset direction. The end stop is loaded by an integrally formed elastic element.
column15: SMET JORGE ERNANDO;;SANZ SANTIAGO MIGUEL;;TRUJILLO ANGEL PEREZ

column12: METHOD FOR DETERMINING WEIGHT OF MOLTEN METAL IN SITU
column13: A method for rapid and accurate weight determination of molten metal in a slag-containing bath by the addition to the molten bath of a known weight amount of a "trace" element (preferably of a type which is completely diluted in the molten metal, to the practical exclusion of the slag); awaiting the even dispersal of the trace element in the molten metal (aiding the speed of dispersal by promoting a boiling action, if necessary); taking a sample of the molten metal; analyzing the sample to determine the weight percent of trace element in the molten metal (for example by spectrometric analysis); and determining the weight of the metal from the known values of weight of the trace element added and its weight percent in the molten metal after addition.
column15: RODRIGUEZ FEDERICO ANGEL;;NOVOA JORGE BECERRA;;RAMIREZ JULIAN SANCHEZ

column12: Balancing yarn use in designing tufted patterns for textiles
column13: Tools are provided that communicate to a pattern designer how much yarn is being used on every needle for a given tuft height pattern and permit the designer to adjust the pattern accordingly to balance the yarn usage on the needles. An electronic representation of a pattern design is received for controlling a carpet tufting operation. The pattern design includes a pile height per tuft. A grid is provided for representing the pattern design using different visual cues to represent different pile heights. A graph depicting use-of-yarn per needle for the carpet tufting operation is generated. The grid and the graph can be on a common user interface and can be viewable at the same time on a display device.
column15: JONES WILLIAM NATHAN;;DEL ANGEL JORGE;;RIPLEY GRAEME ROBERT

column12: LOWERING MECHANISM FOR THE EXTERIOR REAR-VIEW MIRRORS OF MOTOR VEHICLES
column13: The present invention relates to a folding mechanism for exterior rear-view mirrors in an automotive vehicle, comprising a housing integral with a mirror-carrying casing, and an actuated ring acting as an axis of rotation of the mentioned casing with respect to a support chassis fixed to the vehicle, the ring being provided with first positional fixing means susceptible to coupling the mentioned ring to the support chassis and with second positional fixing means which, in collaboration with a stop element integral with the housing and loaded by un elastic member, limit the rotation of the mentioned casing around the ring and according to one rotating direction, all this with the stop element and the elastic member being integrated in a single piece with elastic properties.

column12: DEVICE FOR THE HARDWARE DETECTION OF LOCAL EXTREMES IN AN IMAGE
column13: The invention relates to a device and method for the hardware detection of local extremes in an image, comprising a plurality of mixed-signal processing elementary cells (0) that are locally interconnected and comprising, in each cell, a first switch (1) configured to allow the pre-charging of a capacitor (4) at the supply voltage. According to the invention, once the capacitor (4) has been pre-charged it is discharged via a second switch (2) connected to a current source (3) that varies in an increasing monotone manner with the analog voltage that represents the value of the pixel in question. The value of the pixel is compared asynchronously with the neighbouring pixels of the neighbouring cells using two inverters (5, 6), a digital NO gate (7), a digital NAND gate (8), third and fourth switches (9, 10) and a memory element (11) for storing the result.

column12: INDUSTRIAL PROCESS TO MANUFACTURE AROMATIC CARBOXYLIC ACIDS
column13: A process that involves liquid-phase catalytic oxidation of a mono- or poly-substituted alkyl aromatic compound comprises (i) microdispersion of air in the reactor at a pressure between 15 and 25 atmospheres and at a rate between 200 and 500 kg/sec.m2; and (ii) recycling the catalyst by evaporation of the purge that contains it and leaching the resulting paste with distilled water at 20-40.degree. C to dissolve the catalyst separating it from the rest of the components. Aromatic carboxylic acids are basic products used in a large number of industrial fields.

column12: SINGLE DAILY DOSAGE FORM FOR PREVENTION AND TREATMENT OF METABOLIC SYNDROME
column13: The present invention is in the fields of medicine, pharmaceuticals, nutraceuticals, endocrinology and cardiology. The invention provides compositions comprising a statin, an inhibitor of the angiotensin converting enzyme, an antiplatelet compound and an anti- hyperglycemic compound for use in the treatment and/or prevention of cardiometabolic risk factors of Metabolic Syndrome and treatment and/or prevention of Metabolic Syndrome. The present invention provides for the use of such compositions in the manufacture of products for treatment and/or prevention of Metabolic Syndrome. The biguanide metformin of the composition could be present in extended release form allowing its use together with the other drugs in a single dosage form at low dose. This combination of drugs in a single daily dosage greatly improves compliance and adherence to treatment which is a critical factor for treating patients with Metabolic Syndrome.

column12: VASTAGO PARA AMORTIGUADOR HIDRAULICO.
column13: Vástago para amortiguador hidráulico, que se caracteriza por tener la superficie externa dotada, al menos parcialmente, de un recubrimiento de grosor uniforme, comprendido entre 20 y 60 micras, y que comprende politetrafluoretileno (PTFE), partículas cerámicas y un pigmento, que reduce la fricción y mejora la resistencia al desgaste del citado vástago, comprendiendo dichas partículas cerámicas y el pigmento, mullita y óxido de titanio respectivamente. La superficie externa del alma del vástago que está en contacto con el recubrimiento es sometida a un arenado previo de alta precisión, que dota a la citada superficie de una rugosidad superficial de Ra 0,3 - 2 micras, y a una posterior aplicación de una capa de una imprimación.
column15: MACARULLA BOMBARDO JORDI;;RECALDE ARTAZCOZ JOSE ANGEL;;BIERA GALAN JORGE

column12: PISTON ROD FOR HYDRAULIC SHOCK ABSORBER
column13: Piston rod for hydraulic shock absorber characterised in that its outside surface is provided, at least partly, with a uniformly thick coating ranging between 20 and 60 microns, which comprises polytetrafluorethylene (PTFE), ceramic particles and a pigment that reduce friction and enhance wear resistance of said piston rod, comprising the ceramic particles and the pigment mullite and titanium oxide, respectively. The core outside surface of the rod which is in contact with the coating (3), is previously treated with high precision sand blasting, providing a surface roughness of Ra 0,3 - 3 microns and finally it is treated with an external layer of a primer.

column12: Method of preparation of a solid setting accelerant product, product obtained and use thereof
column13: Method of preparation of a solid accelerant product for setting in the solid state, free of alkaline metals and chlorides, easily soluble in water at room temperature in order to provide solutions with a high concentration in Al 2 O 3 said solutions being able to be used as liquid setting accelerants for the hardening of cement mixtures (mortar and concrete) ensuring a rapid development of compressive strength at early ages. The solid setting accelerant contains a polyanionic aluminium complex of formula [Al(OH) a (SO 4 ) b X c (H 2 O) d ] where a = 1-3 b = 0-1, c = 0-0.5, d = 0-4 and X = DEA, TEA.

column13: PROCEDIMIENTO INDUSTRIAL PARA LA FABRICACION DE ACIDOS CARBOXILICOS AROMATICOS. EL PROCEDIMIENTO QUE CONLLEVA LA OXIDACION CATALITICA EN FASE LIQUIDA DE UN COMPUESTO ALQUIL-AROMATICO MONO O POLISUSTITUIDO COMPRENDE: (I) MICRO DISPERSION DEL AIRE EN EL REACTOR A UNA, PRESION ENTRE 15 Y 25 ATMOSFERAS Y A UNA VELOCIDAD ENTRE 200 Y 500 KG/SEG.M2; Y (II) RECICLADO DEL CATALIZADOR POR EVAPORACION DE LA. PURGA QUE LO CONTIENE Y LIXIVIADO DE LA PASTA RESULTANTE CON AGUA DESTILADA A 20-40C PARA DISOLVER EL CATALIZADOR SEPARANDOLO DEL RESTO DE LOS COMPONENTES. LOS ACIDOS CARBOXILICOS AROMATICOS SON PRODUCTOS BASICOS CON APLICACION EN UNA GRAN DIVERSIDAD DE CAMPOS INDUSTRIALES.

column12: Reibscheibe für eine Reibkupplung
column13: Die Erfindung betrifft eine Reibscheibe (1) für eine Reibkupplung (2) eines Kraftfahrzeugs (3), aufweisend zumindest die folgenden Komponenten:- eine Mitnehmerscheibe (4) mit einer Rotationsachse (5), welche rotationsfest mit einer Ausgangswelle (6) verbindbar ist; und- ein Federelement (7), welches zur Aufnahme eines Reibbelags (8) zum reibschlüssigen Übertragen eines Drehmoments eingerichtet ist und mittels zumindest eines Segmentfußes (9) radial außenseitig an der Mitnehmerscheibe (4) befestigt ist, wobei die Mitnehmerscheibe (4) und das Federelement (7) miteinander vernietet sind. Die Reibscheibe (1) ist vor allem dadurch gekennzeichnet, dass die Mitnehmerscheibe (4) zumindest eine Stützerhebung (10) aufweist, welche formschlüssig in einer Stützaufnahme (11) des Federelements (7) aufgenommen ist.Mit der hier vorgeschlagenen Reibscheibe ist ein Montageaufwand reduziert und somit eine Reibscheibe kostengünstiger herstellbar.

column12: PROCEDIMIENTO DE OPTIMIZACION DE ELECTROEROSION EN ALEACIONES NO FERRICAS PARA MOLDES.
column13: Procedimiento de optimización de electroerosión en aleaciones no férricas para moldes, del tipo de los utilizados en la industria de fabricación de moldes para materiales termoplásticos caracterizado por utilizar unas probetas y unos electrodos, con forma preferente de paralelepípedo, y por una secuencia de fases claramente definidas que propicia obtener como resultado una tabla de parámetros de usuario optimizada para la electroerosión en aleaciones no férricas para moldes que permita obtener la rugosidad final deseada y las dimensiones finales de la pieza acordes con las esperadas. Esta invención aporta la principal ventaja de permitir utilizar máquinas de electroerosión convencionales, no pensadas para aleaciones no férricas para moldes, con gran predictibilidad en los resultados, a la par que posibilita la utilización de estas aleaciones en la realización de moldes, especialmente en sus fases de pruebas, con la consiguiente disminución en su coste económico, especialmente importante enmoldes de importantes dimensiones.

column12: Single Daily Dosage Form for Prevention and Treatment of Metabolic Syndrome
column13: The present invention is in the fields of medicine, pharmaceuticals, nutraceuticals, endocrinology and cardiology. The invention provides compositions comprising a statin, an inhibitor of the angiotensin converting enzyme, an antiplatelet compound and an anti-hyperglycemic compound for use in the treatment and/or prevention of cardiometabolic risk factors of Metabolic Syndrome and treatment and/or prevention of Metabolic Syndrome. The present invention provides for the use of such compositions in the manufacture of products for treatment and/or prevention of Metabolic Syndrome. The biguanide metformin of the composition could be present in extended release form allowing its use together with the other drugs in a single dosage form at low dose. This combination of drugs in a single daily dosage greatly improves compliance and adherence to treatment which is a critical factor for treating patients with Metabolic Syndrome.

column12: Method of preparation of a solid setting accelerant product, product obtained and use thereof
column13:
Method of preparation of a solid accelerant product for setting in the solid state, free of alkaline metals and chlorides, easily soluble in water at room temperature in order to provide solutions with a high concentration in Al 2 O 3 ; said solutions being able to be used as liquid setting accelerants for the hardening of cement mixtures (mortar and concrete) ensuring a rapid development of compressive strength at early ages. 
The solid setting accelerant contains a polyanionic aluminium complex of formula [Al(OH) a (SO 4 ) b X c (H 2 O) d ] where a = 1-3; b = 0-1, c = 0-0.5, d = 0-4 and X = DEA, TEA.

column12: RADIO-CONTROLLED RESCUE VESSEL
column13: A radio-controlled rescue vessel, also with recreational applications. It enables the safeguarding of the life of the rescuer and an increased speed of transport, ensuring its operativity under conditions of a swell and during lengthy applications, enabling the correct restraint of the neck and cervical area. It comprises an arrow-shaped hydrodynamic structure with rounded edges and two overhanging propulsion modules coupled to the structure that extend toward the rear area; a radio-control system, piloting controls and a cervical immobiliser. The propulsion modules comprise a water intake and an electric motor attached to the structure and coupled to each water jet turbine, which propels the water toward a water outlet. The water turbines present a reversible rotational movement intended to turn over the structure, such that a self-righting manoeuvre of the vessel is enabled.

The core outside surface of the rod which is in contact with the coating (3), is previously treated with high precision sand blasting, providing a surface roughness of Ra 0,3 - 3 microns and finally it is treated with an external layer of a primer.

column12: METHOD OF SWITCHING PACKETS IN A TRANSMISSION MEDIUM COMPRISING MULTIPLE STATIONS WHICH ARE CONNECTED USING DIFFERENT LINKS
column13: The invention relates to a method of switching packets in a transmission medium comprising multiple stations which are connected using different links. The invention is characterised by the establishment of different links (9, 10, 11 and 12) in one or more media, whereby different communication characteristics exist in one medium, and by a link-associated frame-switching method. The invention can be used to transmit frames from one piece of equipment (2) that is connected to a transmission medium (1) to any other piece of equipment that is connected to said medium (4, 5, 6 and 7) even if there is no direct link therebetween, all of the aforementioned process being performed in level 2 of the OSI model.

column12: METHOD FOR CONTROLLING THE INTENSITY OF A LIGHT SIGNAL.
column13: The present invention relates to a method and configuration of an apparatus for controlling the intensity of a polarized monochromatic light signal. It aims to afford modulation in the intensity of a light signal taking advantage of a known phenomenon called Wood's anomalies. When a light signal interacts with the free electron cloud of material, and under certain conditions, the energy of the photons induces surface oscillations of the electron cloud. The coupling thereof allows said interaction between a light waves (electromagnetic wave) with a metallic material. Said effect is known as surface polariton plasmon (PPS) and is characteristic of the interaction of metallic nanostructures with light.
