column12: FIXING DEVICE FOR FIXING A WEAR OR PROTECTION ELEMENT ON A BUCKET OF AN EARTH MOVING MACHINE AND CORRESPONDING FIXING METHOD AND WEAR OR PROTECTION SYSTEM
column13: The present invention relates to a fixing device for fixing a wear or protection element (5) on a bucket of an earth moving machine, comprising: - a base (7) with a housing (15) with a front wall (17) and a rear wall (19) with a through hole (21), - a stop (9), with a lower part (25) housed in the housing (15), - a screw (11) going through the hole (21) and having an end thereof fixed to the stop (9), - partially compressed elastic means (13) arranged between the screw (11) and the hole (21). When the elastic means (13) are fully compressed, they have a length L0. In a mounted position, the stop (9) has a front face (27) opposite the front wall (17), where the distance between both is D1 and the distance between said head and said hole (21) has a value D2, and the condition D2 - L0 > D1 is met in the mounted position.

column12: Method for extracting ferulic acid and/or salts of same
column13: The invention relates to a method for extracting ferulic acid and/or salts of same, from a previously conditioned source rich in ferulic acid and salts of same, comprising: adsorbing the ferulic acid and/or the salts thereof in a column filled with synthetic resin; desorbing the ferulic acid and/or salts of same with an organic solvent; separating the liquor rich in ferulic acid into two fractions according to the water content thereof; concentrating the two fractions of liquor separately; mixing and concentrating said fractions; adding two volumes of water thereto; concentrating the mixture obtained; separating the insoluble impurities by sedimentation; pre-crystallising the ferulic acid and/or salts of same with a synthetic purification resin; crystallising the ferulic acid and/or the salts thereof; separating the ferulic acid and/or the salts thereof from the crystallisation mother liquor; and drying and sifting same.

column12: Method for extracting ferulic acid and/or its salts
column13: Method for extracting ferulic acid and/or its salts from a previously conditioned source rich in ferulic acid and its salts which comprises adsorbing the ferulic acid and/or its salts on a column packed with synthetic resin, desorbing the ferulic acid and/or its salts using an organic solvent, separating the liquor rich in ferulic acid into two fractions according to their water content, separately concentrating the two liquor fractions, mixing and concentrating said fractions, adding 2 volumes of water to them, concentrating the mixture obtained, separating out the insoluble impurities by sedimentation, pre-crystallizing the ferulic acid and/or its salts with a synthetic purification resin, crystallizing out the ferulic acid and/or its salts, separating the ferulic acid and/or its salts from the crystallization mother liquors and drying it and screening it.

When the elastic means (13) are fully compressed, the length thereof is L0. column12: METHOD FOR PURIFYING FERULIC ACID AND/OR SALTS THEREOF.
column13: The invention relates to methods for purifying ferulic acid and/or salts thereof, in solid-state and in solution, the methods comprising: dissolving the ferulic acid, using a selective organic solvent; recovering and separating the solution from the insoluble impurities using filters; recovering the organic solvent by evaporating the solution; mixing the concentrated extract of ferulic acid with water to pre-crystallise the water-soluble impurities; evaporating the mixture to eliminate the remaining organic solvent; concentrating the mixture without solvent in an evaporator; cooling the mixture to 40° C; leaving the concentrated mixture to stand for one hour to separate the water-insoluble impurities by means of sedimentation; reheating the mixture without impurities to 70° C; purifying the mixture by means of a synthetic resin; transferring the purified mixture to a crystallising receptacle to crystallise the ferulic acid; stirring the crystallisation mother liquor of the ferulic acid precipitate; and drying the ferulic acid.

column12: Method to purify ferulic acid and/or salts thereof
column13: Methods to purify ferulic acid and/or salts thereof, both in solid state as in solution, the methods include: dissolve the ferulic acid, with a selective organic solvent, recover and isolate the solution from the insoluble impurities with filters; recover the organic solvent evaporating the solution; mix the concentrated extract of ferulic acid with water to pre-crystallize the hydrosoluble impurities; evaporate the mixture to remove the remains of the organic solvent; concentrate the mixture free of solvent in an evaporator; cool the mixture down to 40° C.; let the concentrated mixture set for 1 h, to then isolate by sedimentation the water-insoluble impurities; re-heat the mixture free of impurities to 70° C.; purify the mixture through a synthetic resin, transfer the purified mixture to a crystallizing container to crystallize the ferulic acid; remove the mother liquor of crystallization of the precipitate of ferulic acid; dry the ferulic acid.

column12: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR FEEDING A PULVERIZED MATERIAL
column13: The present invention is referred to a method and an apparatus for feeding a pulverized material. The apparatus comprises fuel feeding means to supply pulverized fuel. Flexible means are coupled between the fuel feeding means and dosing means for the filling of the dosing means. The dosing means are closed and pressurized once that the dosing means have been filled. The pulverized material is discharged from the dosing means while controlling the pressurization during the discharge, in order to provide a continuous and constant discharge of the pulverized fuel. The apparatus includes means for detecting a minimum level or weight of pulverized fuel in the dosing means, and means for depressurizing the dosing means once that the minimum level of the pulverized fuel has been reached.

column12: Procedimiento para purificar ácido ferúlico y/o sales del mismo
column13: Métodos para purificar ácido ferúlico y/o saldes del mismo, tanto en estado sólido como en solución, dichos métodos comprenden: disolver el ácido ferúlico, con un solvente orgánico selectivo; recuperar y separar la solución de las impurezas Insolubles con filtros; recuperar el solvente orgánico evaporando la solución; mezclar con agua el extracto concentrado de ácido ferúlico para pre-cristalizar las impurezas hidrosolubles; evaporar la mezcla para eliminar el remanente de solvente orgánico; concentrar la mezcla sin solvente en un evaporador; enfriar la mezcla a 40° C; reposar la mezcla concentrada durante de 1 h, para separar por sedimentación las impurezas insolubles en agua; recalentar la mezcla libre de impurezas a 70° C; purificar la mezcla a través de una resina sintética; traspasar la mezcla purificada a un recipiente cristalizador para cristlizar el ácido ferúlico; remover las aguas madres de cristalización del precipitado de ácido ferúlico; secar el ácido ferúlico.

column12: BARRIER FOR DEPOSITION OF PARTICLES
column13: The invention relates to a barrier for the deposition of particles, intended to protect thoroughfares by facilitating snow or sand to collect on the windward zone of the barrier against which the wind is blowing, or on the rear zone thereof, without reaching the thoroughfare. The invention comprises a plurality of screens combining a geogrid and wire netting which are secured to posts anchored to the ground.

column12: Procedure for the design of the system of expulsion rods for a mold (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)
column13: Method for designing the ejection rod system for an injection mold comprising: creating a grid of flat nodes (nk) on a plane perpendicular to the movement of the mold cavity; determine the points (pij) of the piece (m ') corresponding to the intersection with a line (rt) perpendicular to the plane passing through each node (nk); calculate the thickness (eij) corresponding to each point (pij); identify the points where they exist (pijr) and where there are no (pijv) thickness changes; determine as points (pijexp) candidates those points (pijv) whose first surrounding surface does not contain any point (pijr); calculate the number of points (pijr) contained in a second surface surrounding each point (pijexp), where the second surface is greater than the first surface; and select as points (pijexpo) of expulsion those points (pijexp) whose number of points (pijr) contained in the second surface constitutes a local maximum. (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)

column12: CHEMICAL COMPOSITION FOR REDUCING THE ENERGY CONSUMTION DURING OIL REFINING.
column13: The present invention refers to a composition useful as a catalyst additive (molecular Tester) for improving the process for refining crude oil with a substantial power saving during refining, which allows refined products of high quality to be obtained such as gasoline, Fuel oil, diesel amongst others, with low Sulphur contents. The inventive composition includes, in a preferred manner, substances such as naphthalene, camphor, benzene, diesel, turpentine, aromine, toluene, hydrogen peroxide, methyl isobutyl ketone and coumarin, which provide a novel industrial use thereof.

column12: ACCIONADOR REMOTO PARA INTERRRUPTORES.
column13: Accionador remoto para interruptores. Sobre un zócalo o base (1) en el que se establece el clásico carrete o bobina (3) de accionamiento de un cilindro percutor (4) se establece también una palanca de desconexión (2), provista de un alojamiento (6) para el eje de transmisión de movimiento al interruptor (7), colaborando con dicha palanca (2) un muelle (8), que además de actuar como elemento recuperador elástico en el desplazamiento de la palanca, actúa como conector eléctrico para alimentación de la bobina (3), con la colaboración de un contacto fijo (5) establecido en la propia palanca de desconexión (2). Un segundo muelle (9) colabora con el muelle de contacto (8) en la retención de la palanca (2), evitando fallos de conexión. El zócalo (1) carece de tapa y cuenta en su embocadura con una serie de ganchos (11) para su acoplamiento al interruptor (7) que es el que actúa como tapa del accionador.

column12: METHOD FOR CONDITIONING WASTEWATERS RESULTING FROM THE NIXTAMAL, MASA AND TORTILLA INDUSTRY.
column13: The novel method for conditioning wastewaters resulting from the nixtamal, masa and tortilla industry, known as nejayote (corn nixtamalization effluent), is intended to remove suspended solids in order to obtain a product ideal for different purposes, the method including the following steps: (a) conditioning nejayote: (b) conditioning the hydrolase enzyme; (c) incubating the resulting mixture; (d) adding a flocculant; (e) separating the flocculated material of the clarified nejayote, completely removing any suspended material. The clarified product, nejayote free of suspended solids, is useful as raw material for processes or technologies intended to recover compounds with commercial or strategic value such as: phenolic compounds, carbohydrates, salts or water for being reused or discharged in an environmentally safe manner.

column12: Material that emits white light and tunes the color. (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)
column13: The present invention relates to a transparent nanostructured glass ceramic obtained from a thermal treatment of a volume precursor glass based on sio 2 and laf 3 doped with three earth ions rare (yb 3 -er 3 -tm 3 ) prepared by the sol-gel technique. The resulting nano-glass ceramic contains nano-sized crystals of laf 3 precipitated after the heat treatment and dispersed in a sio matrix 2 , leaving the rare earth ions incorporated in them. Using infrared excitation of 980 nm and through a luminescent up-conversion process (conversion of infrared to visible energy), white light is generated through the additive synthesis of the red, green and blue emissions. Controlling the excitation incident power, the tuning of the emitted color is achieved with applications in three-dimensional photonic devices: image generators, solid-state lasers, new three-dimensional optical memories and elements integrated in a chip. (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)

column13: Nanostructured transparent glass-ceramic material doped with three rare earth ions (eu3 yb3 -er3), prepared by the sol-gel technique, in which two nanocrystalline phases (sno2 and laf3) scattered in a sio matrix2 coexist simultaneously, leaving the rare earth ions incorporated in these nanocrystals. column12: DAISY ANTENNA FOR THE EMISSION AND RECEPTION OF LINEARLY AND CIRCULARLY POLARIZED ELECTROMAGNETIC WAVES
column13: The invention relates to an antenna formed by the coplanar grouping of an even number of radiating wires which together form a shape similar to the petal distribution of a daisy (see figure 1). The radiating wires or petals of the daisy antenna work by resonance and have a flat geometry, as well as all having the same structure and being in the same plane, referred to as the antenna plane. The only difference between the petals is in the relative distribution of the current flow directions, which determines the form of the radiation diagram and characterizes the behavior of the antenna, in order to allow users a wide range of applications.

column12: Sistema para desinfección de interiores mediante radiación ultravioleta UV-C Led
column13: 1. Sistema para desinfección de interiores mediante radiación ultravioleta UV-C Led, caracterizado por que comprende un dispositivo (10) de desinfección y un medio externo de control (20) de dicho dispositivo (10) de desinfección, donde el dispositivo (10) de desinfección comprende: - un cuerpo (11) que tiene una forma esencialmente prismática que, en su posición natural de uso, está orientada en vertical, dotado de una pluralidad de LEDs (12) emisores de radiación ultravioleta en el rango 200- 280 nm, estando los LEDs (12) dispuestos sobre sus caras y orientados hacia fuera configurados para emitir en direcciones que abarcan esencialmente todo el espacio alrededor del cuerpo (11); - al menos un detector de movimiento (13) dispuesto sobre el cuerpo (11) para detectar la presencia de personas en los alrededores; - un medio de comunicación inalámbrica (14) configurado para permitir la comunicación entre el dispositivo (10) y el medio externo de control (20); - un medio de procesamiento (15) conectado a los LEDs (12), al detector de movimiento (13), y al medio de comunicación inalámbrica (14), estando el medio de procesamiento (15) configurado para controlar el funcionamiento del dispositivo (10) en función de órdenes recibidas del medio externo de control (20) a través del medio de comunicación inalámbrica (14), y para apagar los LEDs (12) cuando el detector de movimiento (13) detecta personas alrededor del dispositivo (10); - un medio de alimentación (16) conectado al medio de procesamiento (15) para proporcionar energía eléctrica al dispositivo (10); - una base (17) dotada de ruedas (171) que comprende una superficie superior (172) configurada para el acoplamiento del cuerpo (11); caracterizada por que la base (17) comprende una cavidad interior configurada para alojar el cuerpo (11) en su interior, con el propósito de facilitar su transporte hacia y desde la instalación a desinfectar. 2. Sistema para la desinfección de interiores de acuerdo con la reivindicación anterior, donde la base (17) comprende una tapa (173) desacoplable para abrir y cerrar el acceso a la cavidad, así como un asa (174) de agarre manual dispuesta en una superficie lateral. 3. Sistema para la desinfección de interiores de acuerdo con cualquiera de las reivindicaciones anteriores, donde el medio de procesamiento (15) se elige de entre un microprocesador, un microcontrolador, un DSP, un ASIC y una FPGA. 4. Sistema para la desinfección de interiores de acuerdo con cualquiera de las reivindicaciones anteriores, donde el medio de comunicación inalámbrica (14) es un medio Bluetooth de baja energía. 5. Sistema para la desinfección de interiores de acuerdo con cualquiera de las reivindicaciones anteriores, donde el medio de alimentación (16) comprende una conexión a una red eléctrica externa. 6. Sistema para la desinfección de interiores de acuerdo con cualquiera de las reivindicaciones anteriores, donde el medio de alimentación (16) comprende una o varias baterías recargables. 7. Sistema para la desinfección de interiores de acuerdo con cualquiera de las reivindicaciones anteriores, donde el medio externo de control (20) se elige de entre un mando a distancia específico, un teléfono móvil inteligente, un reloj inteligente, una tablet, y un ordenador. 8. Sistema para la desinfección de interiores de acuerdo con cualquiera de las reivindicaciones anteriores, donde el dispositivo (10) además comprende un medio de alarma visual y/o acústico que se activa cuando los LEDs están encendidos. 9. Sistema para la desinfección de interiores de acuerdo con la reivindicación 8, donde el medio de alarma se activa entre 5 y 30 segundos antes del encendido de los LEDs para dar tiempo a un usuario a salir de la estancia. 10. Sistema para la desinfección de interiores de acuerdo con cualquiera de las reivindicaciones anteriores, donde el cuerpo (11) del dispositivo (10) tiene forma de prisma hexagonal. 11. Sistema para la desinfección de interiores de acuerdo con cualquiera de las reivindicaciones anteriores, donde la altura del cuerpo (11) del dispositivo (10) es de entre 60 cm y 80 cm. 12. Sistema para la desinfección de interiores de acuerdo con cualquiera de las reivindicaciones anteriores, donde la altura de la base (17) es de entre 70 cm y 90 cm.

column12: LOCALIZATION OF PLANAR OBJECTS IN IMAGES BEARING REPETITIVE PATTERNS

column12: MAQUINA DE TIRO PARA LA DESCARGA Y COLOCACION DE VIAS DE FERROCARRIL
column13: Maquina de tiro para la descarga y colocacion de vias ferroviarias (1) que consta de una cabina (9) y dos orugas (6) asi como una corredera de tiro (11) que comprende un tubo (15) con elementos de amarre accionado por un cilindro hidraulico (12) con vastago conectado al tubo (15), donde tres apoyos metalicos desmontables con elementos de teflon facilitan el deslizamiento, unidos elementos de acero sobre los que actuan unos brazos articulados que producen el movimiento vertical por la accion de otro cilindro hidraulico (13) manteniendo siempre la direccion de tiro.

column12: 스타디움을 다기능 기반시설들로 가역적으로 변환하는 시스템
column13: 피트(pit)(6)에서 경기장(play field)을 제거 및 저장함으로써 스타디움(stadium)을 다기능 기반시설로 가역적으로 변환하기 위한 시스템이 개시된다. 상기 경기장은: 상기 피트(6)의 종 방향으로 경기장의 길이와 동일한 길이를 가지며, 자체-지지형이며, 필드의 층(layer)들, 배수 시스템 및 잔디를 포함하는, 트레이들(1)의 세트; 경기장 상의 위치에서 피트(6)로 각 트레이(1)를 승강 및 이동시키기 위한 운송 시스템; 상기 피트(6) 위로부터 각 트레이(1)의 진입을 위해, 피트(6) 상에 펼쳐질 수 있는 접개들이 방식의 격자 대들보들(retractable lattice girders)(5)의 조립체; 각 트레이를 최종 저장 위치로 또는 경기장 상으로 이동시키도록 구성된, 피트(6) 내의 승강기 시스템(8); 및 각각의 트레이를 고정되고 안정적인 위치에 저장하기 위한 저장 시스템(7)을 포함한다.

column12: Manufacture of polycarbonates
column13: A method of producing a polycarbonate is provided. In an embodiment of the present invention the method includes the steps of: (i) introducing to a melt polymerization reactor system a reaction mixture having a first dihydroxy compound and an acid stabilizer, a carbonate source, and a polymerization catalyst system containing K 2 HPO 4 ; and (ii) allowing the reaction mixture to polymerize thereby forming polycarbonate.

column12: Pulling machine for unloading and laying railway tracks
column13: The invention relates to a pulling machine for unloading and laying railway tracks (1), which moves by means of caterpillar tracks (6) running next to the sleepers (3) arranged on the setting bed (2), with the rail (5) on the provisional supports (4) arranged on the sleepers (3). The machine comprises a cabin (9) and two caterpillar tracks (6) and includes, in its rear tractor part, a pulling slide (11) that comprises a tube (15) with fastening elements, said tube sliding horizontally, actuated by a hydraulic cylinder (12) comprising a piston connected to the tube (15), via three dismountable metal supports provided with teflon elements for facilitating the sliding, said metal supports being connected to steel elements acted upon by articulated arms generating the vertical movement by means of the action of another hydraulic cylinder (13), always maintaining the pulling direction. The machine pulls the rails without needing an auxiliary track, maintaining the position of the track-laying train.

column12: ETHERNET RECORDING AND COMMUNICATION DEVICE FOR CONDITIONING MODULES AND FOR THE ACQUISITION OF DIFFERENT SIGNALS.
column13: The present disclosure is related to an Ethernet recording and communication device for conditioning modules and for the acquisition of different signals. The device comprises a micro controller, a real-time clock, a micro SD memory card, a web page memory device, a device for a MAC address, an Ethernet communication port, a programming port, a power supply, a real-time clock backup battery, a connection area for digital signals or conditioning modules and for the acquisition of different signals. This device is configurable depending on the conditioning and signal acquisition modules which are intended to be used. Also, permanent captures can be programmed and monitored by another program establishing a network with several Ethernet communications and recording devices.

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR DEPOSITING COATINGS ON CYLINDROID SURFACES OF EXTRUDED GEOMETRY
column13: Method and system for depositing coatings on cylindroid surfaces of extruded geometry. The invention comprises a vessel of cylindroid geometry with a central hole, where the surface to be coated is located, and which moves vertically along said surface, depositing the coating. The surfaces are suspended vertically by means of a supporting member that moves along a carousel. The vessel is positioned on a lower clamp that grips the workpiece, which remains fixed during the coating process. The vessel undergoes an ascending movement over the uncoated workpiece, is there filled with liquid and descends at a speed such that the coating film has the desired thickness. Upon reaching the clamp, the latter releases the workpiece, which advances on the carousel as far as an oven where the coating is sintered, dried or adhered to the workpiece.

column12: Provisional support for the guided download and the laying of railway tracks (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)
column13: Provisional support for the guided download and placement of railway tracks whose purpose is the placement of railroad tracks on the sleepers by longitudinal movement of the rails from a lane train stopped at the beginning of the section of track to be mounted, without the need for an auxiliary way said support is constituted by a frame (1), intended to be fixed manually on a single crossbar. On its upper face there are three conveyor balls (3) with fixing clips (4), which guarantee their position, framed by two vertical guide rollers (2) screwed to prevent the turn of the rail (5), keep it inside the support and they allow to trace the curves. Said provisional supports are placed in pairs on the same sleeper. The support can be handled by a single operator in the workplace because of its low weight, facilitating its handling manually. column12: SYSTEM FOR THE ANALYSIS OF WASTEWATER OR ENVIRONMENTAL WATER FOR THE DETECTION OF VIRUSES, BACTERIA OR EUKARYOTIC MICROORGANISMS
column13: The present invention relates to a system comprising sample extraction and concentration equipment (3), intended to extract an amount of water through a sanitation manifold and concentrate said amount until a sample is obtained to carry out the qRT-PCR test, and the results of which are sent to a thermocycling equipment (7) which receives the processed water samples in automatic pipetting pieces of equipment (5, 6) and improves the processing of said water samples by carrying out cycles at different temperatures, passing finally to a control system that analyses them and issues alerts when the extracted data shows a risk of outbreak of any virus, bacterium or eukaryotic microorganism that can be located by detecting its nucleic acid or remotely and in real time.

column12: Conveyer positioning system and method
column13: A material-conveying system comprising a conveyor for conveying material to a bin and a conveyor positioning system associated with the conveyor. The conveyor positioning system comprises a processor for positioning the conveyor relative to the bin. The conveyor comprises a spout and the bin comprises an opening. The conveyor positioning system positions the spout of the conveyor over the opening of the bin. The conveyor positioning system in one implementation comprises a Global Navigation Satellite System-Real Time Kinematic (GNSS-RTK) positioning system that includes a fixed base station and a GNSS receiver on the conveyor.

column12: SYSTEM FOR REVERSIBLY CONVERTING STADIUMS INTO MULTIFUNCTIONAL INFRASTRUCTURE
column13: A system for reversibly converting stadiums into multifunctional infrastructure by removing the pitch and storing it in a pit ( 6 ), the pitch having a set of trays ( 1 ) having a total length equal to the pitch in a longitudinal direction of the pit, which are moveable, self-supporting and have layers of soil, irrigation and turf; a set of transport trolleys ( 2 ) for lifting and moving each tray ( 1 ) from its position on the pitch to the pit ( 6 ); a set of retractable trellises ( 5 ) that can be unfolded on the pit ( 6 ), for the entry of each tray ( 1 ) from above the pit; an elevator system ( 8 ) inside the pit ( 6 ) to move each tray to its final position, in storage, or on the pitch; and a storage system ( 7 ) for storing each tray in a fixed and stable position.

column13: Provisional support for unloading and placing railway tracks, constituted from a frame (1), intended to be fixed manually, by means of staples to a single crossbeam, frame on whose top side are screwed two commercial supports (4) and the necessary supplements ( 5), a horizontal axis and two bearings to allow the rotation of a wheel with steel center and polyurethane tread (3). These elements are framed by two rollers (2) with a vertical axis screwed on the upper face of the frame, which act as guides for the rail, ensuring that the track follows the required route. Provisional supports for unloading and laying railway tracks are placed in pairs on separate sleepers at a distance such that they can withstand the loads exerted by the rail. The support can be easily handled by a single operator thanks to its weight less than 12 kg. (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)

column12: FRICCIOMETRO COMPARADOR MANUAL CON MASAS INTERCAMBIABLES PARA PROBAR SUSTRATOS DIFERENTES EN SIMULTANEO
column13: Las pruebas de friccion son relevantes para determinar la resistencia de los elementos y elegir el material mas acorde segun los requerimientos. Los fricciometros manuales solo permiten evaluar un elemento a la vez y no permite regular la presion de friccion ni la altura de la herramienta de friccion. En busca de solucionar la problematica se presenta un fricciometro comparador manual con masas intercambiables para probar sustratos diferentes en simultaneo que cuenta con planchas de movimiento longitudinal en los cuales se acoplan copas roscadas que sujetan la herramienta de friccion. La copa roscada puede variar su altura de forma independiente por cada plancha gracias a unos reguladores de altura y tambien se puede modificar la presion de friccion colocando pesas en la cara superior del lado de la plancha de movimiento donde se ubica la copa roscada. Para generar el movimiento se cuenta con un sistema de manivela conectado a un brazo transformador que modifica el movimiento circular en movimiento lineal.

column12: Pulling machine for unloading and laying railway tracks
column13: The invention relates to a pulling machine for unloading and laying railway tracks (1), which moves by means of caterpillar tracks (6) running next to the sleepers (3) arranged on the setting bed (2), with the rail (5) on the provisional supports (4) arranged on the sleepers (3). The machine comprises a cabin (9) and two caterpillar tracks (6) and includes, in its rear tractor part, a pulling slide (11) that comprises a tube (15) with fastening elements, said tube sliding horizontally, actuated by a hydraulic cylinder (12) comprising a piston connected to the tube (15), via three dismountable metal supports provided with teflon elements for facilitating the sliding, said metal supports being connected to steel elements acted upon by articulated arms generating the vertical movement by means of the action of another hydraulic cylinder (13), always maintaining the pulling direction. The machine pulls the rails without needing an auxiliary track, maintaining the position of the track-laying train.

column12: METHOD FOR MUNICIPAL SOLID WASTE RECLAMATION
column13: The present invention relates to a method for municipal solid waste (MSW) reclamation in a continuous or discontinuous process, first for converting said waste into organic biomass and subsequently extracting and recovering as many of the chemical compounds contained in said biomass as possible, such as triglycerides, sugars and proteins. Therefore, the invention is suitable for use in the field of recycling, transforming solid waste into reusable solids and biofuels.

column12: Low profile triaxial antenna
column13: The present invention relates to a low profile triaxial antenna comprising a cross-shaped electromagnetic core (11) provided with four arms finished with front ends 13, an X-axis winding (DX) wound around two arms; a Y-axis winding (DY) wound around two arms; and a Z-axis winding (DZ) wound around a Z-axis, said Z-axis winding (DZ) surrounding the electromagnetic core and at least partially facing said front ends (13); wherein four electromagnetic core portions (12) are each at least partially arranged in a quadrant space defined between two adjacent arms and a portion of Z-axis winding (DZ) running between the front ends (13) thereof, the assembly of the cross-shaped electromagnetic core (11) and the four electromagnetic core portions (12) generating a composite electromagnetic core (10).

column12: 3 LOW PROFILE TRIAXIAL ANTENNA
column13: The present invention relates to a low profile three-axis antenna. The low profile three-axis antenna comprises: a cross-shaped electromagnetic core (11) having four arms closed with front end parts (13), and an X-axis winding (DX) wound around two arms; a Y-axis winding (DY) wound around the two arms; and a Z-axis winding (DZ) wound around a Z-axis, wherein The Z-axis winding (DZ) surrounds the electromagnetic core and at least partially faces the front end parts (13), each of four electromagnetic core parts (12) is at least partially disposed in a quadrant space defined between parts of the Z-axis winding (DZ) crossing between two adjacent arms and front end parts (13), and the cross-shaped electromagnetic core (11) and an assembly of four electromagnetic core parts (12) create a composite electromagnetic core (10).

column12: FIXING MEANS FOR FIXING A WEAR ELEMENT ON THE FRONT EDGE OF A SUPPORT
column13: The present invention relates to fixing means for fixing a wear element (2) on a support (1), where the wear element (2) comprises two arms (7) wrapping around the front edge (11) of the support. The fixing means comprise: [a] a C-shaped body (3), [b] a wedge (4), [c] a screw (5) with a shank, with a first segment (15) having a smaller diameter than the head (14), a second segment (16) having a larger diameter than the first segment (15), and a threaded segment (17), and [d] a nut (6). The shank of the screw is housed between the wedge (4) and the body (3). The C-shaped body (3) has a C-shaped projection (18) suitable for housing the first segment (15) of the screw (5). The projection (18) has substantially the same height as the first segment (15). Neither the head (14) nor the second segment (16) can go through the projection (18). The wedge (4) has a first projection (19) and a second projection (20). Both projections (19, 20) have through holes (21, 22) suitable for allowing the passage of the threaded segment (17) and suitable for blocking the passage of the nut (6), and the distance between both projection (19, 20) is greater than the height of the nut (6).

column12: LOW PROFILE TRIAXIAL ANTENNA
column13: To provide a low profile triaxial antenna capable of being incorporated in a small device.SOLUTION: A low profile triaxial antenna includes a cross-shaped electromagnetic core 11 provided with four arms finished with front ends 13. An X-axis winding DX is wound around two arms; a Y-axis winding DY is wound around two arms; and a Z-axis winding DZ is wound around a Z-axis, the Z-axis winding DZ surrounding the electromagnetic core and at least partially facing the front ends. Four electromagnetic core portions 12 are each at least partially arranged in a quadrant space defined between two adjacent arms and a portion of Z-axis winding running between the front ends thereof. The cross-shaped electromagnetic core and the four electromagnetic core portions are assembled to constitute a composite electromagnetic core 10.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

column12: METHOD OF ESTABLISHING LINKS BETWEEN STATIONS WHICH ARE CONNECTED TO A TELECOMMUNICATION NETWORK
column13: It is characterized by the assignment of a local transmission identifier to each link and a decoding of the information based on the local identifier of the assigned link and on the unequivocal identifier sent by the transmitter in its transmission period. It permits multiple links to be established between stations of a telecommunications network, in a way that is unicast (towards a single recipient) or multicast (towards multiple recipients) independently of the type of network or system used in the communication. It is applicable to telecommunication systems which apply an addressing system for the connection of stations and displays the advantages of minimizing the data overload due to the headers, facilitating the establishment of connections between two or more stations and making the addressing of the packets within the same network more flexible.

column12: Hotplate device
column13: Um eine Bauteilersparnis zu erreichen, wird eine Kochfeldvorrichtung (12), insbesondere eine Induktionskochfeldvorrichtung, mit zumindest einer ersten, durch ein Heizelement definierte, Kochzone (22, 24, 26, 28), eine erste Elektrode (32, 34, 36, 38), die ihre Kapazität in Abhängigkeit von einer Gargeschirrbelegung der ersten Kochzone (22, 24, 26, 28) signifikant ändert, und zumindest einer berührungsempfindlichen Bedieneinheit (40), wobei die berührungsempfindlichen Bedieneinheit (40) die Elektrodeneigenschaften der ersten Elektrode (32, 34, 36, 38) in zumindest einem Betriebsmodus auswertet, vorgeschlagen.

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR DEPOSITING COATINGS ON CYLINDROID SURFACES OF EXTRUDED GEOMETRY
column13: Method and system for depositing coatings on cylindroid surfaces of extruded geometry. In said system, the cylindroid surfaces (1) are vertically suspended by a support (14) moved by a carousel (11). A vessel (3) is arranged on a lower clamp (15) that grips the cylindroid surface (1) which thereby remains fixed. The empty vessel (3) climbs up the uncoated cylindroid surface (1), and is filled with liquid (2) in its upper part. The vessel (3) has cylindroid dimensions, with a central opening, wherein it comes into contact with the cylindroid (1) to be coated. Once full, it moves vertically down said cylindroid surface (1). Once it reaches the lower clamp (15), said lower clamp releases the cylindroid surface (1) which advances on the carousel (11) until it reaches an oven (12) where the coating is sintered.

column12: FIXING MEANS FOR FIXING A WEAR ELEMENT ON THE FRONT EDGE OF A SUPPORT
column13: The present invention relates to fixing means for fixing a wear element on a support, where the wear element comprises two arms wrapping around the front edge of the support. The fixing means comprise: [a] a C-shaped body, [b] a wedge, [c] a screw with a shank, with a first segment having a smaller diameter than the head, a second segment having a larger diameter than the first segment, and a threaded segment, and [d] a nut. The shank of the screw is housed between the wedge and the body. The C-shaped body has a C-shaped projection suitable for housing the first segment of the screw. The projection has substantially the same height as the first segment. Neither the head nor the second segment can go through the projection. The wedge has a first projection and a second projection. Both projections have through holes suitable for allowing the passage of the threaded segment and suitable for blocking the passage of the nut, and the distance between both projection is greater than the height of the nut.

column12: Medios de fijación de un elemento de desgaste sobre el borde anterior de un soporte
column13: Medios de fijación de un elemento de desgaste (2) sobre el borde anterior (11) de un soporte (1), donde dicho elemento de desgaste (2) comprende dos brazos (7) que se extienden hacia atrás enfrentados entre sí, dejando entre ambos un espacio para alojar dicho borde anterior (11), definiendo así una posición montada, donde dichos brazos (7) presentan unos primeros orificios (8) pasantes encarados entre sí y dicho soporte (1) presenta un segundo orificio (12) pasante que, en dicha posición montada, está intercalado entre dichos primeros orificios (8) pasantes, donde dichos medios de fijación comprenden: [a] un cuerpo (3) con forma de C, [b] una cuña (4), donde, en dicha posición montada, dicho cuerpo (3) y dicha cuña (4) están alojados en dichos orificios (8, 12), y [c] un tornillo (5) que tiene una cabeza (14) y un vástago, con un primer tramo (15) bajo dicha cabeza (14), de diámetro menor que dicha cabeza (14), un segundo tramo (16) a continuación de dicho primer tramo (15), de diámetro mayor que dicho primer tramo (15), y un tramo roscado (17) a continuación de dicho segundo tramo (16), donde dicho primer tramo (15) tiene una longitud, en sentido axial, de un valor predeterminado, donde, en dicha posición montada, entre dicha cuña (4) y dicho cuerpo (3) queda un espacio hueco (13) apto para alojar el vástago de dicho tornillo, dicho espacio hueco (13) definiendo un eje de vástago coincidente con el eje de dicho vástago, caracterizados por que comprenden, adicionalmente [d] una tuerca (6) roscada sobre dicho tramo roscado (17), y por que: - dicho cuerpo (3) con forma de C tiene un saliente (18) en forma de C que se extiende hacia el interior de dicho espacio hueco (13) apto para alojar dicho primer tramo (15) de dicho tornillo (5), donde la longitud de dicho saliente (18), en sentido axial, es igual o inferior a dicho valor predeterminado, y donde ni dicha cabeza (14) ni dicho segundo tramo (16) son aptos para desplazarse, en sentido axial, a través de dicho saliente (18), - dicha cuña (4) tiene un primer saliente (19) y un segundo saliente (20) que se extienden hacia el interior de dicho espacio hueco (13), donde dicho primer saliente (19) tiene un orificio pasante (21) apto para permitir el paso de dicho tramo roscado (17) y apto para bloquear el paso de dicha tuerca (6), y donde dicho segundo saliente (20) tiene un orificio pasante (22) apto para permitir el paso de dicho tramo roscado (17) y apto para bloquear el paso de dicha tuerca (6), donde dicha tuerca (6) se ubica entre dicho primer saliente (19) y dicho segundo saliente (20) en dicha posición ensamblada, y donde la distancia entre dicho primer saliente (19) y dicho segundo saliente (20) en la dirección axial es mayor que la altura de dicha tuerca (6) en la dirección axial.

column12: Increase of trans-resveratrol endogenous content in grapes by resonant radiation with laser or other optical sources (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)
column13: Increase of endogenous trans-resveratrol content in grapes by resonant radiation with lasers or other optical sources. The wavelength of irradiation is the maximum absorption for trans-resveratrol so that the effect of ultraviolet (uv) irradiation on the skin of the grape is maximized, achieving a greater induction of the compound. The trans-resveratrol is a molecule produced naturally by the vine and other plants as a defense mechanism against fungal infections, various types of stress, chemicals, etc. The application of the treatment, characterized in that the grapes are subjected for short periods of time (less than 45 minutes) to laser radiation or other optical sources, of 302.1 nm, resonant wavelength of trans-resveratrol, allows to increase importantly, the endogenous trans-resveratrol content in the grape, with the consequent improvement of its natural resistance to putrefaction and aging during storage and, on the other hand, the improvement of its nutritional and health-promoting properties. (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)

column12: meio de fixação para fixar um elemento de desgaste na borda frontal de um suporte
column13: a presente invenção refere-se ao meio de fixação para fixar um elemento de desgaste (2) em um suporte (1), onde o elemento de desgaste (2) compreende dois braços (7) envolvendo a borda frontal (11) do suporte. o meio de fixação compreende: [a] um corpo em formato de c (3), [b] uma cunha (4), [c] um parafuso (5) com uma haste, com um primeiro segmento (15) tendo um diâmetro menor do que a cabeça (14), um segundo segmento (16) tendo um diâmetro maior do que o primeiro segmento (15), e um segmento rosqueado (17), e [d] uma porca (6). a haste do parafuso é alojada entre a cunha (4) e o corpo (3). o corpo em formato de c (3) tem uma projeção em formato de c (18) adequada para alojar o primeiro segmento (15) do parafuso (5). a projeção (18) tem substancialmente a mesma altura que o primeiro segmento (15). nem a cabeça (14) nem o segundo segmento (16) podem passar através da projeção (18). a cunha (4) tem uma primeira projeção (19) e uma segunda projeção (20). ambas as projeções (19, 20) têm orifícios completos (21, 22) adequados para permitir a passagem do segmento rosqueado (17) e adequados para bloquear a passagem da porca (6), e a distância entre ambas as projeções (19, 20) é maior do que a altura da porca (6).

column12: Fixing means for fixing a wear element on the front edge of a support
column13: A wear element configured to be fixed on a support, where the wear element comprises two arms wrapping around the front edge of the support. The wear element being fixed with [a] a C-shaped body, [b] a wedge, [c] a screw with a shank, with a first segment having a smaller diameter than the head, a second segment having a larger diameter than the first segment, and a threaded segment, and [d] a nut. The shank of the screw is housed between the wedge and the body. The C-shaped body has a C-shaped projection suitable for housing the first segment of the screw. The projection has substantially the same height as the first segment. Neither the head nor the second segment can go through the projection. The wedge has a first projection and a second projection. Both projections have through holes suitable for allowing the passage of the threaded segment and suitable for blocking the passage of the nut, and the distance between both projection is greater than the height of the nut.

column12: METHOD OF ESTABLISHING LINKS BETWEEN STATIONS WHICH ARE CONNECTED TO A TELECOMMUNICATION NETWORK
column13: The invention relates to a method of establishing links between stations which are connected to a telecommunication network. The invention is characterised in that it consists in assigning a local transmission identifier to each link and decoding the information based on the local identifier of the assigned link and the unequivocal identifier sent to the transmitter during the transmission period thereof. The invention can be used to establish multiple links between stations in a telecommunication network in a unicast (to a single receiver) or multicast (to multiple receivers) manner regardless of the type of network or system used in the communication. The invention is suitable for telecommunication systems which employ an addressing system for the connection of stations. Moreover, the invention is advantageous in that it: minimises the data overload owing to the headends, facilitates the establishment of connections between two or more stations, and makes flexible the addressing of packets within the same network.

column12: FASTENER FOR ATTACHMENT OF WEARING ELEMENT ON SUPPORT FRONT EDGE
column13: FIELD: machine building.SUBSTANCE: invention relates to fasteners for fastening a wearing element on a front edge of a support. Fastener comprises: C-shaped body, a wedge and a screw with a shank containing a first part with a diameter less than the diameter of the head; the second part, diameter of which is greater than the diameter of the first part, a threaded part, and a nut. Screw shank is installed between the wedge and the housing. C-shaped body comprises a C-shaped projection adapted to accommodate the first part of the screw. Height of the projection is equal to the height of the first part. Neither the head nor the second part can pass through the projection. Wedge comprises first ledge and second ledge. Both protrusions have through holes, allowing the threaded part to pass through them and not allowing the nut to pass through them, note here that distance between first ledge and second ledge in axial direction is greater than nut height in axial direction.EFFECT: protection of screw thread from impact loads acting on wedge.5 cl, 10 dwg

column12: procedimento para estabelecimento de conexões entre estações conectadas a uma rede de telecomunicação
column13: "PROCEDIMENTO PARA ESTABELECIMENTO DE CONEXõES ENTRE ESTAçõES CONECTADAS A UMA REDE DE TELECOMUNICAçãO". A presente invenção é caracterizada pela atribuição de um identificador local de transmissão para cada conexão e um decodificador da informação com base no identificador local da conexão atribuída e no identificador inequívoco enviado pelo transmissor no seu período de transmissão. Isso permite a que múltiplas conexões sejam estabelecidas entre estações de uma rede de telecomunicações, em um modo que seja de difusão única (unicast) (na direção de um único recebedor) ou de múltipla difusão (multicast) (na direção de múltiplos recebedores) , independentemente do tipo de rede ou sistema usados na comunicação. O procedimento é aplicável a sistemas de telecomunicação que aplicam um sistema de endereçamento para a conexão de estações e exibe as vantagens de minimizar os dados sobrecarregados devido aos cabeçalhos, facilitando o estabelecimento de conexões entre duas ou mais estações e tornando o endereçamento dos pacotes dentro da mesma rede mais flexível.

column12: METHOD FOR PRODUCING A SOL-GEL COATING ON SURFACES WITH VITREOUS CERAMIC ENAMELS AND COATING THUS PRODUCED
column13: The invention relates to a method, characterized in that it includes at least one sol-gel layer having a maximum thickness of 800 nm, wherein said sol-gel layer includes crystalline laminar nanoparticles, and wherein each sol-gel layer is produced from a silicon alkoxide dilution; including: preparing a dispersion that includes at least one type of spherical, fibrillar or laminar particle having a crystalline laminar structure, wherein at least one of the dimensions, thickness or diameter, of said particles is less than 400 nm; adding the dispersion prepared to the dilution; depositing the suspension on said substrate; thermally treating the substrate; and in the case of multiple layers, optionally adding high dimensionality particles and repeating the steps such that the thermal treatment of the last layer or outer layer is equal or greater to that of the preceding layer. The invention likewise relates to the sol-gel coating thus produced. The invention solves the problem of contraction in the densification of very thick sol-gel coatings, and also provides a method for producing a sol-gel coating useful for ceramic surfaces that are large and/or complex in shape.

column12: A BURNER FOR BURNING A PULVERIZED FUEL FOR USE IN A GLASS MELTING FURNACE
column13: The invention relates to a method and system for feeding and burning a pulverized fuel such as oil coke in a glass foundry oven, which comprises a glass foundry area and a plurality of burners associated with a pair of sealed regenerative chambers placed next to one another, which act as heat exchangers. The burners are arranged in a series of ports associated with the glass foundry area of the oven. The system includes means for feeding the pulverized fuel supplied by each oil burner to melt the raw material in order to produce glass. The combustion gas emissions produced by the combustion process of the fuel in the oven are controlled with the purpose of keeping combustion gases clean and reducing emissions or impurities generated by the fuel such as SOx, NOx and particles. The regenerative chambers are manufactured with refractory materials selected from amongst the group consisting of magnesium, alumina-silica-zirconia or magnesia and zirconia- silicate to counteract the abrasive and erosive effects produced by the combustion process of the fuel in the glass foundry chamber. A burner for supplying oil coke is also provided, said burner including means for simultaneously mixing a primary air and an air-pulverized fuel mixture to burn the pulverized fuel.

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR DEPOSITING COATINGS ON CYLINDROID SURFACES OF EXTRUDED GEOMETRY
column13: Method and system for depositing coatings on cylindroid surfaces of extruded geometry. The invention comprises a vessel of cylindroid geometry with a central hole, where the surface to be coated is located, and which moves vertically along said surface, depositing the coating. The surfaces are suspended vertically by means of a supporting member that moves along a carousel. The vessel is positioned on a lower clamp that grips the workpiece, which remains fixed during the coating process. The vessel undergoes an ascending movement over the uncoated workpiece, is there filled with liquid and descends at a speed such that the coating film has the desired thickness. Upon reaching the clamp, the latter releases the workpiece, which advances on the carousel as far as an oven where the coating is sintered, dried or adhered to the workpiece.

column12: Medios de fijación de un elemento de desgaste sobre el borde anterior de un soporte.
column13: MEDIOS DE FIJACIÓN DE UN ELEMENTO DE DESGASTE (2) SOBRE UN SOPORTE (1), DONDE EL ELEMENTO DE DESGASTE (2) COMPRENDE DOS BRAZOS (7) QUE ENVUELVEN EL BORDE ANTERIOR (11) DEL SOPORTE. LOS MEDIOS DE FIJACIÓN COMPRENDEN: [A] UN CUERPO (3) CON FORMA DE C, [B] UNA CUÑA (4), [C] UN TORNILLO (5) CON UN VÁSTAGO CON UN PRIMER TRAMO (15) DE DIÁMETRO MENOR QUE LA CABEZA (14), UN SEGUNDO TRAMO (16) DE DIÁMETRO MAYOR QUE EL PRIMER TRAMO (15), Y UN TRAMO ROSCADO (17), Y [D] UNA TUERCA (6). EL VÁSTAGO DEL TORNILLO SE ALOJA ENTRE LA CUÑA (4) Y EL CUERPO (3). EL CUERPO (3) CON FORMA DE C TIENE UN SALIENTE (18) EN FORMA DE C APTO PARA ALOJAR EL PRIMER TRAMO (15) DEL TORNILLO (5). EL SALIENTE (18) TIENE SUBSTANCIALMENTE LA MISMA ALTURA QUE EL PRIMER TRAMO (15). NI LA CABEZA (14) NI EL SEGUNDO TRAMO (16) PUEDEN PASAR A TRAVÉS DEL SALIENTE (18). LA CUÑA (4) TIENE UN PRIMER SALIENTE (19) Y UN SEGUNDO SALIENTE (20). AMBOS SALIENTES (19, 20) TIENEN UNOS ORIFICIOS PASANTES (21, 22) APTOS PARA PERMITIR EL PASO DEL TRAMO ROSCADO (17) Y APTOS PARA BLOQUEAR EL PASO DE LA TUERCA (6), Y LA DISTANCIA ENTRE AMBOS SALIENTES (19, 20) ES MAYOR QUE LA ALTURA DE LA TUERCA (6).

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR FEEDING AND BURNING A PULVERIZED FUEL IN A GLASS FOUNDRY OVEN AND BURNER TO BE USED THEREWITH
column13: A találmány tárgya eljárás és berendezés kereskedelmi üvegtermékgyártására üvegolvasztó kemencében, por alakú tüzelőanyag minthőenergia-forrás elégetésével. Az eljárás során kötött karbont,valamint ként, nitrogént, vanádiumot, vasat és nikkelt vagy ezekkeverékét szennyezőanyagként tartalmazó por alakú tüzelőanyag éslevegő vagy gáz pontosan meghatározott tömegű keverékénekpneumatikusan, túlnyomásos áramlásban történő szállítását szigorúanszabályozó és ellenőrző adagolóeszközt alkalmaznak. Továbbá speciáliskialakítású égőket (48a... b, 50a... b) alkalmaznak, és az égők(48a... b, 50a... b) lángjában nagy termikus hatékonyságú tökéleteségést valósítanak meg. Az eljárás során közömbösítik a por alakútüzelőanyag égetéséből származó, az üvegolvasztó kemence tűzállóbélésére ható eróziós és koptató hatásokat. A találmány feltárja azt apor alakú tüzelőanyag üvegolvasztó kemencében történő elégetésérealkalmas égőt is (48a... b, 50a... b), melynek égőteste van, amelybenkülső cső, középső cső, és belső cső van elrendezve. A csövekegymással koncentrikusan vannak elhelyezve, és a külső cső, valamint aközépső cső között első kamra van kialakítva. A külső csőnek az égő(48a... b, 50a... b) hűtése érdekében a kamrán belül hűtőfolyadékbevezetésére és keringetésére szolgáló bemeneti csöve és kimeneticsöve van. A por alakú tüzelőanyag-levegő keverék az elosztóeszközkimeneti végén ki van vezetve. A levegő- vagy gázáramban örvénylőmozgás van kialakítva, továbbá az első levegő- vagy gázáram, valaminta por alakú tüzelőanyag-levegő keverék egyszerre van összekeverve azégetéshez az üvegolvasztó kemence égésterében. Ó

column12: PROCEDIMIENTO DE ESTABLECIMIENTO DE ENLACES ENTRE ESTACIONES CONECTADAS A UNA RED DE TELECOMUNICACION.
column13: Procedimiento de establecimiento de enlaces entre estaciones conectadas a una red de telecomunicación. Se caracteriza por la asignación de un identificador local de transmisión cada enlace y una decodificación de la información basada en el identificador local del enlace asignado y en el identificador inequívoco enviado por el transmisor en su período de transmisión. Permite establecer múltiples enlaces entre estaciones de una red de telecomunicaciones, de forma unicast (hacia un único destinatario) o multicast (hacia múltiples destinatarios) con independencia del tipo de red o sistema empleado en la comunicación. Es aplicable a sistemas de telecomunicaciones que apliquen un sistema de direccionamiento para la conexión de estaciones y presenta las ventajas de minimizar la sobrecarga de datos debida a las cabeceras, facilitar el establecimiento de conexiones entre dos o más estaciones y flexibilizar el direccionamiento de los paquetes dentro de la misma red.

column12: Beta-hydroxy-gamma-aminophosphonates for treating immune disorders
column13: The present disclosure provides methods of treating, ameliorating, or preventing immune disorders, allergic disorders, or inflammatory disorders, or combinations thereof, or providing hepatoprotection in subject. In one aspect, the method comprises administering to a subject a therapeutically effective amount of a β-hydroxy-γ-aminophosphonate or β-amino-γ-aminophosphonate.

column12: Fixing means for fixing a wear element on the front edge of a support
column13: The present invention relates to fixing means for fixing a wear element (2) on a support (1), where the wear element (2) comprises two arms (7) wrapping around the front edge (11) of the support. The fixing means comprise: [a] a C-shaped body (3), [b] a wedge (4), [c] a screw (5) with a shank, with a first segment (15) having a smaller diameter than the head (14), a second segment (16) having a larger diameter than the first segment (15), and a threaded segment (17), and [d] a nut (6). The shank of the screw is housed between the wedge (4) and the body (3). The C-shaped body (3) has a C-shaped projection (18) suitable for housing the first segment (15) of the screw (5). The projection (18) has substantially the same height as the first segment (15). Neither the head (14) nor the second segment (16) can go through the projection (18). The wedge (4) has a first projection (19) and a second projection (20). Both projections (19, 20) have through holes (21, 22) suitable for allowing the passage of the threaded segment (17) and suitable for blocking the passage of the nut (6), and the distance between both projection (19, 20) is greater than the height of the nut (6).

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR FEEDING AND BURNING PULVERIZED FUEL IN GLASS MELTING FURNACE, AND BURNER FOR USE IN THE SAME
column13:
PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a method and system for feeding and burning pulverized fuel in a glass melting furnace which includes molten glass and a plurality of burners.

SOLUTION: The burners are associated with a pair of sealed regenerative chambers 36, 38 disposed side by side, and are arranged in a series of ports that are associated with the glass melting region of the furnace. The system includes means for supplying the pulverized fuel by each of the burners for melting glass raw materials. The emissions of flue gases produced by the combustion process of the fuel in the furnace are controlled in order to maintain clean the flue gases and for reducing the emission of impurities from the fuel such as SOx, NOx and particulates. The regenerative chambers 36, 38 are manufactured with selected refractories such as, magnesium, zircon-silica-alumina or magnesia and zirconium-silicate, for counteracting the erosive and corrosive effects produced by the combustion process of the fuel in the glass melting chamber 10. A burner is also provided for feeding the petroleum coke, the burner including means to simultaneously mix a primary air and pulverized fuel-air mixture for the burning of the pulverized fuel.

column12: MEDIOS DE FIJACION DE UN ELEMENTO DE DESGASTE SOBRE EL BORDE ANTERIOR DE UN SOPORTE
column13: Medios de fijacion de un elemento de desgaste (2) sobre un soporte (1), donde el elemento de desgaste (2) comprende dos brazos(7) que envuelven el borde anterior (11) del soporte. Los medios de fijacion comprenden: (a) un cuerpo (3) con forma de C, (b) una cuna (4) , (c) un tornillo (5) con un vastago con un primer tramo (15), de diametro menor que la cabeza (14), un segundo tramo (16) de diametro mayor que el primer tramo (15) y un tramo de roscado (17) y (d) una tuerca (6) . El vastago del tornillo se aloja entre la cuna (4) y el cuerpo (3) .El cuerpo (3) con forma de C tiene un saliente (18) en forma de C apto para alojar el primer tramo (15) del tornillo (5). El saliente (18) tiene substancialmente la misma altura que el primer tramo (15). Ni la cabeza (14) ni el segundo tramo (16) pueden pasar a traves del saliente (18), la cuna (4) tienen un primer saliente (19) y un segundo saliente (20) .Ambos salientes (19,20) tienen orificios pasantes (21,22) aptos para permitir el paso del tramo roscado (17) y aptos para bloquear el paso de la tuerca (6), y la distancia entre ambos salientes (19,20) es mayor que la altura de la tuerca (6).

column12: LOW PROFILE TRIAXIAL ANTENNA
column13: The present invention relates to a low profile triaxial antenna comprising a cross-shaped electromagnetic core (11) provided with four arms finished with front ends 13, an X-axis winding (DX) wound around two arms; a Y-axis winding (DY) wound around two arms; and a Z-axis winding (DZ) wound around a Z-axis, said Z-axis winding (DZ) surrounding the electromagnetic core and at least partially facingsaid front ends (13); wherein four electromagnetic core portions (12) are each at least partially arranged in a quadrant space defined between two adjacent arms and a portion of Z-axis winding (DZ) running between the front ends (13) thereof, the assembly of the cross-shaped electromagnetic core (11) and the four electromagnetic core portions (12) generating a composite electromagnetic core (10).

column12: Self Calibration Formal Inspection System and Method of using it to Inspect Article
column13: A self-calibrating inspection system includes an inspection device adapted to visually inspect or measure an article placed on a carrier, and a motion actuator moving the inspection device along a predetermined motion trajectory relative to the carrier and the article placed thereon. A correction member of the system is fixedly positioned with respect to the carrier. A distance sensor is fixedly positioned relative to the inspection device and adapted to sense a first spacing between the distance sensor and the correction member during the movement of the inspection device by the motion actuator. A controller communicates with the motion actuator and the distance sensor for determining a deviation between an actual motion trajectory of the inspection device moved by the motion actuator and the predetermined motion trajectory based on the first spacing, and to control the motion actuator based on the deviation to move the inspection device along a path substantially consistent with the predetermined motion trajectory.

column12: Procedure for the obtaining of a hybrid sol-gel coating on surfaces with vitrified ceramic enamels and obtained coatings. (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)
column13: Procedure for obtaining a hybrid sol-gel coating on surfaces with vitrified ceramic glazes and obtained coating. The process for obtaining an organic-inorganic functional hybrid sol-gel coating on a vitrified ceramic glaze substrate comprises a thermally consolidated inorganic matrix layer having such porosity that it allows the incorporation of organic molecules in a concentration of up to 75%. % by weight of the equivalent inorganic compound constituting the sol-gel coating to give a hybrid coating. The coating structure comprises at least 3 layers of a thickness of up to 800 nm each layer. The outer layer corresponds to a coating containing dispersed inorganic nanoparticles and inner layers with a porous inorganic matrix containing dispersed nanoparticles. The porous structure is filled with functional hybrid sol-gel by impregnation. The structure thus obtained presents adequate response of the surface to the requirements of brightness, ease of cleaning, resistance to chemical attack and wear of sanitary pieces allowing the incorporation of new functionalities to a sanitary piece. column12: Method for Producing a Sol-Gel Coating on Surfaces with Vitreous Ceramic Enamels and Coating Thus Produced
column13: The process is characterised in that it comprises at least one sol-gel layer with a maximum thickness of 800 nm, where said sol-gel layer comprises nanoparticles with a laminar crystal structure, and where each sol-gel layer is obtained from a silicon alkoxide solution; preparation of a dispersion that comprises at least one type of particles with a spherical, fibrillar or laminar morphology, and a laminar crystal structure, wherein at least one of the dimensions, thickness or diameter, of said particles is less than 400 nm; addition of the dispersion prepared to the solution; deposition of the suspension on said substrate; thermal treatment of the substrate; and, in the case of multilayer coatings, optionally, the addition of high-dimensional particles and repetition of the steps, provided that the thermal treatment of the last layer, or outer layer, is performed at a temperature equal to or greater than that of the preceding layer. The invention also relates to the sol-gel coating thus obtained. The present invention solves the problem of contraction in the densification of high-thickness sol-gel coatings and, moreover, provides a process for obtaining a sol-gel coating useful for ceramic surfaces with a large size and/or complex shapes.

column12: METHOD FOR PRODUCING A SOL-GEL COATING ON SURFACES WITH VITREOUS CERAMIC ENAMELS AND COATING THUS PRODUCED
column13: The invention relates to a method, characterized in that it includes at least one sol-gel layer having a maximum thickness of 800 nm, wherein said sol-gel layer includes crystalline laminar nanoparticles, and wherein each sol-gel layer is produced from a silicon alkoxide dilution including: preparing a dispersion that includes at least one type of spherical, fibrillar or laminar particle having a crystalline laminar structure, wherein at least one of the dimensions, thickness or diameter, of said particles is less than 400 nm adding the dispersion prepared to the dilution depositing the suspension on said substrate thermally treating the substrate and in the case of multiple layers, optionally adding high dimensionality particles and repeating the steps such that the thermal treatment of the last layer or outer layer is equal or greater to that of the preceding layer. The invention likewise relates to the sol-gel coating thus produced. The invention solves the problem of contraction in the densification of very thick sol-gel coatings, and also provides a method for producing a sol-gel coating useful for ceramic surfaces that are large and/or complex in shape.

column12: Revestimientos cerámicos con carbonato apatitas que permiten una sensación térmica al tacto silimar al de la madera y buena resistencia al desgaste, al ataque químico y al manchado
column13: En un aspecto, la presente invención comprende proporcionar un aditivo o agregado para aplicarse directamente en uno o más de los componentes de un revestimiento cerámico y que está constituido por partículas de carbonato apatitas que se mantienen como agregados dentro de una matriz de silicoaluminatos a temperaturas de cocción de los revestimientos cerámicos, en donde la función principal de estos agregados es proporcionar al revestimiento cerámico propiedades seleccionadas del grupo que comprende: baja efusividad, resistencia al desgaste, resistencia al ataque químico y resistencia al manchado. En otros aspectos, la presente invención comprende el proporcionar un revestimiento cerámico que incorpore dicho aditivo y un método para para proporcionar a un revestimiento cerámico propiedades seleccionadas del grupo que comprende: baja efusividad, resistencia al desgaste, resistencia al ataque químico y resistencia al manchado.

column12: uso de uma composição farmacêutica que contém microesferas de fator de crescimento epidérmico
column13: USO DE UMA COMPOSIçãO FARMACêUTICA QUE CONTéM MICROESFERAS DE FATOR DE CRESCIMENTO EPIDéRMICO. Uma composição farmacêutica que contém microesferas carregadas com fator de crescimento epidérmico para ser administrada por via parenteral nos membros inferiores de pacientes diabéticos atingidos por lesões isquêmicas cutâneas crónicas. A composição da presente invenção, em contraste ao estado da técnica anterior, é útil porque reduz a freqúência de administração durante o tratamento e permite que a cicatrização das lesões seja mais rápida comparada com a administração de quantidades equivalentes do fator livre em solução.

column12: Cooking appliance
column13: Die Erfindung geht aus von einer Kochvorrichtung (10) mit zumindest einem Brenner (12) zu einer Erzeugung zumindest einer Flamme und mit zumindest einer thermochromen Einheit (16). Um eine gattungsgemäße Vorrichtung mit verbesserten Eigenschaften hinsichtlich einer preiswerten Ausgestaltung und/oder einer hohen Sicherheit für einen Bediener bereitzustellen, wird vorgeschlagen, dass die thermochrome Einheit (16) zumindest in einem Betriebszustand in einem Flammbereich (18) der von dem Brenner (12) erzeugten Flamme angeordnet ist.

column12: PEPTIDOS DERIVADOS DEL EXTREMO AMINO DE LA VP5 DE ORBIVIRUS Y SU EMPLEO EN DIAGNOSTICO Y VACUNAS.
column13: Peptidos derivados del extremo amino de la VP5 de orbivirus y su empleo en diagnóstico y vacunas. Los péptidos contienen secuencias de 6 a 20 aminoácidos contiguos contenidos en la región comprendida entre los restos de los aminoácidos 70 a 95 de la VP5 de un orbivirus, en particular del VPEA-4. Dicha región contiene varios sitios antigénicos y al menos un determinante antigénico reconocido específicamente por un anticuerpo monoclonal frente a dicho determinante antigénico. Dichos péptidos y anticuerpo monoclonal pueden ser utilizados como reactivos de diagnóstico para orbivirus, particularmente mediante un inmunoensayo basado en un ELISA de bloqueo. Estos péptidos también inducen la producción de anticuerpos neutralizantes del virus y pueden utilizarse en la formulación de vacunas.

column12: Pharmaceutical composition of microspheres for preventing diabetic foot amputation
column13: The invention relates to a pharmaceutical composition containing microspheres loaded with epidermal growth factor, for parenteral administration to the lower limbs of diabetic patients suffering from chronic ischemic skin lesions. The inventive composition, in contrast with the prior art, is useful in that it reduces administration frequency during treatment and enables the lesions to heal more quickly compared with the administration of identical quantities of the factor when free in solution.

column12: System for the increase of the efficiency in the production of hydrogen through the photolysis of water in a photo-electrochemical cell expanding the range of spectral response of the catalytic semiconductor. (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)
column13: System for the increase of the efficiency in the production of hydrogen through the photolysis of water in a photo-electrochemical cell expanding the range of spectral response of the catalytic semiconductor. A system for the increase of the efficiency in the production of hydrogen through the photolysis of water in a photo-electrochemical cell is proposed, extending the range of spectral response of the catalytic semiconductor, by means of a photoconversion of incident solar radiation towards wavelengths short, using transparent nano-ceramic materials composed of a silicon oxide matrix containing fluoride nanocrystals (PbF2, NaYF4, YF3, KYF4) doped with rare earth ions (Nd3 +, Tm3 +, Ho3 +, Er3 +, Yb3 + . In this way, a system capable of absorbing and taking advantage of a wide range of energy from the sun in the red and infrared is achieved and converted efficiently, through "up-conversion" processes, to the blue and UV range, optimizing the water rupture in hydrogen and oxygen. (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)

column12: PHARMACEUTICAL COMPOSITION OF MICROSPHERES FOR PREVENTING DIABETIC LIMB AMPUTATION
column13: 24 PHARMACEUTICAL COMPOSITION OF MICROSPHERES FOR PREVENTING DIABETIC LIMB AMPUTATION. ABSTRACT 5 THE PRESENT INVENTION RELATES TO A PHARMACEUTICAL COMPOSITION THAT COMPRISES POLYMERIC MICROSPHERES CONTAINING EPIDERMAL GROWTH FACTOR (EGF) FOR THE APPLICATION, BY THE PARENTERAL ROUTE, INTO THE LOWER LIMBS OF DIABETIC PATIENTS WITH CUTANEOUS CHRONIC ISCHERNIC ULCERATIVE WOUNDS. THE 10 PHARMACEUTICAL COMPOSITION DESCRIBED HEREIN, IN CONTRAST WITH THE STATE OF THE ART, IS USEFUL BECAUSE REDUCE THE ADMINISTRATION FREQUENCY DURING THE TREATMENT AND ALLOWS FOR THE HEALING OF THE ULCERATIVE WOUNDS IN A SHORTER TIME INTERVAL WITH RESPECT TO THE INJECTION OF EQUIVALENT QUANTITIES OF NON- ENCAPSULATED EGF. 15 20

column12: BANCO PARA OPTIMIZAR LA GEOMETRÍA DE ATOMIZADORES DE PETRÓLEOS PESADOS
column13: Estructura soporte para quemador (15) y boquilla de atomización, con posibilidad de estudio del spray en posición horizontal y vertical, que recibe el flujo del petróleo desde el calentador (5) impulsado por bomba (4) con diferentes presiones y temperaturas que son reguladas por válvulas (1, 8, 9, 11) y controladas por manómetros (10, 12) y termómetros (6, 7. Durante el proceso de atomización se controla el gasto de combustible con flujómetro (13), de acuerdo con la variante geométrica que se estudia y en relación con los parámetros de explotación en presión de combustible, temperatura y calidad del petróleo pesado que se utiliza, todo lo que se analiza para l estudio de optimización de acuerdo con el cono de pulverización y tamano de gota que se obtiene en cada variante geométrica del atomizador. El banco en su conjunto es móvil y se adapta a la instalación de caldera pirotubular, así como a tanque de combustible ligero para su trabajo y limpieza mediante mangueras de presión y uniones universales.

column12: Bimodal operating string instrument (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)
column13: Bimodal stringed instrument. The present invention refers to a musical instrument, particularly a string quartet instrument, the violin being the most representative example, which has a bimodal operation, equipped with a sound capture module, a preamplification and communications module, a module signal reception, and a power supply module. This instrument allows the player to get the same sound and feel as when playing a classical violin, but also includes the ability to send the sound wirelessly to a receiver that can be connected to an amplifier, mixer, system recording, a signal processing system, streaming systems, etc., so that it adds all the options of an electric violin. (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)

column13: The invention relates to a pharmaceutical composition containing microspheres loaded with epidermal growth factor, for parenteral administration to the lower limbs of diabetic patients suffering from chronic ischemic skin lesions. column12: Peptides derived from the orbivirus VP5 amino end and their use in diagnosis and vaccines.
column13: Peptides derived from the orbivirus VP5 amino end and their use in diagnosis and vaccines.The peptides contain sequences of 6 to 20 contiguous amino acids contained in the region between the residues of amino acids 70 to 95 of the VP5 of an orbivirus, notably VPEA-4. Said region contains various antigen sites and at least one antigen determinant specifically recognised by a monoclonal antibody faced with said antigen determinant. Said peptides and monoclonal antibody can be used as diagnostic reagents for orbivirus, notably with an immunoassay based on a blocking ELISA test. These peptides also induce antibody production for neutralising the virus and can be used in the formulation of vaccines.

column12: Cooking battery base (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)
column13: The invention relates to a baking battery base (10a-b) with at least one layer unit (12a-b), which has at least one heating layer (14a-b), at least one thermoconductive layer (16a-b), and at least one magnetic layer (18a-b) which is largely or completely disposed between the heating layer (14a-b) and the thermally conductive layer (16a-b). In order to provide a generic device with better properties as regards its efficiency, it is proposed that the layer unit (12a-b) present several joining elements (20a-b) that are arranged in material recesses (22a- b) of the magnetic layer (18a-b) and which join the heating layer (14a-b) with the thermally conductive layer (16a-b) in a thermoconductive manner. column12: Antena tri-axial de bajo perfil
column13: Antena tri-axial de bajo perfil que comprende: - un núcleo electromagnético (11) en forma de cruz dotado de dos brazos de eje X protuberantes desde un centro y alineados con un eje X y dos brazos de eje Y protuberantes desde dicho centro alineados con un eje Y, siendo los ejes X e Y perpendiculares entre sí, y siendo las caras de los brazos de eje X y de los brazos de eje Y más alejadas del centro unos testeros (13); - un devanado de eje X (DX) de hilo electro-conductor arrollado alrededor de los dos brazos de eje X; - un devanado de eje Y (DY) de hilo electro-conductor arrollado alrededor de los dos brazos de eje Y; - un devanado de eje Z (DZ) de hilo electro-conductor arrollado alrededor de un eje Z ortogonal a los ejes X e Y, 15 estando dicho devanado de eje Z (DZ) rodeando el núcleo electromagnético y al menos parcialmente enfrentado a dichos testeros (13); caracterizada porque cuatro porciones de núcleo electromagnético (12) están dispuestas, cada una, al menos parcialmente en un espacio de cuadrante definido entre un brazo de eje X, un brazo de eje Y adyacente y una porción de devanado de eje Z (DZ) que discurre entre sus testeros (13), el conjunto de núcleo electromagnético (11) en forma de cruz y las cuatro porciones de núcleo electromagnético (12) están configurados para generar un núcleo electromagnético compuesto (10).

column12: USE OF BLACK BEAN (PHASEOLUS VULGARIS L) AS ANTIBACTERIAL AND ANTIPARASITIC AGENT.
column13: The present invention refers to the use of extracts from the black bean episperm for the manufacture of an oral or topic composition against some parasitic and/or bacterial diseases due to the wide spectrum of antibacterial and antiparasitic activity thereof at low doses. The simultaneous antibacterial and antiparasitic activity of the extract allows the intestinal microbiota of the genital tract and skin to be effectively control since it is potentially harmful, thereby preventing and/or treating different pathological processes caused by parasites or bacteria. The black bean extracts are proposed as a valid and efficient alternative instead of antiparasitics and antibiotics, for improving health.

column12: Ceramic coatings with apatite carbonate that allow a tactile thermal sensation similar to wood and good resistance against wear, chemical attack and staining
column13: In one aspect, the present invention comprises providing an additive or aggregate to be applied directly to one or more of the components of a ceramic coating and which is constituted by carbonate apatites particles which are maintained as aggregates within a matrix of silicoaluminates at firing temperatures of the ceramic coatings, where the main function of these aggregates is to provide the ceramic coating properties selected from the group comprising: low effusivity, wear resistance, resistance to chemical attack and resistance to staining. In other aspects, the present invention comprises providing a ceramic coating incorporating said additive and a method for providing a ceramic coating with properties selected from the group comprising: low effusivity, wear resistance, resistance to chemical attack and resistance to staining.

column12: METHOD OF PRODUCING A SYNTHETIC PAPER BOOK
column13: The invention relates to a method of producing a synthetic paper book which is characterised in that it comprises impermeable, submersible and washable paper which can be printed on one or both sides thereof. The pages of the inventive book have a similar thickness and grammage to books made from standard paper.

column12: Sistema de montagem para fogões a gás domésticos
column13: "SISTEMA DE MONTAGEM PARA FOGõES A GáS DOMéSTICOS" Um sistema de montagem para fogões a gás domésticos que permite a inserção de um fogão com sua tampa, ao deslizá-lo para dentro de um espaço oco horizontal de uma bancada de cozinha, assim como a montagem do mesmo em um espaço quadrado cortado feito na bancada, inserindo sua tampa sobre a bancada de cozinha, compreendendo um meio de montagem acoplado nos limites periféricos do fogão, a ser montado sobre uma bancada de cozinha; um meio de extensão acoplado no meio de suprimento de gás que vai para os queimadores de fogão, a fim de adaptar a altura dos queimadores ao tipo de montagem desejada; e um meio de extensão acoplado no meio de exaustão de gás de combustão, a fim de adaptar a altura do meio de exaustão do fogão ao tipo de montagem do fogão.
