column12: COOKING-VESSEL BASE
column13: The invention proceeds from a cooking-vessel base (10a-b) having at least one layered unit (12a-b) which has at least one heating layer (14a-b), at least one thermally conductive layer (16a-b) and at least one magnetic layer (18a-b), which is arranged at least substantially between the heating layer (14a-b) and the thermally conductive layer (16a-b). In order to create an arrangement of the type in question which has improved efficiency-related properties, it is proposed that the layered unit (12a-b) should have a plurality of connecting elements (20a-b), which are arranged in material apertures (22a-b) of the magnetic layer (18a-b) and connect the heating layer (14a-b) in a thermally conductive manner to the thermally conductive layer (16a-b).

column13: Surface chemical activation method of a silicon-based solid support by direct covalent attachment of at least one nucleic acid biomolecule. The present invention relates to a method of surface chemical activation by reaction thiol-ene (tec) or thiol-ino (wc) of a solid support on silicon basis by direct covalent attachment of at least one biomolecule which is a sequence of oligonucleotides of dna or rna, where a) the surface of the support is functionalized with alkene or alkyne groups and the biomolecule has a terminal thiol group, and/or b) the surface of the support is functionalized with thiol groups and the biomolecule has an alkene or terminal alkyne group ; said method comprising the steps of: depositing the sequence of oligonucleotides on the surface of the support by means of printing techniques with or without contact; and anchoring the sequence of oligonucleotides to the surface of the support by radical addition by tec or tyc reaction caused by photoirradiation with uv light close to the visible during a time interval comprised between 5 minutes and 3 hours, without the need to use crosslinkers and/or catalysts . (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)

column12: CERAMIC COATINGS WITH APATITE CARBONATE THAT ALLOW A TACTILE THERMAL SENSATION SIMILAR TO WOOD AND GOOD RESISTANCE AGAINST WEAR, CHEMICAL ATTACK AND STAINING.
column13: The present invention relates to an additive or aggregate for applying directly to one or more of the components of a ceramic coating, and which is formed by apatite carbonate particles that remain as aggregates within a matrix of silicoaluminates at temperatures for cooking of the ceramic coatings, the main purpose of the aggregates being to provide to the ceramic coating with properties selected from the group comprising: low effusivity, wear resistance, resistance to chemical attack and stain resistance. The present invention also relates to a ceramic coating incorporating said additive and to a method for providing a ceramic coating with properties selected from the group comprising: low effusivity, wear resistance, resistance to chemical attack and stain resistance.

column12: PHARMACEUTICAL COMPOSITION OF MICROSPHERES FOR PREVENTING DIABETIC FOOT AMPUTATION
column15: RODRIGUEZ BLAS YAMIR BETANCOUR;;MARTINEZ VIVIAN MARIA SAEZ;;MEIRELES ROLANDO PAEZ;;ACOSTA JORGE AMADOR BERLANGA;;HERNANDEZ JOSE ANGEL RAMON

column12: COMPOSICION FARMACEUTICA DE MICROESFERAS PARA PREVENIR LA AMPUTACION DEL PIE DIABETICO
column13: Una composicion farmacéutica que contiene microesferas cargadas con Factor de Crecimiento Epidérmico para ser administrada por vía parenteral en los miembro inferiores de pacientes diabáticos aquejados de lesiones isquémicas cutáneas cronicas. La composicion de la presente reduce la frecuencia de administracion durante el tratamiento y permite que la cicatrizacion de las lesiones sea más rápida comparada con la administracion de cantidades equivalentes del Factor libre en solucion. Reivindicacion 2: Una composicion farmacéutica segun la reivindicacion 1, donde el factor de crecimiento epidérmico se encuentra encapsulado en microesferas o nanoesferas poliméricas. Reivindicacion 3: Una composicion farmacéutica segun la reivindicacion 2, donde las microesferas se fabrican de un material polimérico del grupo integrado por copolímeros de ácido láctico y ácido glicolico, homopolímeros de ácido láctico, homopolímeros de ácido glicolico, policaprolactona, copolímeros de hidroxibutirato e hidroxivalerato, copolímeros de ácido láctico y caprolactona, poliortoésteres y polianhídridos.
column15: SAEZ MARTINEZ VIVIAN MARIA;;PAEZ MEIRELES ROLANDO;;BERLANGA ACOSTA JORGE AMADOR;;BETANCOURT RODRIGUEZ BLAS YAMI;;RAMON HERNANDEZ JOSE ANGEL

column12: NUTRACEUTICAL BEVERAGES FROM A MIXTURE OF EXTRUDED WHOLE GRAINS.
column13: The present invention provides beverages with nutritional value and a high antioxidant capacity from a mixture of extruded maize, chickpea and bean flour. The whole grains of maize, chickpea and bean, previously fragmented, are conditioned by separate at a humidity of 28%. The conditions of the single screw extruder were obtained from combinations of the variation levels of the process variables: Extrusion temperature (95,120,145,170,195 °C) and speed of the screw (80,120,160,200,240 rpm). The rotatable central experimental design with five levels of variation generated 30 treatments. Two different mixtures of flours were prepared, one with extruded maize and chickpea and the other with extruded maize and beans. The extruded flours were used for preparing two beverages with energetic contents of from about 98-100 cal and an antioxidant capacity of from about 1000-1500 umol equivalent of Trolox. The beverages were sensorially assessed with an acceptability between I like it very mucg a nd I extremely like it. The sensorially acceptable beverages with a nutritional/nutraceutial value are an alternative to beverages with a high caloric content.
column15: CARRILLO JORGE MILAN;;MORENO CUAUHTEMOC REYES;;DORADO ROBERTO GUTIERREZ;;ROCHIN SARAID MORA;;ORTIZ ANGEL VALDEZ;;MEDINA JESUS JAIME ROCHIN

column12: Poster sonoro
column13: El poster sonoro, es una integración de tecnología que tiene como fin, proporcionar una información visual (impresa) acompañada de información auditiva relacionada, que se activa al detectar la presencia del usuario por medio de un sensor de movimiento. Para lograr una mayor efectividad en el efecto publicitario, la presente Invención presenta un poster sonoro con un chasis de madera hueco, una cubierta de acrílico a la que se pega la publicidad impresa, un back-Light y 2 parlantes de inyección (multidimensionales) unidos al chasis. Esta configuración específica genera un sonido más potente que el generado por posters similares del arte previo.

column12: Revestimientos cerámicos con carbonato apatitas que permiten una sensación térmica al tacto similar al de la madera y buena resistencia al desgaste, al ataque químico y al manchado.
column13: EN UN ASPECTO, LA PRESENTE INVENCIÓN COMPRENDE PROPORCIONAR UN ADITIVO O AGREGADO PARA APLICARSE DIRECTAMENTE EN UNO O MÁS DE LOS COMPONENTES DE UN REVESTIMIENTO CERÁMICO Y QUE ESTÁ CONSTITUIDO POR PARTÍCULAS DE CARBONATO APATITAS QUE SE MANTIENEN COMO AGREGADOS DENTRO DE UNA MATRIZ DE SILICOALUMINATOS A TEMPERATURAS DE COCCIÓN DE LOS REVESTIMIENTOS CERÁMICOS, EN DONDE LA FUNCIÓN PRINCIPAL DE ESTOS AGREGADOS ES PROPORCIONAR AL REVESTIMIENTO CERÁMICO PROPIEDADES SELECCIONADAS DEL GRUPO QUE COMPRENDE: BAJA EFUSIVIDAD, RESISTENCIA AL DESGASTE, RESISTENCIA AL ATAQUE QUÍMICO Y RESISTENCIA AL MANCHADO. EN OTROS ASPECTOS, LA PRESENTE INVENCIÓN COMPRENDE EL PROPORCIONAR UN REVESTIMIENTO CERÁMICO QUE INCORPORE DICHO ADITIVO Y UN MÉTODO PARA PARA PROPORCIONAR A UN REVESTIMIENTO CERÁMICO PROPIEDADES SELECCIONADAS DEL GRUPO QUE COMPRENDE: BAJA EFUSIVIDAD, RESISTENCIA AL DESGASTE, RESISTENCIA AL ATAQUE QUÍMICO Y RESISTENCIA AL MANCHADO.

column12: REVESTIMIENTOS CERÁMICOS CON CARBONATO APATITAS QUE PERMITEN UNA SENSACIÓN TÉRMICA AL TACTO SIMILAR AL DE LA MADERA Y BUENA RESISTENCIA AL DESGASTE, AL ATAQUE QUÍMICO Y AL MANCHADO
column13: En un aspecto, la presente invención comprende proporcionar un aditivo o agregado para aplicarse directamente en uno o más de los componentes de un revestimiento cerámico y que está constituido por partículas de carbonato apatitas que se mantienen como agregados 5 dentro de una matriz de silicoaluminatos a temperaturas de cocción de los revestimientos cerámicos, en donde la función principal de estos agregados es proporcionar al revestimiento cerámico propiedades seleccionadas del grupo que comprende: baja efusividad, resistencia al desgaste, resistencia al ataque químico y resistencia al manchado. column12: ENZYME WITH XYLANOLYTIC ACTIVITY PRODUCED BY THE SPORISORIUM REILIANUM FUNGUS.
column13: The present invention refers to an enzyme with xylanolytic activity known as SRXL 1, which is produced by the Sporisorium reilianum fungus, this enzyme pertaining to the 10 family of the glycosyl hydrolases and having the following molecular weight biochemical properties: 42 kDa, optimum pH: 4 a 6, optimum temperature: 65°C to 75°C, the enzyme being stable from 12h to 28h at 4°C to 10°C, at pH values of 3.0 to 11.0 and from 4°C to 55°C besides maintaining activity in a 20%-60% in a temperature ranging from 55°C to 70°C. The enzyme degrades xylene. The Mn2+ at a concentration of 2mM increases the activity of the enzyme in 18% and at a concentration of 10mM the activity is reduced in a 12%. The Fe2+ (10 mM) ions has an effect slightly positive that increases the activity in 8%. The Mg2+, Ca2+ and K+ ions reduce the activity of the enzyme. The Cu2+ at 10mM has inhibited the activity while the Zn2+ did not present any effect. The values of Km and Vmax over xylene of birch at a pH of 5.5 a re 1.72 mg/mL and 2.48 umol/mmin respectively. In addition, the invention refers to the production and purification process of the enzyme and the peptide sequence thereof. The present invention is unique, since it describes the xylanase SRXL 1 of S. reilianum fungus, which, due to its biochemical characteristics and its amino acid sequence similar to that of other xylanases, has potential biotechnological applications.

column12: A method for preparing a set accelerator, the product obtained and its use
column13: A method for preparing a set accelerator, the product obtained and its use, which method produces a complex species of aluminium silicate hydroxy sulphate applicable as a concrete set accelerator obtained in solution and/or aqueous suspension and which can be dried in order to produce a solid product, the object of which is to accelerate the hardening of dry or wet projected cement mixtures (mortar and concrete) and ensure a fast development of early compressive strength, as well as reducing initial set times, with a content in alkaline metals of less than 1% as Na 2 O, which can be considered an alkali-free accelerator.

column12: COMPUTERIZED ROTOMETER FOR RODENTS
column13: PERTENECE AL CAMPO DE LA MEDICION DE MAGNITUDES FISICAS, PARTICULARMENTE A LA RAMA DE LA INDICACION DE VUELTAS Y SU OBJETIVO ES EVALUAR DE FORMA TOTALMENTE AUTOMATIZADA EL COMPORTAMIENTO ROTACIONAL EN ROEDORES SOMETIDOS A EXPERIMENTO. EL ROTOMETRO ESTA COMPUESTO POR: RECIPIENTES (1-1,....,1-4); DONDE SE SITUAN LOS ROEDORES SOMETIDOS AL EXPERIMENTO, UNO EN CADA RECIPIENTE. DETECTORTES DE ROTACION (2-1,...,2-4); SON DISPOSITIVOS ELECTROMECANICOS SITUADOS EN LA PARTE SUPERIOR DE LOS RECIPIENTES; QUE SE INTERCONECTAN CON EL INDICADOR DE ROTACION (3) MEDIANTE UN CABLE, SU FUNCION ES DAR SEÑALES ELECTRICAS CADA VEZ QUE EL ROEDOR DE UNA VUELTA. INDICADOR DE ROTACION (3); ES UN BLOQUE DE ELEMENTOS (PLACA O TARJETA) QUE VA SITUADO DENTRO DE UNA MICROCOMPUTADORA IBM-COMPATIBLE (4), EL CUAL PERMITE CONFORMAR LAS SEÑALES ENTREGADAS POR LOS DETECTORES DE ROTACION Y, MEDIANTE EL BUS DE LA MICROCOMPUTADORA, INDICAR AL ASEGURAMIENTO DE PROGRAMA (5) QUE UNO O VARIOS ROEDORES COMPLETARON UNA VUELTA , ASI COMO EL SENTIDO DE LAS MISMAS; A CADA PLACA PUEDEN CONECTARSE HASTA 4 DETECTORES DE ROTACION. ASEGURAMIENTO DE PROGRAMA (5); RECOPILA LOS DATOS ENTREGADOS POR EL INDICADOR DE ROTACION (3) EN EL TIEMPO, OBTIENE LA FRECUENCIA DE VUELTAS POR MINUTO DE HASTA 4 ROEDORES SIMULTANEAMENTE, GENERA TABLAS Y GRAFICAS PARA CADA ROEDOR DEL GRUPO EXPERIMENTAL Y EL PROMEDIO DEL GRUPO COMPLETO; ADEMAS REALIZA EL ALMACENAMIENTO EN MEMORIA DE LOS DATOS POR GRUPO PARA UN POSTERIOR ANALISIS ESTADISTICO. LOS RESULTADOS PUEDEN SER VISUALIZADOS EN LA PANTALLA DE LA MICROCOMPUTADORA O IMPRIMIDOS EN UN IMPRESOR ACOPLADO A LA MISMA.\!

column12: Un método de preparación de un acelerador de fraguado, el producto obtenido y su uso
column13: Un método de preparación de un producto acelerador de fraguado libre de álcali para mezclas de cemento pulverizadas, de tal manera que partiendo de una mezcla de: - una solución o suspensión de sulfato de aluminio altamente concentrada, entre el 8,2 % y el 21 % de Al2O3, preparada a partir de sulfato de aluminio en una solución acuosa con una concentración de entre el 1 % y el 12 % en Al2O3 y/o sulfato de aluminio en forma sólida con una concentración de entre el 14 y el 27 % de Al2O3 y a una temperatura de entre 1 y 90 ºC, y; - un gel en polvo de hidroxicarbonato de aluminio amorfo en un porcentaje de entre el 0,1 y el 15 %, y/o; - una amina o alcanolamina, en particular una dietanolamina en un porcentaje de entre el 0,1 y el 8 %, preparándose esta mezcla de partida sometida a agitación continua, - realizando una primera etapa donde un derivado de sílice sintético en un porcentaje entre el 0,1 y el 10 %, seleccionado del grupo de los silicatos de aluminio sintéticos, silicatos de aluminio y sodio sintéticos, tanto cristalinos como amorfos, sílice precipitada amorfa y sílice coloidal en solución acuosa se mezcla con la mezcla de partida sometida a agitación; - realizando una segunda etapa de reacción de agitación en un medio acuoso a una temperatura entre 1 y 90 20 ºC durante un periodo entre 15 y 120 minutos, y; - realizando una tercera etapa de maduración a una temperatura entre 2 y 30 ºC con una fuerte agitación durante un periodo entre 1 y 48 horas, obteniéndose una solución líquida de un acelerador de fraguado.

column12: SISTEMA DE CONTROL DE ACCESO BIOMETRICO CON MONITOREO DE PARAMETROS VITALES
column13: Un sistema de control de acceso biometrico con monitoreo de parametros vitales del tipo que comprende un elemento de bloqueo de paso sostenido de manera abatible a una columna y accionado por un motoreductor, donde dicha columna sostiene tambien a una carcasa con una unidad biometrica; caracterizado porque se dispone de una balanza electronica al pie de la columna; la unidad biometrica esta conformada por una camara y un lector de huella digital; ademas, conectado al controlador se encuentra un termometro infrarrojo dispuesto en la carcasa junto a la camara; un glucometro digital por infrarrojo cercano, un sensor optico de frecuencia cardiaca y un oximetro de pulso dispuestos al interior de la hendidura semicilindrica de la carcasa, junto al lector de huella digital.

column12: MOVABLE, AUTONOMOUS, SCALABLE, SELF-DEPLOYABLE, MONITORABLE, REMOTELY REPROGRAMMABLE SYSTEM FOR GENERATING ELECTRICAL ENERGY
column13: The invention relates to a movable, autonomous, scalable, self-deployable, monitorable, remotely reprogrammable system for generating electrical energy. The system comprises a subsystem for producing renewable electrical energy, a subsystem for storing electrical energy, a subsystem for distributing electrical energy, and a subsystem for management and control, the components of which can be stored in one or two containers that can be transported using conventional transport means. The subsystem for producing electrical energy comprises a photovoltaic generator, a wind turbine and, optionally, a fuel cell. The subsystem for storing energy contains batteries and, optionally, hydrogen in the form of metal hydrides (able to generate electrical energy by means of a fuel cell). The system can be deployed automatically in any part of the world by means of a robotic arm that acts in the manner of a crane and is originally programmed for the place of deployment.

column12: Autonomous mobile system, escalable, self-deployable, monitorizable and reprogramable in a remote way, generating electric energy (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)
column13: Mobile autonomous system, scalable, self-deployable, remotely reprogrammable and remotely, electric power generation. It comprises a subsystem for the production of electrical energy of renewable origin, a subsystem for the storage of electrical energy, a subsystem for the distribution of electrical energy, and an instrumentation and control subsystem whose components can be stored in one or two containers capable of being transported by conventional means of transport. The electric power production subsystem comprises a photovoltaic generator, a wind generator and, optionally, a fuel cell. The energy storage subsystem contains batteries and optionally hydrogen in the form of metal hydrides (capable of generating electrical energy through a fuel cell). The system can be deployed automatically anywhere in the world by means of a robotic arm, which acts as a crane, and which is programmed at the origin for the deployment site. column12: Sistema móvil autónomo, escalable, auto desplegable, monitorizable y reprogramable de forma remota, de generación de energía eléctrica
column13: Sistema móvil autónomo, escalable, auto desplegable, monitorizable y reprogramable de forma remota, de generación de energía eléctrica. Comprende un subsistema de producción de energía eléctrica de origen renovable, un subsistema de almacenamiento de energía eléctrica, un subsistema de distribución de energía eléctrica, y un subsistema de instrumentación y control cuyos componentes pueden ser almacenados en uno o dos contenedores susceptibles de ser transportados por medios convencionales de transporte. El subsistema de producción de energía eléctrica comprende un generador fotovoltaico, un generador eólico y, opcionalmente, una pila de combustible. El subsistema de almacenamiento de energía contiene baterías y opcionalmente hidrógeno en forma de hidruros metálicos (susceptible de generar energía eléctrica mediante una pila de combustible). El sistema puede ser desplegado de forma automática en cualquier parte del mundo mediante un brazo robótico, que actúa a modo de grúa, y que es programado en origen para el lugar de despliegue.

column12: MOVABLE, AUTONOMOUS, SCALABLE, SELF-DEPLOYABLE, MONITORABLE, REMOTELY REPROGRAMMABLE SYSTEM FOR GENERATING ELECTRICAL ENERGY
column13: The invention relates to a movable, autonomous, scalable, self- deployable, monitorable, remotely reprogrammable system for generating electrical energy. The system comprises a subsystem for producing renewable electrical energy, a subsystem for storing electrical energy, a subsystem for distributing electrical energy, and a subsystem for management and control, the components of which can be stored in one or two containers that can be transported using conventional transport means. The subsystem for producing electrical energy comprises a photovoltaic generator, a wind turbine and, optionally, a fuel cell. The subsystem for storing energy contains batteries and, optionally, hydrogen in the form of metal hydrides (able to generate electrical energy by means of a fuel cell). The system can be deployed automatically in any part of the world by means of a robotic arm that acts in the manner of a crane and is originally programmed for the place of deployment.

column12: AUTONOMOUS DEVICE FOR SUPPLYING BIOMASS
column13: The invention relates to an autonomous device for supplying biomass, which comprises a structure/case of a standard maritime container (1), in a vertical position, having integrated into the upper part thereof a hopper (2) for storing solid biomass fuel, the hopper being accessible via a door of the container for the loading thereof. The hopper (2) comprises a lower outlet (3) to a weighing hopper (4) that supports loading cells that record the weight of the material contained therein and, in accordance with a control device, weigh the biomass to be dispensed in each sale. All of the components are governed by an electronic control device capable of performing various actions for the sale and delivery of the product, in accordance with the options chosen by the user by means of a control panel (8) disposed in one of the faces of the container (1).

column12: SYSTEM FOR SIMULATING THE SOLAR RADIATION SPECTRUM AND TEMPERATURE.
column13: The present invention provides a system for simulating the solar radiation spectrum and temperature. The invention includes: a support for an orbital motion simulator able to be displaced in a range of from about 0° to about 180°; on which a simulator of rotational motion with displacements ranging from about 0°to about 180° is displaced, which is able to emit radiation and temperature over a predetermined area of a sample carrier. The invention is useful for performing samples and simulations to different systems and equipment such as photovoltaic panels, thermal solar collectors, green roofs, thermal insulating systems, photo bioreactor systems, plants and microalgae growth for producing biomass and biofuel, bioclimatic architecture, energy audits, greenhouses and further solar devices, since this system allows the solar radiation spectrum to be simulated and controlled as well as the solar geometry considering the temperature effect.

column12: Procedure to diagnose the quality in blocks of ornamental rock of large dimensions and devices for its implementation
column13: The object of this patent is a "Quality diagnostic procedure, in large ornamental rock blocks, and devices for its implementation" whose main use is explicit in the statement of the invention itself. The claimed procedure integrates three inspection techniques, applicable successively, that respond to increasing precisions in the diagnosis, and establish an action guideline to know if the block can be cut on looms, or if it should be considered as rejectable for processing, complementing the primary diagnosis stage with a more thorough inspection, by means of ultrasound tomography to locate the fractures and, where appropriate, their orientation, from the propagation of signals at different points of a mesh made on the surface of their faces and their digital processing. (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)

column12: ELECTROMECHANICAL SYSTEM FOR EXTRACTING AND COMPRESSING GAS.
column13: The present invention is related to an electromechanical system for extracting and compressing gas resulting from the annular space of a hydrocarbon well having a Mechanical Pumping Unit (MPU), as well as a high Gas-Oil ratio (GOR). The principle for operating the present system consists in using a double action reciprocating compressor, which along with electromechanical components, remove the gas excess from wells, thus leading it to a well discharge line whereby gas is subsequently directed towards a battery in order to be recovered. This novel system is intended to maintain permanently low the gas pressure within the well annular space, thus avoiding the back pressure exerted into the formation walls. The system also promotes an increase in the MPU useful life, as well as a higher effectiveness in the well operation, thus reducing severe environmental problems.

column15: OLIN NUNEZ MIGUEL ANGEL;;CABRERA LLANOS ROBERTO MARCOS;;LOREDO MURPHY JORGE;;MARGAIN ORTIZ GUSTAVO;;VALADEZ CASTILLO RAFAEL;;FLORES PONCE JUAN GABRIEL

column12: Fremgangsmåte og system for å mate og brenne et pulverisert drivstoff i englasstöpeovn og brenner for anvendelse i samme
column13: Oppfinnelsen vedrører en fremgangsmåte og system for å mate og brenne et pulverisert brensel slik som oljekoks i en glasstøpeovn, som inkluderer en glassmelteområde og en flerhet av brennere assosiert med et par forseglede regenerative kamre arrangert ved siden av hverandre, som virker som varmevekslere. Brennerne er arrangert i en serie porter assosiert med glassmelteområdet av ovnen. Systemet inkluderer anordninger for å mate det pulveriserte brenselet levert ved hver oljebrenner for å smelte råmaterialet for å produsere glass. Forbrenningsgassutslippene produsert av forbrenningsprosessen av brenselet i ovnen kontrolleres for å beholde forbrenningsgassene rene og for å redusere utslippene eller urenhetene generert ved brenselet som SO, NOx og partikler. De regenerative karmene er tilvirket med ildfaste materialer valgt fra gruppen bestående av magnesium, alumina-silika-zirkon eller magnesia og zirkonsilikat for å motvirke de eroderende og korroderende effekter produsert ved forbrenningsprosessen av brenselet i glassmeltekammeret. En brenner for å. levere oljekoks er også. tilveiebrakt, brenneren. inkluderer anordninger. for å samtidig blande en. primærluft og en. luftpulverisert. brenselblanding for å. brenne det pulveriserte. brenselet.
column15: OLIN-NUNEZ MIGUEL ANGEL;;CABRERA-LLANOS ROBERTO MARCOS;;LOREDO-MURPHY JORGE;;MARGAIN-ORTIZ GUSTAVO;;VALADEZ-CASTILLO RAFAEL;;FLORES-PONCE JUAN GABRIEL

column12: Method and system for feeding and burning a pulverized fuel in a glass melting furnace, and burner for use in the same
column13: A method and system for feeding and burning pulverized fuel, such as petroleum coke, in a glass melting furnace, which includes a glass melting and a plurality of burners associated with a pair of sealed regenerative chambers disposed side-by-side which act as heat exchangers, the burners are arranged in a series of ports that are associated with the glass melting region of the furnace. The system includes means for supplying the pulverized fuel by each one of the burners for melting glass raw materials. The emissions of flue gases produced by the combustion process of the fuel in the furnace are controlled in order to maintain clean the flue gases and for reducing the emission of impurities from the fuel such as SOx, NOx and particulates. The regenerative chambers are manufactured with selected refractories such as, magnesium, zircon-silica-alumina or magnesia and zirconium-silicate, for conteracting the erosive and corrosive effects produced by the combustion process of the fuel in the glass melting chamber. A burner is also provided for feeding the petroleum coke, the burner including means to simultaneously mix a primary air and pulverized fuel-air mixture for the burning of the pulverized fuel.

column12: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR FRACTIONATING ALTERNATIVE SOLID FUELS
column13: An apparatus and a method for fractionating alternative solid fuels, specially whole tires, into volatiles and coal, to be used as alternative fuels, and metal, the apparatus comprising: a feeding zone wherein the solid fuels are feed to the apparatus, a gasifying zone into which the solid fuels are processed, obtaining a gaseous fraction, coal and metal; cooled grills controlling the bed permeability and permanence time of the solid fuels at the gasifying zone; and a discharging zone into which the resultant coal and metal are discharged.

column12: UN PROCEDIMIENTO PARA PRODUCIR LA ENZIMA D-AMINOACIDO OXIDASA DE RHODOTORULA GRACILIS EN CELULAS HOSPEDANTES.
column13: UN PROCEDIMIENTO PARA PRODUCIR LA ENZIMA D-AMINOACIDO OXIDASA DE RHODOTORULA GRACILIS EN CELULAS HOSPEDANTES. EL PROCEDIMIENTO DE EXPRESION DE LA ENZIMA COMPRENDE: AISLAR EL ADN COMPLEMENTARIO CORRESPONDIENTE AL ARN MENSAJERO DEL GEN QUE CODIFICA PARA LA D-AMINOACIDO OXIDASA DE CUALQUIER CEPA DE RHODOTORULA GRACILIS PRODUCTORA DE DICHA ENZIMA; FUSIONAR EL FRAGMENTO DE ADN QUE CODIFICA PARA LA D-AMINOACIDO OXIDASA DE RHODOTORULA GRACILIS A UNA SECUENCIA DE ADN QUE CONTENGA UN SITIO DE UNION AL RIBOSOMA Y UNA SECUENCIA PROMOTORA DE ALTA EFICACIA PARA LA EXPRESION DE GENES EN CELULAS HOSPEDANTES; INSERTAR EL FRAGMENTO DE ADN EN UN PLASMIDO DE APROPIADO PARA LA CELULA HOSPEDANTE; CULTIVAR LAS CELULAS HOSPEDANTES TRANSFORMADAS CON ESTE PLASMIDO; Y RECUPERAR LA ENZIMA.

column12: Apparatus and method for fractionating alternative solid fuels
column13: An apparatus and a method fractionate solid fuels, especially whole tires, into metal as well as volatiles and coal to be used as alternative fuels. The apparatus includes a feeding zone wherein the solid fuels are fed to the apparatus, a gasifying zone into which the solid fuels are processed, obtaining a gaseous fraction, coal, and metal; cooled grills controlling the bed permeability and permanence time of the solid fuels at the gasifying zone; and a discharging zone into which the resultant coal and metal are discharged, in which the solid fuel coal and solid and gaseous fractions follow a path inside the apparatus through the feeding zone, the gasifying zone and discharging zone, and in which the gases inside the apparatus follow a path that is co-current with the solid fuel fractions path inside the apparatus.

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR FEEDING AND BURNING A PULVERIZED FUEL IN A GLASS FOUNDRY OVEN AND BURNER TO BE USED THEREWITH
column13: The invention relates to a method and system for feeding and burning a pulverized fuel such as oil coke in a glass foundry oven, which comprises a glass foundry area and a plurality of burners associated with a pair of seal ed regenerative chambers placed next to one another, which act as heat exchangers. The burners are arranged in a series of ports associated with th e glass foundry area of the oven. The system includes means for feeding the pulverized fuel supplied by each oil burner to melt the raw material in orde r to produce glass. The combustion gas emissions produced by the combustion process of the fuel in the oven are controlled with the purpose of keeping combustion gases clean and reducing emissions or impurities generated by the fuel such as SOx, NOx and particles. The regenerative chambers are manufactured with refractory materials selected from amongst the group consisting of magnesium, alumina-silica-zirconia or magnesia and zirconia- silicate to counteract the abrasive and erosive effects produced by the combustion process of the fuel in the glass foundry chamber. A burner for supplying oil coke is also provided, said burner including means for simultaneously mixing a primary air and an air-pulverized fuel mixture to bu rn the pulverized fuel.

column12: METODO Y SISTEMA PARA ALIMENTAR Y QUEMAR UN COMBUSTIBLE PULVERIZADO EN UN HORNO DE FUNDICION DE VIDRIO Y, QUEMADOR PARA USO CON EL MISMO
column13: Un método para alimentar y quemar un combustible pulverizado en un horno de fundición de vidrio del tipo que incluye una región de fundición de vidrio forrada con material refractario y una pluralidad de quemadores asociados con regeneradores sellados en el horno de fundición de vidrio, los cuales actúan como intercambiadores de calor, el método comprende un combustible pulverizado del tipo que comprende carbón fijo y materiales impuros como sulfuro, nitrógeno, vanadio, hierro y níquel o mezcla de los mismos, a cada uno de dichos quemadores asociados con los regeneradores sellados de dicho horno de fundición de vidrio;Quemar dicho combustible pulverizado por cada uno de dichos quemadores en la región de fundición de dicho horno de fundición, proveyendo una flama por cada quemador, para llevar a cabo un proceso de combustión en dicha región de fundición para el fundido del vidrio;Controlar las emisiones de carbón y materiales impuros que se producen por el quemado de dicho combustible pulverizado con medios de control ambiental, dichos medios de control ambiental siendo localizados en una salida de gases de desperdicio de dicho horno de fundición de vidrio, para limpiar los gases de combustión y reducir la emisión de impurezas del combustible pulverizado tales como SOx, NOx y partículas de materia, dicha reducción de emisiones siendo controladas durante y después que la combustión del combustible pulverizado en el horno de fundición de vidrio ha sido llevada a cabo;y contrarrestar los efectos abrasivos y erosivos del combustible pulverizado en el horno de fundición de vidrio a través de medios refractarios en dicho horno de fundición de vidrio.<EMI FILE="02026990_1" ID="1" IMF=JPEG >

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR FEEDING AND BURNING A PULVERIZED FUEL IN A GLASS FOUNDRY OVEN AND BURNER TO BE USED THEREWITH
column13: The invention relates to a method and system for feeding and burning a pulverized fuel such as oil coke in a glass foundry oven, which comprises a glass foundry area and a plurality of burners associated with a pair of sealed regenerative chambers placed next to one another, which act as heat exchangers. The burners are arranged in a series of ports associated with the glass foundry area of the oven. The system includes means for feeding the pulverized fuel supplied by each oil burner to melt the raw material in order to produce glass. The combustion gas emissions produced by the combustion process of the fuel in the oven are controlled with the purpose of keeping combustion gases clean and reducing emissions or impurities generated by the fuel such as SOx, NOx and particles. The regenerative chambers are manufactured with refractory materials selected from amongst the group consisting of magnesium, alumina-silica-zirconia or magnesia and zirconia-silicate to counteract the abrasive and erosive effects produced by the combustion process of the fuel in the glass foundry chamber. A burner for supplying oil coke is also provided, said burner including means for simultaneously mixing a primary air and an air-pulverized fuel mixture to burn the pulverized fuel.

column12: SILLA DE RUEDAS MULTIFUNCIONAL
column13: La invencion pertenece al area de equipos medicos para el transporte y cuidado de pacientes con discapacidad motora temporal o permanente. Se provee una silla de ruedas multifuncional la cual comprende: una estructura movil plegable y una base de soporte del peso del paciente capaz de adoptar la posicion de silla de ruedas o de camilla. Donde la estructura movil comprende: dos ruedas delanteras, dos ruedas posteriores, un mecanismo de tijera y tornillo para permitir la elevacion y el descenso del paciente, un mecanismo horizontal de barras cruzadas para hacer que la estructura movil se despliegue en el eje horizontal y la distancia entre los dos lados se acorte, haciendo que las ruedas queden cerca una de la otra, y donde la base de soporte del peso del paciente cuenta con un asiento, un respaldar para la espalda, un apoyo para la cabeza y un apoyo para los pies, asi como medios para fijar la posicion entre dichos componentes para lograr la configuracion de camilla o silla o plegarla para su transporte

column12: PROCESS FOR PRODUCING THE ENZYME D-AMINOACIDO OXYDASE OF -i(RHODOTORULA GRACILIS) IN HOST CELLS
column13: Process for producing the enzyme D-amino acid oxydase of Rhodotorula gracilis in host cells. The process for the expression of the enzyme comprises isolating the complementary DNA corresponding to the messager RNA of the gene which codes for the D-amino acid oxydase of any strain of Rhodotorula gracillis producing said enzyme fusing the fragment of DNA which codes for D-amino acid oxydase of Rhodotorula gracillis with a DNA sequence which contains a site of union to the ribosome and a high efficiency promoter sequence for the express of genes in host cells inserting the DNA fragment into a plasmid appropriate for the host cell cultivating the host cells transformed with said plasmid and collecting the enzyme.

column12: FORMULA Y METODO DE APLICACION PARA LA LIMPIEZA DE NUBOSIDAD GENERADA POR LA INTEMPERIZACION EN ENVASES DE VIDRIO
column13: Consiste en una formula y metodo para la limpieza de nubosidad generada por la intemperizacion en envases de vidrio. Soluciona la necesidad de limpieza de los envases para que puedan ser utilizados en las condiciones mas optimas en los procesos industriales de envasado de productos. La formula que soluciona la necesidad mencionada contiene acido acetico, acido citrico y acido glicolico en un contenido de manera tal que se logra la limpieza de nubosidad.

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR FEEDING AND BURNING A PULVERIZED FUEL IN A GLASS FOUNDRY OVEN AND BURNER TO BE USED THEREWITH
column13: A method and system for feeding and burning pulverized fuel, such as petroleum coke, in a glass melting furnace, which includes a glass melting and a plurality of burners associated with a pair of sealed regenerative chambers disposed side-by-side which act as heat exchangers, the burners are arranged in a series of ports that are associated with the glass melting region of the furnace. The system includes means for supplying the pulverized fuel by each one of the burners for melting glass raw materials. The emissions of flue gases produced by the combustion process of the fuel in the furnace are controlled in order to maintain clean the flue gases and for reducing the emission of impurities from the fuel such as SOx, NOx and particulates. The regenerative chambers are manufactured with selected refractories such as, magnesium, zircon-silica-alumina or magnesia and zirconium-silicate, for conteracting the erosive and corrosive effects produced by the combustion process of the fuel in the glass melting chamber. A burner is also provided for feeding the petroleum coke, the burner including means to simultaneously mix a primary air and pulverized fuel-air mixture for the burning of the pulverized fuel.
column15: OLIN NUNEZ MIGUEL ANGEL;;CABRERA LLANOS ROBERTO MARCOS;;LOREDO MURPHY JORGE;;MARGAIN ORTIZ GUSTAVO;;VALADEZ CASTILLO RAFAEL;;FLORES PONCE JUAN GABRIEL

column12: PROCEDIMIENTO DE DIAGNOSTICO DE LA CALIDAD, EN BLOQUES DE ROCA ORNAMENTAL DE GRANDES DIMENSIONES Y DISPOSITIVOS PARA SU PUESTA EN PRACTICA.
column13: El objeto de esta Patente es un "Procedimiento de diagnóstico de la calidad, en bloques de roca ornamental de grandes dimensiones, y dispositivos para su puesta en práctica" cuyo uso principal aparece explícito en el propio enunciado de la invención. El procedimiento reivindicado integra tres técnicas de inspección, aplicables sucesivamente, que responden a precisiones crecientes en el diagnóstico, y establecer una pauta de actuación para saber si el bloque puede ser cortado en telares, o si debe ser considerado como rechazable para su procesado, complementando la etapa de diagnosis primaria con una inspección más minuciosa, mediante la realización de tomografías ultrasónicas para la localización de las fracturas y en su caso, su orientación, a partir de la propagación de señales en diferentes puntos de un mallado practicado en la superficie de sus caras y el procesado digital de las mismas.

column12: PROCEDIMIENTO Y SISTEMA PARA ALIMENTAR Y QUEMAR UN COMBUSTIBLE PULVERIZADO EN UN HORNO DE FUSION DE VIDRIO, Y QUEMADOR DESTINADO A SER UTILIZADO CON EL MISMO.
column13: Un método y un sistema para alimentar y quemar un combustible pulverizado, tal como, coque de petróleo, en un horno de fundición de vidrio, el cual incluye una región de fundición de vidrio y una pluralidad de quemadores asociados con un par de cámeras regenerativas selladas dispuestas en una relación lado con lado, las cuelas actúan como intercambiadores de calor, los quemadores son arreglados en una serie de puertos que están asociados con la región de fundición de vidrio del horno. El sistema incluye medios para suministrar el combustible pulverizado porc ada uno de los quemadores para fundir la material prima par producer el vidrio. Las emisiones de los gases de combustión, que se producen por el proceso de combustión del combustible en el horno, son controladas para mantener limpios los gases de combustión y para reducir las emisiones o impurezas generadas por el combustible tal como SOx, NOx y partículas. Las cámaras regenerativas son manufacturadas con refractarios seleccionados de magnesio, alúmina-sílica-zirconia o magnesia y zirconia-silicato, para contrarrestar los efectos abrasivos y erosivos que se producen por el proceso de combustión de combustible en la cámara de fundición de vidrio. Tambièn se provee un quemador para suministrar el coque de petróleo, el quemador incluyendo medios para simultáneamente mezclar un aire primario y una mezcla de aire-combustible pulverizado para el quemado del combustible pulverizado.
column15: OLIN NUNEZ MIGUEL ANGEL;;CABRERA LLANOS ROBERTO MARCOS;;LOREDO MURPHY JORGE;;MARGAIN ORTIZ GUSTAVO;;VALADEZ CASTILLO RAFAEL;;FLORES PONCE JUAN GABRIEL

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR FEEDING AND BURNING A PULVERIZED FUEL IN A GLASS MELTING FURNACE, AND BURNER FOR USE IN THE SAME
column13: A METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR FEEDING AND BURNING PULVERIZED FUEL, SUCH AS PETROLEUM COKE, IN A GLASS MELTING FURNACE, WHICH INCLUDES A GLASS MELTING (10) AND A PLURALITY OF BURNERS (48 AH,50 A-H) ASSOCIATED WITH A PAIR OF SEALED REGENERATIVE CHAMBERS (28, 30) DISPOSED SIDE-BY-SIDE WHICH ACT AS EAT EXCHANGERS, THE BURNERS (48 A-H, 50 A-H) ARE ARRANGED IN A SERIES OF PORTS (32, 34) THAT ARE ASSOCIATED WITH THE GLASS MELTING REGION OF THE FURNACE. THE SYSTEM INCLUDES MEANS FOR SUPPLYING THE PULVERIZED FUEL BY EACH ONE OF THE BURNERS (48 A-H, 50 A-H) OR MELTING GLASS RAW MATERIALS. THE EMISSIONS OF FLUE GASES PRODUCED BY THE COMBUSTION PROCESS OF THE FUEL IN THE FURNACE ARE CONTROLLED IN ORDER TO MAINTAIN CLEAN THE FLUE GASES AND FOR REDUCING THE EMISSION OF IMPURITIES FROM THE FUEL SUCH AS SOX, NOX AND PARTICULATES. THE REGENERATIVE CHAMBERS (28, 30) ARE MANUFACTURED WITH SELECTED REFRACTORIES SUCH AS, MAGNESIUM, ZIRCON-SILICA-ALUMINA OR MAGNESIA AND ZIRCONIUM-SILICATE, FOR CONTERACTING THE EROSIVE AND CORROSIVE EFFECTS PRODUCED BY THE COMBUSTION PROCESS OF THE FUEL IN THE GLASS MELTING CHAMBER. A BURNER (48A-H, 50A-H) IS ALSO PROVIDED FOR FEEDING THE PETROLEUM COKE, THE BURNER INCLUDING MEANS TO SIMULTANEOUSLY MIX A PRIMARY AIR AND PULVERIZED FUEL-AIR MIXTURE FOR THE BURNING OF THE PULVERIZED FUEL.(FIG 1)

column12: METODO Y SISTEMA PARA ALIMENTAR Y QUEMAR UN COMBUSTIBLE PULVERIZADO EN UN HORNO DE FUNDICION DE VIDRIOY, QUEMADOR PARA USO CON EL MISMO.
column13: UN METODO Y UN SISTEMA PARA ALIMENTAR Y QUEMAR UN COMBUSTIBLE PULVERIZADO, TAL COMO, COQUE DE PETROLEO, EN UN HORNO DE FUNDICION DE VIDRIO, EL CUAL INCLUYE UNA REGION DE FUNDICION DE VIDRIO Y UNA PLURALIDAD DE QUEMADORES ASOCIADOS CON UN PAR DE CAMARAS REGENERATIVAS SELLADAS DISPUESTAS EN UNA RELACION LADO CON LADO, LAS CUALES ACTUAN COMO INTERCAMBIADORES DE CALOR, LOS QUEMADORES SON ARREGLADOS EN UNA SERIE DE PUERTOS QUE ESTAN ASOCIADOS CON LA REGION DE FUNDICION DE VIDRIO DEL HORNO. LAS EMISIONES DE LOS GASES DE COMBUSTION, QUE SE PRODUCEN POR EL PROCESO DE COMBUSTION DEL COMBUSTIBLE EN EL HORNO, SON CONTROLADAS PARA MANTENER LIMPIOS LOS GASES DE COMBUSTION Y PARA REDUCIR LAS EMISIONES O IMPUREZAS GENERADAS POR EL COMBUSTIBLE TAL COMO SOX, NOX Y PARTICULAS. EL SISTEMA INCLUYE MEDIOS PARA SUMINISTRAR EL COMBUSTIBLE PULVERIZADO POR CADA UNO DE LOS QUEMADORES PARA FUNDIR LA MATERIA PRIMA PARA PRODUCIR EL VIDRIO.

column12: Method and system for feeding and burning a pulverized fuel in a glass melting furnace, and burner for use in the same
column13: A method and system for feeding and burning pulverized fuel, such as petroleum coke, in a glass melting furnace, which includes a glass melting and a plurality of burners associated with a pair of sealed regenerative chambers disposed side-by-side which act as heat exchangers, the burners are arranged in a series of ports that are associated with the glass melting region of the furnace. The system includes means for supplying the pulverized fuel by each one of the burners for melting glass raw materials. The emissions of flue gases produced by the combustion process of the fuel in the furnace are controlled in order to maintain clean the flue gases and for reducing the emission of impurities from the fuel such as SO ₓ , NO ₓ and particulates. The regenerative chambers are manufactured with selected refractories such as, magnesium, zircon-silica-alumina or magnesia and zirconium-silicate, for conteracting the erosive and corrosive effects produced by the combustion process of the fuel in the glass melting chamber. A burner is also provided for feeding the petroleum coke, the burner including means to simultaneously mix a primary air and pulverized fuel-air mixture for the burning of the pulverized fuel.

column12: ANTI-VANDALISM INTEGRAL SYSTEM IN BUILDING FOR ELECTRIC TRANSFORMER AND CATHODIC PROTECTION RECTIFIER.
column13: The Anti-vandalism Integral System in Building for Electric Transformer and Cathodic Protection Rectifier comprises the construction of the protection and safeguarding building, which is a robust and solid structure based on steel rods and reinforced concrete of considerable thickness, which makes it difficult for third parties to access, therefore avoiding vandalism. The Building is made of reinforced concrete, highly resistant to impacts of manual tools caused by vandalism or by weather conditions. The building has a low portion for protecting the medium voltage electric transformer, shunts box and access to the manhole containing the rectifier components, the power supply for the rectifier and general power supply. Also contains the forced ventilation system directed to the exterior. The rectifier-manhole contains in the inner portion thereof the components of the rectifier for cathodic protection arranged in a platform useful as a rectifier structure, where the elements of the rec tifier itself are mounted, such as tap´s, complete wave rectifier diodes, measurement instruments, fuse for the rectifier output, shunts, direct current output terminals for the connection of the structure and the anodes bed. Includes a heat dissipation system through heat transferring cells and acceleration of the heat expulsion to the exterior by means of an axial fan through the ventilation pipe arranged in the inner portion of the building at the lower portion thereof to the exterior, said air being released by the upper portion of the building (Fig. 6 General Diagram of the Anti-Vandalism System).

column12: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR INCREASED OBSERVATION
column13: The invention relates to a system for increased observation, enabling the improvement of the information received by a user observing an event, said system comprising: a means for capturing images located at the same point, said means capturing individual images of the event a processing means provided with storage means, for linking the individual captured images in order to obtain a single mosaic image, and for storing all of the images a transmission means for transmitting the individual captured images to the processing means a display means comprising a processor, used by the user to view both the current images and the previously recorded images and to obtain additional analysis functions and a communication means for communicating the images from the processing means to the display means.

column12: Méthode de modélisation d’un siège de véhicule automobile
column13: L’invention concerne une méthode de modélisation (4) d’un siège de véhicule automobile afin de permettre de modéliser son comportement statique et dynamique dans le but de mieux comprendre la propagation de vibrations dans le siège et résultant du roulage du véhicule automobile équipé d’un tel siège. Pour ce faire, la méthode de modélisation (4) comporte une étape de modélisation tridimensionnelle (421) du siège, une étape de caractérisation (423) d’au moins une propriété mécanique d’une mousse équipant une assise du siège dans des conditions statiques, une étape de modélisation statique puis une étape de modélisation dynamique du siège à partir des résultats obtenus lors de l’étape de modélisation statique. Figure à publier avec l’abrégé : Fig. 2

column12: VOLUME COMPENSATING DEVICE FOR ADSORBENT FILL COMPENSATION IN AN EVAPORATIVE EMISSIONS CANISTER
column13: A volume compensating device for adsorbent fill compensation in an evaporative emissions canister is provided. The device includes a planar base plate having first and second opposite surfaces. A plurality of legs extend away from the first surface of the base plate. The legs each include a terminal free end. A foot is formed at the terminal free end of each leg. An evaporative emissions canister including the volume compensating device is also provided. The evaporative emissions canister includes an adsorbent filled chamber and a void space separated from the adsorbent filled chamber by a partition. The volume compensating device is disposed in the void space. The second surface of the base plate engages the partition, the feet of the legs engage an inner surface of the void space, and the legs resiliently urge the partition towards the adsorbent filled chamber, thereby preventing the adsorbent from entering the void space.

column12: METHOD AND APPARATUS TO SYNTHESIZE ZINC-ALUMINUM OXIDE NANOPARTICLES (ZNAL2O4) FOR APPLICATIONS ON PROTECTIVE SURFACES OF SOLAR PANELS.
column13: The present invention discloses a novel method for synthesizing zinc-aluminum oxide (ZnAl2O4) nanoparticles for applications in protective surfaces of solar panels, which consists of a combustion method using zinc nitrate, aluminum nitrate, hydrazine or carbohydrazide as fuel and water as solvent. The said method produces complex oxide powders, such as zinc aluminate, quickly, efficiently, and cheaply, overcoming the drawbacks of solid-state reaction (SSR) techniques that take one to two days and require temperatures higher than 1000 °C or sol-gel annealing at high temperatures and times longer than 10 hours. Also, the size of the synthesized powders can vary between 50 nm and microns depending on the amount of fuel added, producing many different samples per day or a single compound in large quantities. Also, it discloses a combustion synthesis reactor apparatus for carrying out the synthesis method, including a sealed stainless-steel vessel with a controlled atmosphere and a heating jacket.

column12: INSTANT MESSAGING SYSTEM
column13: The invention relates to an instant messaging system comprising an instant messaging application (20) for communication between users (100) and machines (70) by means of natural language, which also comprises a server (30) that allows the mobile terminal (10) to communicate with an electronic device (60) which, in turn, communicates and acts on the machine (70), by means of an API (40) via which the user (100) accesses the machine (70). The electronic device (60) connects to the server (30) via a router terminal (50). Said electronic device (60) comprises hardware configurable by means of the instant messaging application (20) and includes an interpreter module (62) for translating between natural language messages interchanged by the instant messaging application (20) and specific instructions from the machine (70). The interpreter (62) is implemented by means of firmware embedded in the hardware of the electronic device (60) and is based on artificial intelligence techniques and ontologies.

column12: METHOD OF INCREASING TRANS-RESVERATROL ENDOGENOUS CONTENT IN WINE
column13: The invention relates to a method of increasing the trans-resveratrol endogenous content in wine, consisting in applying short anoxic treatments to the grape, preferably with dry nitrogen, prior to the winemaking process. Trans-resveratrol is a molecule that is produced naturally by vines and other plants as a self-defence mechanism against fungal infections, different types of stress, chemical products, etc. The treatment is characterised in that the grape is subjected to short periods (less than 24 hours) in an atmosphere with a very low O2 content and said treatment can be applied in order to increase the trans-resveratrol endogenous content of the grape significantly. Subsequently, the trans-resveratrol passes to the wine during the winemaking process, such as to produce a trans-resveratrol-rich wine.

column12: ELICITING AND STIMULATING PLANT GROWTH COMPOSITION.
column13: The present disclosure is related to a liquid eliciting and stimulating plant growth composition for agricultural use. The composition contains lignosulfonates (LS) obtained from barley straw and Trichoderma harzianum conidia, which in turn, is obtained from a solid culture using delignified straw with sulfite as a support. It was found that the combined use of Trichoderma harzianum along with lignosulfonates stimulates plant growth and induces plant defense mechanisms acting as elicitors. The increment of radicular weight of the plant was of 36%, and the size growth was of 62%, as for the aerial part, the weight increase was of 37% g and 11% in size. On the other hand, there was an increase in the activity of the Phenylalanine ammonium lyase (PAL) enzyme in the root of 302% and in the part of the leaf and stem, of 292%. The present invention is unique in that the same presents a new product with biostimulating and eliciting activity for use in corn with potential for application in agriculture.

column12: MOTORIZED DEVICE FOR THE TRAINING OF ISOMETRIC AND DYNAMIC FORCE (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)
column13: Motorized device for the evaluation and training of isometric and dynamic strength. The invention consists of a device that allows the training of isometric strength and dynamic strength, through exercises in suspension. To do this, the proposed device makes use of motorized systems that allow the subject's grip position to be varied depending on their physiological characteristics and the type of exercise. column12: COOKING HOB DEVICE
column13: The invention relates to a cooking hob device (12) which comprises at least one at least partially transparent front unit (14), in particular a plate front unit, and at least one structural layer (16) arranged on at least one portion of the front unit (14). To achieve a simple production process, it is proposed that the structural layer (16) be formed by applying a fluid (26) to the front unit (14).

column12: METHOD OF FIXING WEAR ELEMENT ON FRONT EDGE OF SUPPORT AND CORRESPONDING FIXING MEANS
column13: The invention relates to a method of fixing a wear element (2) on the front edge of a support (1) using fixing means, where the wear element (2) comprises two arms (3) with first through openings (4)and the support (1) has a second through opening (5) sandwiched between the first through openings (4). The fixing means comprise a C-shaped first body (6), a wedge (14), ratchet means (24) between both and a second body (8), which are housed in the openings in an assembled position. The method consists of positioning the first body (6) and the second body (8) in the openings, inserting the wedge(14) between both, positioning a screw (21) between the wedge (14) and the second body (8) and screwing it in such a way that the wedge (14) moves with respect to the second body (8) and the first body (6) until the wedge (14) reaches its assembled position, and at least partially unscrewing the screw (21) and removing the screw (21) from the fixing means.

column12: PROTECTIVE BARRIER FOR SNOWSTORMS
column13: Protective barrier for winds carrying snow and sand, for installation near communication routes in order to prevent the accumulation of snow or sand on the road. The barrier is formed by joining several screens made of a set of blades that are arranged horizontally, superposed on one another at regular distances, joined with vertical posts by anchoring their ends to several rectangular plates that are inserted in the vertical post using a ring on the plate.

column12: Method for manufacturing a domestic appliance and domestic appliance
column13: Die Erfindung geht aus von einem Verfahren zur Herstellung zumindest einer Struktur (10) in wenigstens einer an zumindest einem Seitenteilbereich (12) eines Grundkörpers (14) angeordneten Schicht (16) durch eine Laserbearbeitung. Um ein gattungsgemäßes Verfahren bereitzustellen, welches unter zumindest weitgehender Vermeidung einer Beschädigung eines Grundkörpers ein vorteilhaftes Einbringen einer klaren und detaillierten Struktur in eine an dem Grundkörper angeordnete Schicht ermöglicht, wird vorgeschlagen, dass die Laserbearbeitung mit einem Laserstrahl (18) einer Wellenlänge (λ) zwischen 500 nm und 1500 nm durchgeführt wird.

column12: Procedimiento de fijación de un elemento de desgaste sobre el borde anterior de un soporte y medios de fijación correspondientes
column13: Procedimiento de fijación de un elemento de desgaste (2) sobre el borde anterior de un soporte (1) mediante unos medios de fijación, donde dicho elemento de desgaste (2) comprende dos brazos (3) que se extienden hacia atrás enfrentados entre sí, dejando entre ambos un espacio para alojar dicho borde anterior, definiendo así una posición montada, donde dichos brazos (3) presentan unos primeros orificios pasantes (4) encarados entre sí y dicho soporte (1) presenta un segundo orificio pasante (5) que, en dicha posición montada, está intercalado entre dichos primeros orificios pasantes (4), donde dichos primeros y segundo orificios pasantes (4, 5), en dicha posición montada, definen un eje de montaje, donde dichos medios de fijación comprenden un primer cuerpo (6) con forma de C, una cuña (14) y un segundo cuerpo (8), donde, en dicha posición montada, dicho primer cuerpo (6), dicha cuña (14) y dicho segundo cuerpo (8) están alojados en dichos orificios, estando dicha cuña (14) entre dicho primer cuerpo (6) y dicho segundo cuerpo (8), y donde, en dicha posición montada, entre dicha cuña (14) y dicho segundo cuerpo (8) queda un espacio hueco (19) apto para alojar el vástago (20) de un tornillo (21), dicho espacio hueco (19) definiendo un eje de vástago (22) coincidente con el eje de dicho vástago (20), en el que el método comprende las siguientes etapas: - posicionar dicho primer cuerpo (6) y dicho segundo cuerpo (8) en dichos orificios en su posición montada, - insertar dicha cuña (14) entre dicho primer cuerpo (6) y dicho segundo cuerpo (8), donde entre dicho primer cuerpo (6) y dicha cuña (14) hay unos medios de trinquete (24) aptos para permitir el desplazamiento relativo entre dicha cuña (14) y dicho primer cuerpo (6) según dicho eje de montaje y sentido descendente y son aptos para bloquear el desplazamiento relativo entre dicha cuña (14) y dicho primer cuerpo (6) según dicho eje de montaje y sentido ascendente, caracterizado por que el método comprende asimismo las etapas siguientes - posicionar un tornillo (21) en dicho espacio hueco (19) con su cabeza en contacto con una superficie de apoyo (23) y con su extremo roscado en una superficie roscada (13), donde dicha superficie de apoyo (23) es apta para desplazarse conjuntamente con dicha cuña (14) y dicha superficie roscada (13) es solidaria con dicho segundo cuerpo (8) o, alternativamente, dicha superficie de apoyo (23) es solidaria con dicho segundo cuerpo (8) y dicha superficie roscada (13) es apta para desplazarse conjuntamente con dicha cuña (14), - enroscar dicho tornillo (21) en dicha superficie roscada (13) de manera que dicha cuña (14) se desplaza, según dicho eje de montaje, respecto de dicho segundo cuerpo (8) y dicho primer cuerpo (6) hasta que dicha cuña (14) alcanza su posición montada, - desenroscar, por lo menos parcialmente, dicho tornillo (21) de dicha superficie roscada (13), liberar dicho tornillo (21) de dicho segundo cuerpo (8) y de dicha cuña (14) y extraer dicho tornillo (21) de dichos medios de fijación.

column12: OVERVOLTAGE-PROTECTED HOUSEHOLD APPLIANCE DEVICE
column13: The invention proceeds from a household appliance device which comprises a main part (10a; 10b; 10c) and at least one layer (12a; 12b; 12c) that is arranged on at least one side section (14a; 14b; 14c) of the main part (10a; 10b; 10c) and has at least two metallic portions (16a, 18a; 16b, 18b; 16c, 18c) and an insulation region (20a; 20b; 20c) which insulates the portions (16a, 18a; 16b, 18b; 16c, 18c) electrically from one another. In order to provide a household appliance device of the type in question which has increased operating safety, the insulation region (20a; 20b; 20c) is designed to provide an overvoltage protection of at least 1500 V.

column12: Procedimiento de fijación de un elemento de desgaste sobre el borde anterior de un soporte y medios de fijación correspondientes.
column13: PROCEDIMIENTO DE FIJACIÓN DE UN ELEMENTO DE DESGASTE (2) SOBRE EL BORDE ANTERIOR DE UN SOPORTE (1) MEDIANTE UNOS MEDIOS DE FIJACIÓN DONDE EL ELEMENTO DE DESGASTE (2) COMPRENDE DOS BRAZOS (3) CON UNOS PRIMEROS ORIFICIOS PASANTES (4) Y EL SOPORTE (1) PRESENTA UN SEGUNDO ORIFICIO PASANTE (5) INTERCALADO ENTRE LOS PRIMEROS ORIFICIOS PASANTES (4). LOS MEDIOS DE FIJACIÓN COMPRENDEN UN PRIMER CUERPO (6) CON FORMA DE C, UNA CUÑA (14), UNOS MEDIOS DE TRINQUETE (24) ENTRE AMBOS Y UN SEGUNDO CUERPO (8), QUE, EN UNA POSICIÓN MONTADA, ESTÁN ALOJADOS EN LOS ORIFICIOS. EL PROCEDIMIENTO CONSISTE EN POSICIONAR EL PRIMER CUERPO (6) Y EL SEGUNDO CUERPO (8) EN LOS ORIFICIOS, INSERTAR LA CUÑA (14) ENTRE AMBOS, POSICIONAR UN TORNILLO (21) ENTRE LA CUÑA (14) Y EL SEGUNDO CUERPO (8) Y ENROSCARLO DE MANERA QUE LA CUÑA (14) SE DESPLAZA RESPECTO DEL SEGUNDO CUERPO (8) Y EL PRIMER CUERPO (6) HASTA QUE LA CUÑA (14) ALCANZA SU POSICIÓN MONTADA, Y DESENROSCAR, AL MENOS PARCIALMENTE, EL TORNILLO (21) Y EXTRAER EL TORNILLO (21) DE LOS MEDIOS DE FIJACIÓN.

column12: Selbstkalibrierendes Formprüfsystem und Verfahren zum Verwenden von diesem für das Prüfen eines Artikels
column13: Es werden ein selbstkalibrierendes Formprüfsystem und ein entsprechendes Verfahren zum Prüfen eines Artikels vorgesehen. Das selbstkalibrierende Formprüfsystem (100) umfasst: eine Prüfeinrichtung (110), die konfiguriert ist zum visuellen Prüfen oder Messen eines auf einem Träger (11) platzierten Artikels (10); ein Bewegungsstellglied (120), das konfiguriert ist zum Bewegen der Prüfeinrichtung (110) entlang einer vorbestimmten Bewegungsbahn relativ zu dem Träger (11) und dem darauf platzierten Artikel (10); ein Korrekturglied (150), das fix in Bezug auf den Träger (11) positioniert ist; einen Distanzsensor (130), der fix relativ zu der Prüfeinrichtung (110) positioniert ist und konfiguriert ist zum Erfassen eines ersten Abstands (d) zwischen dem Distanzsensor (130) und dem Korrekturglied (150) während der Bewegung der Prüfeinrichtung (110) durch das Bewegungsstellglied (120); und eine Steuereinrichtung (170), die konfiguriert ist zum Kommunizieren mit dem Bewegungsstellglied (120) und dem Distanzsensor (130), zum Bestimmen einer Abweichung zwischen einer tatsächlichen Bewegungsbahn der durch das Bewegungsstellglied (120) bewegten Prüfeinrichtung (110) und der vorbestimmten Bewegungsbahn basierend auf dem ersten Abstand (d) und zum Steuern des Bewegungsstellglieds (120) basierend auf der Abweichung für eine Bewegung der Prüfeinrichtung (110) entlang eines im Wesentlichen mit der vorbestimmten Bewegungsbahn übereinstimmenden Pfads.

column12: PROCEDIMIENTO DE FIJACION DE UN ELEMENTO DE DESGASTE SOBRE EL BORDE ANTERIOR DE UN SOPORTE Y MEDIOS DE FIJACION CORRESPONDIENTES
column13: Procedimiento de fijacion de un elemento de desgaste (2) sobre el borde anterior de un soporte (1) mediante unos medios de fijacion donde el elemento de desgaste (2) comprende dos brazos (3) con unos primeros orificios pasantes (4) y el soporte (1) presenta un segundo orificio pasante (5) intercalado entre los primeros orificios pasantes (4). Los medios de fijacion comprenden un primer cuerpo (6) con forma de C, una cuna (14), unos medios de trinquete (24) entre ambos y un segundo cuerpo (8), que, en una posicion montada, estan alojados en los orificios. El procedimiento consiste en posicionar el primer cuerpo (6) y el segundo cuerpo (8) en los orificios, insertar la cuna (14) entre ambos, posicionar un tornillo (21) entre la cuna (14) y el segundo cuerpo (8) y enroscarlo de manera que la cuna (14) se desplaza respecto del segundo cuerpo (8) y el primer cuerpo (6) hasta que la cuna (14) alcanza su posicion montada, y desenroscar, al menos parcialmente, el tornillo (21) y extraer el tornillo (21) de los medios de fijacion.

column12: METHOD FOR FASTENING WEAR ELEMENT ON LEADING EDGE OF SUPPORT AND CORRESPONDING FASTENER
column13: FIELD: digging works.SUBSTANCE: group of inventions relates to digging machines with wear elements such as teeth or nodes. A fastener serves to fasten a wear element on the leading edge of a support, wherein the wear element has two arms passing backwards opposite each other, leaving a space between them for placing the leading edge, thereby determining the assembled state. The arms have the first through holes facing each other, and the support has the second through hole located between the first through holes in the assembled state. In the assembled state, the first and second through holes determine the assembly axis. The fastener contains the C-shaped first case, a wedge and the second case, while in the assembled state, the first case, the wedge and the second case are placed in the mentioned holes. The wedge is located between the first case and the second case, and in the assembled state there is a hollow space between the wedge and the second case adapted to accommodate a screw rod, wherein the hollow space determines the rod axis coinciding with the axis of the rod. The fastener additionally contains a ratchet device located between the wedge and the first case, a threaded surface that moves together with the second case, the axis of which coincides with the rod axis, a support surface on the wedge, wherein the support surface is located next to the rod axis and is oriented upwards, and there is free access to the support surface from above in the direction of the rod axis. In this case, the ratchet device provides the possibility of relative movement of the wedge and the first case along the assembly axis in the downward direction and provides the possibility of blocking the relative movement of the wedge and the first case along the assembly axis in the upward direction.EFFECT: increase in the quality and service life of the fastener, reducing the risk of disconnection due to breakage.17 cl, 18 dwg

column12: MOVABLE PLATFORM DEVICE
column13: A device which comprises a fixed base (1) on which a movable platform (2) is arranged in the form of a sweeping spherical cap, the movable platform (2) having, pivotably mounted underneath, a projecting shaft (21) provided with a first ball joint (3) allowing rotation in the fixed base (1), but being fixed axially, said projecting shaft (21) comprising an extension (22). Said fixed base (1) is provided with linear actuators (4a and 4b) in a 90° angular arrangement, the second linear actuator (4b) having, fixed to its movable end, a laterally projecting arm (6). Said arm (6) has, coupled thereto, a second ball joint (61) allowing rotation and sliding on the extension (22) of the shaft (21).

column12: Protective barrier for snowstorms
column13: Protective barrier for snowstorms, for installation near communication routes in order to prevent the accumulation of snow or sand on the road. The barrier is formed by joining several screens made of a set of blades that are arranged horizontally, superposed on one another at regular distances, joined with vertical posts by anchoring their ends to several rectangular plates that are inserted in the vertical post using a ring on the plate.

column12: METHOD OF FIXING A WEAR ELEMENT ON THE FRONT EDGE OF A SUPPORT AND CORRESPONDING FIXING MEANS
column13: The invention relates to a method of fixing a wear element ( 2 ) on the front edge of a support ( 1 ) using fixing means, where the wear element ( 2 ) comprises two arms ( 3 ) with first through openings ( 4 ) and the support ( 1 ) has a second through opening ( 5 ) sandwiched between the first through openings ( 4 ). The fixing means comprise a C-shaped first body ( 6 ), a wedge ( 14 ), ratchet means ( 24 ) between both and a second body ( 8 ), which are housed in the openings in an assembled position. The method consists of positioning the first body ( 6 ) and the second body ( 8 ) in the openings, inserting the wedge ( 14 ) between both, positioning a screw ( 21 ) between the wedge ( 14 ) and the second body ( 8 ) and screwing it in such a way that the wedge ( 14 ) moves with respect to the second body ( 8 ) and the first body ( 6 ) until the wedge ( 14 ) reaches its assembled position, and at least partially unscrewing the screw ( 21 ) and removing the screw ( 21 ) from the fixing means.

column12: METHOD OF INCREASING TRANS-RESVERATROL ENDOGENOUS CONTENT IN WINE
column13: The invention relates to a method of increasing the trans-resveratrol endogenous content in wine, consisting in applying short anoxic treatments to the grape, preferably with dry nitrogen, prior to the winemaking process. Trans-resveratrol is a molecule that is produced naturally by vines and other plants as a self-defence mechanism against fungal infections, different types of stress, chemical products, etc. The treatment is characterised in that the grape is subjected to short periods (less than 24 hours) in an atmosphere with a very low O2 content and said treatment can be applied in order to increase the trans-resveratrol endogenous content of the grape significantly. Subsequently, the trans-resveratrol passes to the wine during the winemaking process, such as to produce a trans-resveratrol-rich wine.

column12: UTILIZACION DE UNA INYECCION PREVIA DE POLIDOCAMOL EN FORMA DE MICROESPUMA PARA LA EXTIRPACION INDOLORA DE VARICES MEDIANTE LASER.
column13: La presente invención se refiere a la utilización de una inyección previa de polidocanol en forma de microespuma para la extirpación indolora de varices mediante láser. Dicha utilización consiste en la combinación de 1) el tratamiento previo de las lesiones vasculares mediante la inyección de una sustancia hidroalcohólica hipermolar inyectable en la vena; 2) la inyección de dicha sustancia en forma de microespuma; y 3) la aplicación sobre las varices de la emisión de un láser de Nd-Yag en su emisión fundamental (o de cualquier otro láser que emita en una longitud de onda cercana a la resonante de la sustancia inyectada). En concreto la presente invención se refiere a dicha utilización cuando la sustancia empleada como sustancia inyectable es el polidocanol en forma de microespuma. La inyección de dicha sustancia hidroalcohólica en forma de microespuma permite reducir la fluencia del láser en un 40%.

column12: METODO PARA AUMENTAR EL CONTENIDO ENDOGENO DE TRANS-RESVERATROL EN EL VINO.
column13: Método para aumentar el contenido endógeno de trans-resveratrol en el vino. La presente invención se refiere a un procedimiento para aumentar el contenido endógeno de trans-resveratrol en vinos que consiste en la aplicación de tratamientos anóxicos cortos a la uva, preferentemente con nitrógeno seco, previamente al procedimiento de vinificación. El trans-resveratrol es una molécula producida de forma natural por la vid y otras plantas como medio de autodefensa frente a las infecciones fúngicas, diversos tipos de estrés, productos químicos, etc. La aplicación del tratamiento, caracterizado porque se somete la uva a cortos periodos de tiempo (inferiores a 24 horas) en atmósfera con muy bajo contenido en O2, permite aumentar de forma importante su contenido endógeno de trans-resveratrol uva. Posteriormente, el trans-resveratrol pasa al vino durante el proceso de vinificación, produciendo de este modo un vino enriquecido en trans-resveratrol.

column12: Sulfur coated fertilizer with polymer coating
column13: The present invention relates to a sulfur-coated granulated fertilizer having a polymer coating on a sulfur layer, wherein the polymer coating comprises polycaprolactone. A sulfur-coated granulated fertilizer can have an aliphatic polyester (one polymer coating) on a sulfur layer and have the following properties when tested in a standardized water immersion test: a. The initial release of about 20% or less, preferably about 15% or less, of nutrients within 24 hours; b. Release of a nutrient content of more than 4%, preferably about 5% or more, between the fourteenth day and the twenty-first day from the beginning of the water immersion test.

column12: Method of manufacturing a control device, and control device
column13: Die Erfindung geht aus von einem Verfahren zu einer Herstellung einer Bedienvorrichtung (10a-c) mit wenigstens einem Bedienelement (12a-c). Um eine gattungsgemäße Vorrichtung mit verbesserten Eigenschaften hinsichtlich einer Reinigung und eines Bedienkomforts bereitzustellen, wird vorgeschlagen, dass das Bedienelement (12a-c) aus einem Rohelement (14a-c) durch eine gezielte Veränderung wenigstens eines Parameters zumindest eines Umgebungsbereichs (16a-c) einer Oberfläche (18a-c) des Rohelements (14a-c) hergestellt wird, um wenigstens eine Sichtbarkeit einer Verschmutzung der Oberfläche (18a-c) zumindest wesentlich zu reduzieren.

column12: PROCESS FOR PRODUCING A HOTPLATE FOR A HOB
column13: The invention relates to a process for producing a hotplate (2) for a hob (1), in which at least one metallic layer (10) and a further layer (11) under the metallic layer (10) are formed on an underside (9) of the hotplate (2), where, after application of the at least two layers (10, 11), the metallic layer (10) is altered in regions by means of the laser light of a laser beam (12) so that the further layer (11) produced under the metallic layer (10) can be recognized on viewing the hob (1) on the upper side (3).

column12: Process for producing a hotplate for a hob
column13: In a method for embodying a hotplate for a hob, at least one metallic layer and a further layer under the metallic layer are formed on an underside of the hotplate. After applying the at least one metallic layer and the further layer, at least one region of the metallic layer is changed by a laser light of a laser beam so that the further layer is recognized when viewing the hob on a topside.

column12: Procedimiento para fabricar una placa de campo de cocción para un campo de cocción
column13: La invención se refiere a un procedimiento para fabricar una placa de campo de cocción (2) para un campo de cocción (1), en el cual, junto a un lado inferior (9) de la placa de campo de cocción (2), es aplicada, al menos, una capa metálica (10) y otra capa (11) a continuación debajo de la capa metálica (10), donde, tras aplicarse las capas (10, 11), la capa metálica (10) es modificada por secciones mediante luz láser de un rayo láser (12), de modo que la otra capa (11) aplicada debajo de la capa metálica (10), tras ser modificada la capa metálica (10), es visible desde un lado superior (3) de la placa de campo de cocción (2).

column12: Hob plate e.g. induction hob plate for hob, has base to which thermo chromic coating is provided and portions in which thermo chromic coating is partially disabled
column13: The hob plate (12) has a base (14) to which thermo chromic coating (16) is provided. The thermo chromic coating is partially disabled in portions (21-29). The thermo chromic coating is partially fixed in state in which the color of the operatively active thermo chromic coating corresponds to the heated area. The thermochromic coating is formed from bisphenol A-compound. The thermochromic coating is disabled by laser bombardment partially. Independent claims are included for the following: (1) a method for manufacturing hob and (2) a hob. .

column12: SYSTEM FOR SUPPLYING AND EXCHANGING A BATTERY BANK IN AN ELECTRIC VEHICLE FOR COMMERCIAL USE
column13: The present invention refers to a battery bank supply and replacement system in an electric vehicle, particularly for an electric vehicle used for the distribution of commercial goods. The system of the present invention comprises a battery bank mounted in a metal structure that is structurally coupled to a metal mounting structure arranged on the electric vehicle and a handling device consisting of a movable base. The movable base is aligned and secured to the metal mounting structure of the vehicle for removal of the battery bank from the vehicle towards the handling device or the other way round.La presente invention se refiere a una válvula de descompresion y, más particularmente, a una valvula de descompresión automatica.

column12: SYSTEM FOR SUPPLYING AND EXCHANGING A BATTERY BANK IN AN ELECTRIC VEHICLE FOR COMMERCIAL USE
column13: The invention relates to a system for supplying and exchanging a battery bank in an electric vehicle, in particular for an electric vehicle used for the distribution of commercial products. The system according to the invention comprises a battery bank assembled in a metal structure that is structurally coupled to a metal linking structure disposed on the electric vehicle, and a manipulation device consisting of a mobile base. The mobile base is aligned with and secured to the metal linking structure of the vehicle in order to remove the battery bank from the vehicle towards the manipulation device, or vice versa.

column12: METHOD FOR TREATING DIABETES BASED ON THE MODULATION OF NH4ALPHA GENE EXPRESSION
column13: The invention regards a screening method for screening for modulators of the expression of hnf4α from the hnf4α P2 promoter region, which method comprises the steps of obtaining a transcription reporter system comprising a nucleotide construct comprising a reporter gene under control of the hnf4α P2 promoter reg ion corresponding to nucleotide 1 to 1447 of the sequence shown in the Sequence listing as SEQ ID No. 1 or a fragment thereof, contacting the transcription reporter system with a putative modulator and assaying for a change in the level of expression of the reporter gene.

column12: System for supplying and exchanging a battery bank in an electric vehicle for commercial use
column13: The invention relates to a system for supplying and exchanging a battery bank in an electric vehicle, in particular for an electric vehicle used for the distribution of commercial products. The systemaccording to the invention comprises a battery bank assembled in a metal structure that is structurally coupled to a metal linking structure disposed on the electric vehicle, and a manipulation device consisting of a mobile base.
