column12: PROTOTIPO CLASIFICADOR DE CAFE CEREZO CON RECONOCIMIENTO DE IMAGENES MEDIANTE APRENDIZAJE AUTOMATICO
column13: La invencion denominada prototipo clasificador de cafe cereza con reconocimiento de imagen mediante aprendizaje automatico, este esta compuesto por una tolva de entrada con control de flujo, equipada con una rejilla de control de caida para regular el paso de los granos hacia el siguiente proceso. En el sistema, se incluye un preseleccionador de mallas de alta precision que opera mediante una rotacion constante. Esta unidad se encarga de separar de manera efectiva los granos pequenos de los grandes, asegurando una clasificacion optima. Los granos pequenos son expulsados por una salida dedicada para su recoleccion, mientras que los granos grandes y aptos para el siguiente paso son dirigidos hacia el clasificador de cafe. El clasificador de cafe incorpora un software avanzado que utiliza una red neuronal previamente entrenada. Este software realiza un analisis de cada fotograma capturado por una camara de alta resolucion, la cual se encuentra estrategicamente ubicada en el sistema. La red neuronal implementada en el software es capaz de identificar con gran precision y rapidez las diferentes categorias de los granos de cafe, incluyendo los estados de madurez: verde, semi-maduro, maduro, sobremaduro y seco. Para ejecutar la clasificacion efectiva de los granos identificados, se emplea un microcontrolador de ultima generacion, como Arduino. Este microcontrolador recibe las senales del software de clasificacion y activa un rele correspondiente. A traves de este rele, se controla la apertura de una valvula conectada a un compresor de aire de alta presion. El compresor de aire, controlado por el microcontrolador, permite la separacion fisica y precisa de los granos en funcion de su categoria identificada. Cada categoria de granos es direccionada mediante el flujo de aire hacia depositos especificos (deposito para granos maduros, verdes, semi-maduro y seco), optimizando asi el proceso de clasificacion y evitando cualquier mezcla no deseada.

column12: Automatisiertes Teileüberprüfungssystem
column13: Ein Teileüberprüfungssystem (100) umfasst eine Visualisierungsvorrichtung (120), die zum Abbilden eines zu überprüfenden Teils (102) konfiguriert ist und ein digitales Bild des Teils erzeugt. Das Überprüfungssystem umfasst ein Teilüberprüfungsmodul (150), das kommunikativ mit der Visualisierungsvorrichtung verbunden ist und das digitale Bild des Teils empfängt. Das Teilüberprüfungsmodul umfasst ein Bildqualitätsmodul (160). Das Bildqualitätsmodul analysiert das digitale Bild, um festzustellen, ob das digitale Bild einen Qualitätsschwellenwert erreicht. Das Bildqualitätsmodul erzeugt eine Bildqualitätsausgabe auf Grundlage der Analyse des digitalen Bildes. Das Teilüberprüfungsmodul umfasst ein Bildklassifizierungsmodul (170). Das Bildklassifizierungsmodul analysiert das digitale Bild, um das Bild als defektes oder nicht-defektes Teil zu klassifizieren.

column13: The method comprises roughening a first surface portion (14) of a base body (12) using a particle beam, subjecting the first surface portion to a hydrofluoric acid treatment, and roughening a first surface portion of a surface element using the particle beam with a mass flow of 0.5-3.5 g/s. The base body is made of glass-ceramic. The first surface portion of the surface element has an area of less than 9 mm 2>. A second surface portion (18) of the body is arranged on a layer that is deposited by a sputtering process. The first surface portion of the body overlaps the second surface portion.

column12: Method for producing a cooking hob
column13: The method involves connecting profiled elements (16, 18) i.e. constructional element, with a disk unit (14) with hot-melt adhesives (30, 32) before assembly of the profiled elements. A part of the adhesives is applied in form of a line. The hot-melt adhesives are provided between the disk unit and the profiled elements before a connecting process. The adhesives are heated to certain maximum temperature during the connecting process, where the maximum temperature is lower than melting temperature of the adhesives. The disk unit is heated before the connection process. The disk unit is made of a vitreous material. The hot-melt adhesives are designed as paper-thin plates and double sided adhesive bands. An independent claim is also included for a domestic appliance device.

column12: VEGETABLE COMPOSITIONS INCLUDING SECHIUM EDULE EXTRACTS AND HYBRIDS OF THE SAME, AND ITS USE AS HEMATOPOIETIC STEM/PROGENITOR CELL MOBILIZER.
column13: The present disclosure is related to a plant composition comprising extracts of fruits of the Sechium edule genus, nigrum spinosum (vicis (r)) and the hybrid H387 07 (r) (Ievis-bernyano virens (r), amarus silvestris and nigrum spinosum-vicis (r)) variety, for the induction of hematopoietic stem/progenitor cell mobilization. Extracts of the Sechium edule genus, are present in the composition in a range of 400 to 1,600 mg/kg for Sechium edule Nigrum spinosum (vicis (r)) variety; and from eight to 250 mg/kg for the Sechium edule H387 07(r) hybrid. The composition of the present invention induces the increase of the mitotic index in bone marrow promoting the innocuous mobilization of hematopoietic stem/progenitor cells.

column12: MEDIATOR-ENZYME SYSTEM FOR CONTROLLING PITCH DEPOSITS IN PULP AND PAPER PRODUCTION
column13: The invention relates to the use of a mediator-enzyme system, which is characterised in that the enzyme comprises a lacasse-type enzyme and the mediator comprises a chemical compound which acts as a redox intermediate in the enzymatic oxidation, for the elimination of lipophilic compounds (including, among others, sterols that are free and conjugated in the form of esters and glycosides, triglycerides, fatty alcohols and resin acids) which cause deposits in the product, the machinery and the circuits during the production of pulp and paper (both from hardwood and softwood and non-woody plants). The treatment eliminates up to 100 % of the aforementioned lipophilic compounds, depending on the material treated, and, in this way, improves the quality of the pulp obtained, the operation of the industrial installations and the characteristics of the end product.

column13: A flow pattern enhancer system mainly for gas-producing oil wells with liquid load problems, comprising mechanical elements that atomize the liquids accumulated at the bottom of the well facilitating their transport to the surface, by decreasing frictional pressure drops and weight of the hydrostatic column.

column12: ENHANCER SYSTEM OF THE FLOW PATTERN OF GAS WELLS WITH LIQUID LOAD PROBLEMS.
column13: The present invention relates to an enhancer system of flow pattern applied mainly in gas-producing oil wells with liquid load problems, comprising mechanical elements that atomize the liquids accumulated at the bottom of the well facilitating their transport to surface, which is caused by the decrease of frictional pressure drops and weigh of the hydrostatic column. 1. It increases the recovery factor of well hydrocarbons, due to the reduction in the pressure requirement needed to administer the energy of the deposit; 2. It increases the lifting velocity of the produced fluids to a relatively high flow velocity of gas of 4-6 m/s; the gas expansion flows along with the condensed hydrocarbons and water, generating an uniform atomized mixture with lower density, which reduces the pressure gradient flowing in the production piping; 3. It increases the gas production, as the well production is continuous with a steady behavior even during the liquid discharge, it has a remarkable improvem ent in the flow pattern in the production piping by generating a homogenous dispersion of both phases; 4. It decreases the pressure drops along the production piping, as it is not allowed that the liquid accumulates at the bottom of the well; 5. It preserves the deposit energy due to the increase of the bottom pressure flowing; 6. It maintains the liquid production with a steady behavior caused by a improvement in the flow pattern of fluids along the production piping; and 7. It extends the flowing life of the wells as it preserves the energy in the deposit by reducing the pressure drops along the production piping.

column12: Motherboard of domestic appliance with one or more matrix materials produced through a sol-gel process (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)
column13: Motherboard of domestic appliance with one or several matrix materials produced through a sol-gel process. The invention relates to a home appliance base plate (20), in particular, to a cooking field base plate, with one or more matrix materials (24) having a thick phase, composed largely or completely by microparticles of silicon dioxide (58), and a thin phase, and which are produced partially or completely through a sol-gel process. In order to achieve an adjustment of the properties of the home appliance base plate (20) that can be made by a simple technical process, it is proposed that the fine phase comprises particles of aluminum oxide (60) and/or oxide particle of silicon and/or aluminosilicate particles. Also, a method (34) for manufacturing a home appliance base plate (20) is proposed, where the matrix material (s) (24) is obtained by gelling one or several suspensions of silicon dioxide powder in a solvent, and the solvent is formed partially or completely by a colloidal dispersion of aluminum oxide. column12: Hausgerätegrundplatte, insbesondere Kochfeldgrundplatte, zumindest weitgehend bestehend aus einem zumindest teilweise durch einen Sol-Gel-Prozess hergestellten Verbundmaterial
column13: Die Erfindung geht aus von einer Hausgerätegrundplatte (20), insbesondere einer Kochfeldgrundplatte, zumindest weitgehend bestehend aus einem Verbundmaterial (22), das zumindest teilweise durch einen Sol-Gel-Prozess hergestellt ist und das zumindest ein Matrixmaterial (24) und zumindest ein mit dem zumindest einen Matrixmaterial (24) verbundenes Fasermaterial (26) aufweist. Um eine hohe Biegefestigkeit und eine niedrige Wärmeleitfähigkeit des Verbundmaterials (22) zu erreichen, wird vorgeschlagen, dass eine Porosität des Verbundmaterials (22) einen Wert zwischen 20% und 45% aufweist. Ferner wird ein Verfahren zur Herstellung einer Hausgerätegrundplatte (20), insbesondere einer Kochfeldgrundplatte, welche zumindest weitgehend aus einem Verbundmaterial (22) besteht, das zumindest ein Matrixmaterial (24) und zumindest ein mit dem zumindest einen Matrixmaterial (24) verbundenes Fasermaterial (26) aufweist, vorgeschlagen, wobei in zumindest einem Verfahrensschritt (44, 50) zur Herstellung des Verbundmaterials (22) ein Sol-Gel-Prozess durchgeführt wird, bei dem ein Wert einer Porosität des Verbundmaterials (22) zwischen 20% und 45% eingestellt wird.

column12: Motherboard of domestic appliance with a composite material produced through a sol-gel process (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)
column13: Base plate of domestic appliance with a composite material produced through a sol-gel process. The invention relates to a home appliance base plate (20), in particular, to a cooking field base plate, partly or completely composed of a composite material (22) that is partially or completely produced through a sol-gel process, and which has one or more matrix materials (24) and one or more fiber materials (26) bonded with the matrix material (s) (24). In order to achieve a high flexural strength and low thermal conductivity of the composite material (22), it is proposed that the porosity of the composite material (22) present a value between 20% and 45%. Also, a method is proposed for the manufacture of a home appliance base plate (20), in particular, a cooking field base plate, which is partly or completely composed of a composite material (22) having one or various matrix materials (24) and one or more fiber materials (26) bonded to the matrix material (s) (24), where, in one or more steps of the process (44, 50), to produce the composite material (22) a sol-gel process is carried out, in which the porosity value of the composite material (22) is adjusted between 20% and 45%. column12: METHOD OF FORMING POLYCARBONATE
column13: A method of forming polycarbonate includes the steps of introducing a plurality of reaction components to a reactor operating under melt polymerization conditions and removing ester-substituted phenol from the reactor. The plurality of reaction components include a dihydroxy compound, an ester-substituted diaryl carbonate, and a melt transesterification catalyst. The reaction components are introduced in a plurality of reaction component streams. A first reaction component streams includes a melt transesterification catalyst dissolved or suspended in a liquid carrier containing an ester-substituted phenol. The composition of the first reaction component stream is selected such that ester-substituted phenol is not generated as a reaction product in the first reaction component stream.

column12: Mediator-Enzyme System for Controlling Pitch Deposits in Pulp and Paper Production
column13: The invention relates to the use of mediator-enzyme system, which is characterised in that the enzyme comprises a laccase-type enzyme and the mediator comprises a chemical compound which acts as a redox intermediate in the enzymatic oxidation, for the elimination of lipophilic compounds (including, among others, sterols that are free and conjugated in the form of esters and glycosides, triglycerides, fatty alcohols and resin acids) which cause deposits in the product, the machinery and the circuits during the production of pulp and paper (both from hardwood and softwood and non-woody plants). The treatment eliminates up to 100% of the aforementioned lipophilic compounds, depending on the material treated, and, in this way, improves the quality of the pulp obtained, the operation of the industrial installations and the characteristics of the end product.

column12: AUTOMATED PART INSPECTION SYSTEM
column13: A part inspection system includes a vision device configured to image a part being inspected and generate a digital image of the part. The inspection system includes a part inspection module communicatively coupled to the vision device and receiving the digital image of the part. The part inspection module includes an image quality module. The image quality module analyzes the digital image to determine if the digital image achieves a quality threshold. The image quality module generates an image quality output based on the analysis of the digital image. The part inspection module includes an image classifier module. The image classifier module analyzes the digital image to classify the image as a defective part or a non-defective part.

column12: ENHANCER SYSTEM OF THE FLOW PATTERN OF GAS WELLS WITH LIQUID LOAD PROBLEMS
column13: The present invention relates to an enhancer system of flow pattern applied mainly in gas-producing oil wells with liquid load problems, comprising mechanical elements that atomize the liquids accumulated at the bottom of the well facilitating their transport to surface, which is caused by the decrease of frictional pressure drops and weigh of the hydrostatic column. 1. It increases the recovery factor of well hydrocarbons, due to the reduction in the pressure requirement needed to administer the energy of the deposit; 2. It increases the lifting velocity of the produced fluids to a relatively high flow velocity of gas of 4-6 m/s; the gas expansion flows along with the condensed hydrocarbons and water, generating an uniform atomized mixture with lower density, which reduces the pressure gradient flowing in the production piping; 3. It increases the gas production, as the well production is continuous with a steady behavior even during the liquid discharge, it has a remarkable improvement in the flow pattern in the production piping by generating a homogenous dispersion of both phases; 4. It decreases the pressure drops along the production piping, as it is not allowed that the liquid accumulates at the bottom of the well; 5. It preserves the deposit energy due to the increase of the bottom pressure flowing; 6. It maintains the liquid production with a steady behavior caused by a improvement in the flow pattern of fluids along the production piping; and 7. It extends the flowing life of the wells as it preserves the energy in the deposit by reducing the pressure drops along the production piping.

column12: MULTIMEDIA TERMINAL WITH MEASUREMENT OF VITAL PARAMETERS
column13: The invention relates to a multimedia terminal with measurement of vital parameters, such as those primarily used in hospitals, residences, or housing, in order to enable access to communication and television networks and multimedia contents for bed-ridden people, comprising, as well as the elements for multimedia use, a multi-channel measurement module with display of the results of the measurements on the same screen, comprising electronic circuitry and suitable communication means for connection to probes for full electrocardiograms, pulse oximeters, tensiometers, temperature probes, etc. The main advantage of the invention is that it enables vital parameters to be measured, stored and sent using the same multimedia device present in each room, and to insert said vital parameters automatically and simultaneously into the clinical history of the patient, economically and comfortably, avoiding transporting the measurement equipment between the rooms of the patients.

column12: MULTIMEDIA TERMINAL WITH VITAL PARAMETERS MONITORING
column13: Multimedia terminal with vital parameters monitoring, commonly used in hospitals and homes to enable access to communication networks, TV and multimedia contents to bed-ridden persons. A multichannel measurement module showing readings on the same screen, including electronic circuits and connection for probes for electrocardiograms, pulse oximeters, tensiometers, temperature sensors, etc. The main advantage of this invention is that it allows to measure, save and send vital parameters with the same multimedia device in each room, and to input values automatically and simultaneously into patients' medical histories in a cost-effective and comfortable way, without moving equipment between patients' rooms.

column13: The device (12) has a carrier component (20) partially embedded in a plate unit (14) i.e. hob plate. The carrier component includes an opening i.e. elongate hole, in a bent region (30). The plate unit is designed as a composite component and partially formed from a ceramic material or fiber material. A heating device (60) is connected with the plate unit via the carrier component. The plate unit lies on a working plate (64) in a mounted condition, and is sealed by a sealing unit (62). column12: SISTEMA MOVIL AUTONOMO, ESCALABLE, AUTO DESPLEGABLE, MONITORIZABLE Y REPROGRAMABLE DE FORMA REMOTA DE GENERACION DE ENERGIA ELECTRICA
column13: Sistema movil autonomo, escalable, auto desplegable, monitorizable y reprogramable de forma remota, de generacion de energia electrica. omprende un subsistema de produccion de energia electrica de origen renovable, un subsistema de almacenamiento de energia electrica, un subsistema de distribucion de energia electrica, y un subsistema de instrumentacion y control cuyos componentes pueden ser almacenados en uno o dos contenedores susceptibles de ser transportados por medios convencionales de transporte. El subsistema de produccion de energia electrica comprende un generador fotovoltaico, un generador eolico y, opcionalmente, una pila de combustible. El subsistema de almacenamiento de energia contiene baterias y opcionalmente hidrogeno en forma de hidruros metalicos (susceptible de generar energia electrica mediante una pila de combustible). El sistema puede ser desplegado de forma automatica en cualquier parte del mundo mediante un brazo robotica, que actua a modo de grua, y que es programado en origen para el lugar de despliegue.

column13: The method comprises providing a coating on a surface portion (12) of a raw plate (10) with a layer (14) by a physical vapor deposition, and cutting the surface coated plate to a desired size. The layer is applied by a cathodic sputtering. A subregion of the plate, before coating the surface of the plate, is exposed to a volume treatment and/or a surface treatment. A subregion (16) of the layer of the raw plate, before the cutting step, is exposed to the volume treatment and/or the surface treatment. A heat treatment is performed to the subregion of the plate after surface coating. An independent claim is included for a domestic appliance panel.

column12: Multimedia connection terminal
column13: The utility model relates to a multimedia connection terminal, which is used for a hospital, a house or a family to connect a communication network and provide multimedia contents to the people lying in bed in a specialized range; the terminal is equipped with a stable bracket which can be fixed to a wall or a bed by a conventional mechanical part and is used for fixing main electronic circuit equipment and position of the equipment; at least two horizontal connecting rods form a multi-branch connecting arm; the two horizontal connecting rods are connected with each other by a connector and are fixed to the bracket for providing proper circuit interconnection; the terminal is located in a deformable or movable connecting pipe and is connected with a user side; and a full screen capable of displaying images and providing superposed touch screens is configured. The multimedia connection terminal provided by the utility model has the advantages that: the weight of the user side is reduced; most of the weight of the terminal is fixed to the wall; the weight of a supporting rod is decreased; the terminal has higher bearing capacity and is simpler and more convenient to fabricate. The way is simple, convenient and economical; a modularized integrated electronic system in the bracket is convenient for realization of quick repair and maintenance; the supporting and combining processes are portable; the structure of the terminal has a movable section therein; and the terminal appearance tends more to the conventional appearance.

column12: Composition and manufacturing methods for grips
column13: A composition for use in grips is disclosed. The composition may be used, for example, in making a golf club grip. The disclosed grip provides for improved shock absorption and other beneficial properties. In one embodiment the comprises a cross-linked composition of from about 40% by weight to about 80% by weight of one or a combination of a first material selected from the group consisting of butyl rubber, nitrile rubber, ethylene propylene rubber and chloroprene rubber, and from about 10% by weight to about 50% by weight of one or a combination of a second material selected from the group consisting of ethylene-propylene-diene copolymer (EPDM), polyurethane, ethylene-vinyl acetate copolymer, polypropylene and cork.

column12: Assembly and method for monitoring a set of household appliances
column13: The invention refers to an assembly for monitoring a set of household appliances (1, 3, 5, 7) each of which comprises a control unit (9) which can detect operational and/or product parameters (S 1  to S 14 ) of the household appliances (1, 3, 5, 7). According to the invention, the household appliances (1, 3, 5, 7) are linked to a central monitoring unit (19) which generates a user profile (21) on the base of said operational and/or product parameters (S 1  to S 14 ) detected by the control units (9) of the household appliances (1, 3, 5, 7). In said user profile (21) said parameters (S 1  to S 14 ) are stored depending on the time (t). Therefore, on the base of said user profile (21) the handling of the household appliances (1, 3, 5, 7) by the user can be simplified.

column12: COMPOSITION OF AN ELECTRIC CONDUCTIVE PASTE THAT CAN BE CO-SINTERED AT HIGH TEMPERATURES AND THE INTEGRATION THEREOF INTO CERAMIC MATERIALS BASED ON PORCELAIN, STONEWARE, PORCELAIN STONEWARE OR THE LIKE
column13: The invention relates to a composition comprising between 70 and 0 wt. % of Pt, between 20 and 5 wt. % of C, and between 10 and 95 wt. % of WO 3 or WC in relation to the total weight of solids of the composition and an organic or aqueous-based vehicle, where said composition can be synthesised at a temperature higher than 1000°C, in particular higher than 1200°C. The invention also relates to a method for integrating said composition into a ceramic material based on porcelain, stoneware, porcelain stoneware and/or similar ceramics. The invention further relates to the capacitive sensor obtained with said composition on a strip made of a ceramic composition, and to the ceramic material comprising said composition or said sensor.

column12: COMPOSITION OF AN ELECTRIC CONDUCTIVE PASTE THAT CAN BE CO-SINTERED AT HIGH TEMPERATURES AND THE INTEGRATION THEREOF INTO CERAMIC MATERIALS BASED ON PORCELAIN, STONEWARE, PORCELAIN STONEWARE OR THE LIKE
column13: It comprises between 70 and 0 wt% of Pt, between 20 and 5 wt% of C, and between 10 and 95 wt% of WO 3  or WC in relation to the total weight of solids of the composition and an organic or aqueous-based vehicle, where said composition can be sintered at a temperature higher than 1000°C, in particular higher than 1200°C. The invention also relates to a process for integrating said composition into a ceramic material based on porcelain, stoneware, porcelain stoneware and/or similar ceramics. column12: Method of forming polycarbonate
column13: A method of forming polycarbonate includes the steps of introducing a plurality of reaction components to a reactor operating under melt polymerization conditions and removing ester-substituted phenol from the reactor. The plurality of reaction components include a dihydroxy compound, an ester-substituted diaryl carbonate, and a melt transesterification catalyst. The reaction components are introduced in a plurality of reaction component streams. A first reaction component streams includes a melt transesterification catalyst dissolved or suspended in a liquid carrier containing an ester-substituted phenol. The composition of the first reaction component stream is selected such that ester-substituted phenol is not generated as a reaction product in the first reaction component stream.

Um ein Hausgeräteelement mit einer vorteilhaft erweiterten Funktionalität bereitzustellen, wird vorgeschlagen, dass in einem Verfahrensschritt wenigstens eine optische Markierung (14a; 14b) eingebracht wird, welche wenigstens teilweise zumindest im Wesentlichen lediglich unter einer Sonderbedingung sichtbar ist.

column12: Method for manufacturing a domestic appliance and domestic appliance
column13: Die Erfindung geht aus von einem Verfahren zu einer Herstellung einer Hausgerätevorrichtung (10a; 10b), insbesondere einer Kochfeldvorrichtung (12a; 12b), mit zumindest einem Bauelement (14a; 14b), bei welchem in zumindest einem Verfahrensschritt das Bauelement (14a; 14b) aus einem Rohelement (16a; 16b) durch Aufschäumen wenigstens eines Bereichs (18a; 18b) hergestellt wird. Um eine gattungsgemäße Hausgerätevorrichtung mit wenigstens einer vorteilhaft flexibel einstellbaren physikalischen Eigenschaft bereitzustellen, wird vorgeschlagen, dass zumindest ein durch das Aufschäumen erzeugter Hohlraum im wenigstens einen Bereich (18a; 18b) während des Aufschäumens zumindest teilweise durch wenigstens einen Feststoff aufgefüllt wird.

column12: Plate i.e. hot plate, for e.g. induction hob, has line-like isolation regions intersecting at point and limiting mutually-insulated sections perpendicular to surface of base plate that is formed from glass or glass ceramic
column13: The plate i.e. hot plate (10a), has a layer i.e. metallic layer, arranged on a surface of a base plate (12a), and comprising mutually-insulated sections. The base plate is partially-transparently formed from glass or glass ceramic. Line-like isolation regions limit the mutually-insulated sections perpendicular to the surface of the base plate, and intersect at a point. The base plate comprises sensor regions (34a, 36a) overlapping with the mutually-insulated sections. The isolation regions exhibit different longitudinal extensions viewed vertical to the base plate surface. An independent claim is also included for a method for manufacturing a domestic appliance plate.

column12: Refrigerator and method for operating a refrigerator
column13: The invention refers to a refrigerator including a refrigerator control (11, 32) which comprises at least one sensor (8, 14, 16) for detecting at least one operational parameter, e.g. cooling compartment temperature (T C ), and at least one sensor (27) for detecting at least one product parameter (P) of products (A, B) introduced into said refrigerator. According to the invention said refrigerator control (11, 32) comprises an analyzing unit (33) by which the refrigeration power of said refrigerator can be configured on the basis of a combination of said product and operational parameters (P, T C , T A , S D ). The analyzing unit is also able to inform the user about noticeable events such as oversights, relevant product information, refrigerator malfunctioning, relevant changes in product stock and relevant changes in user behavior.

column12: MECHATRONIC DEVICE ADJUSTED TO THE FACE OF A PERSON FOR CONTROLLING THE FUNCTIONS OF A PC MOUSE.
column13: The present invention is a mechatronic device adjusted to the face of a person for controlling the functions of a PC mouse, which is intended to provide a tool that will allow a user to be integrated or reintegrated to his social, educative and/or work life by means of a PC special for people with some kind of motive impairment; the inventive device uses face movements monitored by a plurality of opto-electronic and mechanic sensors strategically located in the device for controlling the pointer of the PC, the operation of the device being base on the movement of the left and right cheeks, the upper lip and the chin, which displaces the pointer of the computer in the direction of the face movement previously carried out; the invention is a novel, affordable and highly effective device, since it is formed by materials that provide the same with durability, flexibility, a reduced production and operation cost, and moreover provides characteristics of easy handle, transport and cleaning.

column12: DOWNHOLE DEVICE FOR HYDROCARBON PRODUCING WELLS WITHOUT CONVENTIONAL TUBING
column13: The present invention relates to a device for the bottom of hydrocarbon-producing lacking conventional production tubing ("tubingless" completion) that improves the productivity (improves hydrocarbon (gas, oil and condensates) production), selectively controls the return solids (sand for the formation and propping of hydraulic fractures) and eliminates liquid runoff, and a method for producing same, which is designed to meet the specifications of the well to be treated, by compiling and analysing the operating conditions of the well.

column12: PROCESS FOR PRODUCING THE ENZYME D-AMINOACIDO OXYDASE OF RHODOTORULA GRACILIS IN HOST CELLS
column13: Process for producing the enzyme D-aminoacido oxydase of Rhodotorula gracilis in host cells. The process for the expression of the enzyme comprises isolating the complementary DNA corresponding to the messager RNA of the gene which codes for the D-aminoacido oxydase of any strain of Rhodotorula gracilis producing said enzyme; fusing the fragment of DNA which codes for D-aminoacido oxydase of Rhodotorula gracilis with a DNA sequence which contains a site of union to the ribosome and a high efficiency promoter sequence for the expression of genes in host cells; inserting the DNA fragment into a plasmid appropriate for the host cell; cultivating the host cells transformed with said plasmid; and collecting the enzyme.

column12: PROCESS FOR PRODUCING THE ENZYME D-AMINOACIDO OXYDASE OF -i(RHODOTORULA GRACILIS) IN HOST CELLS
column13: Process for producing the enzyme D-amino acid oxydase of  Rhodotorula gracilis  in host cells. The process for the expression of the enzyme comprises isolating the complementary DNA corresponding to the messager RNA of the gene which codes for the D-amino acid oxydase of any strain of  Rhodotorula gracillis  producing said enzyme; fusing the fragment of DNA which codes for D-amino acid oxydase of  Rhodotorula gracillis  with a DNA sequence which contains a site of union to the ribosome and a high efficiency promoter sequence for the express of genes in host cells; inserting the DNA fragment into a plasmid appropriate for the host cell; cultivating the host cells transformed with said plasmid; and collecting the enzyme.

column12: REGOLITH-EXCAVATING ROBOT.
column13: A device for collecting, transporting and discharging a material sample from the surface by means of a mobile excavating modular system is disclosed. The subject matter of the invention relates to a mechatronic system formed by mechanical, electronic and computing means, with a differential four-wheel mobile base and a special traction drive for regolith-type surfaces, an excavation system with adjustable positions, and a chain arrangement with buckets for conveying the material from the surface into a container and a storage and discharge system by a conveyor belt with blades for distributing the material and driving the same to be deposited into a container. The system is wirelessly controlled by the transmission and reception of video and data through an access point and a remote station to the operation site using a method comprising algorithms implemented in a computer and a controller so that the operator can view the parameters in the control station and, in the event of a loss of communication, the system continues operating in an assisted manner based on the knowledge generated by the user. The power system is recharged by means of a solar cell arrangement, said electric power being stored in batteries. Therefore, the system is able to deposit the material of the surface in a container for remotely performing a search in a remote or hazardous location to humans.

column12: DOWNHOLE SHUT-IN DEVICE FOR PRESSURE VARIATION TESTING IN GAS LIFT WELLS.
column13: The device is based on the principle of downhole shut-in of oil producing wells that do not flow to surface self-powered but require the injection of gas to lighten the fluid column and thus enable the well to produce. This downhole shut-in device comprises a check valve, an anchoring system, a seal system; an untethering system, a shock absorber and a sleeve for the protection of pressure and temperature memory probes. The objective of the downhole shut-in device is to obtain characteristic information of the fluid-rock system from variations in the pressures recorded in order to obtain the dynamic characterization of the reservoir.

column12: NON-PERMANENT BASE SYSTEM FOR CONTROLLING THE HYDROCARBON PRODUCTION.
column13: The present invention is related to a non-permanent base system for controlling the hydrocarbon production, which is constituted by mechanical elements useful for controlling the flow and drops of pressure in the production pipe, also includes an anchor and hermeticity system that may be installed in smooth pipes or with couplers. The non-permanent base system for controlling the hydrocarbon production increases the hydrocarbon recovery factor in wells. The system may also cause the release and expansion of gas dissolved in the oil, thereby increasing the raising speed in the oil column; the expansion of the free gas that flows along with the oil generates a more uniform gas-oil mixture with a reduced density, which promotes the reduction of the gradient pressure in the production pipe, thus reaching such a dragging speed that no liquid is accumulated in the base of the well (avoiding the slid of the liquid), consequently the pressure energy for displacing a liquid from the base of th e well to the required surface will be lower using the installed system, also reducing the water production, and avoiding the lines freezing regarding gas producing wells.

column12: HOUSEHOLD APPLIANCE PLATE WITH IMPEDANCE-INCREASING INSULATING REGIONS
column13: The invention relates to a household appliance plate with a base plate (10a-g) and at least one at least partially electrically conductive layer system (12a-g) which is arranged on at least one lateral subregion (14a-g) of the base plate (10a-g) and comprises at least one first region (16a-g) and at least one second region (18a-g) adjoining the first region (16a-g). According to the invention, in order to provide a household appliance plate of the type in question that combines advantageous properties in terms of electromagnetic compatibility and flexible design possibilities, the first region (16a-g) and the second region (18a-g) are electrically conductively connected and the layer system (12a-g) comprises one or more insulating regions (20a-g, 21 a-g) that at least substantially increase an impedance between the first region (16a-g) and the second region (18a-g).

column12: SISTEMA ESTEREOTÁXICO DE USO MÚLTIPLE PARA NEUROCIRUGÍA
column13: Sistema estereotáxico basado en el principio arco centrado, compuesto por el marco, sistema de fijación al cráneo del paciente, arco de puntería y porta-accesorios. El marco rectangular se coloca rodeando la cabeza del paciente y su sistema de fijación está compuesto por cuatro torres que portan los tornillos con las puntas de fijación al cráneo. El mecanismo de las torres permite su desplazamiento longitudinal y giro lateral, lográndose gran versatilidad en la fijación del marco al cráneo, lo cual permite el abordaje de cualquier zona del encéfalo con comodidad y sin interferencia de otros aditamentos que habitualmente se colocan en el marco. También este mecanismo permite evadir la fijación en zonas no deseadas. El arco de puntería posee un radio interior de 180 mm y está montado en una base circular goniométrica que permite su rotación en un ángulo de hasta 300 grados. A su vez dos guías lineales unidas en forma de escuadra permiten el desplazamiento del arco con su base por dos ejes mutuamente perpendiculares. El porta-accesorios se desplaza a lo largo del arco de puntería describiendo un ángulo desde 20 grados hasta 120 grados. Posee dos aditamentos ajustables que se desplazan en la dirección del blanco, y que conducen los accesorios quirúrgicos, tales como cánulas; endoscopios; retractores o espátulas y guía láser hacia el interior del cráneo del paciente. Las características de este sistema estereotáxico garantizan al neurocirugano exactitud y precisión en la localización del blanco con una gran versatilidad.

column12: Domestic appliance
column13: Die Erfindung geht aus von einer Kochfeldvorrichtung (12), insbesondere einer Induktionskochfeldvorrichtrung, mit zumindest einer Glaseinheit (14) und zumindest einer als Vielschichtstruktur ausgebildeten Beschichtung (16), die auf zumindest einem Teilbereich zumindest einer Hauptfläche der Glaseinheit (14) angeordnet ist und die zumindest zwei Schichten (20, 21, 22, 23, 24) aufweist. Um eine möglichst gute Kompatibilität mit den Sensoren der Benutzerschnittstelle zu erreichen, ohne dass ein Prozess nach der Deposition benötigt ist, wird vorgeschlagen, dass zumindest eine der Schichten (21, 23) von zumindest einem halbleitenden Material gebildet ist, um die Funktion als absorbierende Schicht zu erfüllen.

column12: HOUSEHOLD APPLIANCE APPARATUS
column13: A cooktop apparatus, in particular an induction cooktop apparatus, includes at least one glass unit and at least one coating configured as a multilayer structure, which is disposed on at least one subregion of at least a main face of the glass unit and has at least two layers. In order to achieve optimum compatibility with the sensors of the user interface without requiring a process after deposition, at least one of the layers is formed by at least one semiconducting material, to fulfill the function of an absorbing layer.

column12: Domestic appliance
column13: The apparatus (12) has a coating (16) configured as a multilayer structure and coated on a subregion of a main face of a glass unit (14), where the coating comprises two layers, one of the layers is formed by semiconducting material and the other layer is formed by semiconducting material or insulating material. The glass unit is designed as a cooktop plate unit. The coating is configured to produce metallic appearance. An electronic unit (60) measures and evaluates electrical characteristics of the former layer formed by semiconducting material, and detects a safety parameter. The subregion is formed as cohesive face and a closed line. The main face is formed as a continuous kink-free face.

column12: MAGNETIC NANOCOMPOSITES, ITS PROCESS OF SYNTHESIS THEREOF AND PROCESS OF RECOVERY OF OIL WATER BODIES USING SAID NANOCOMPOSITE.
column13: The present invention relates to a magnetic nanocomposite, a method for the synthesis of said nanocomposite and a method for cleaning bodies of water contaminated with crude oil or oils spilled therein by a magnetic nanocomposite. It discloses a nanocomposite synthesis process by a precipitation method or process that is completely different from traditional methods for obtaining this type of nanocomposites. The invention also relates to the use of said nanocomposite to clean transformers and to adsorb different dyes, the production of the nanocomposite being more economical than currently known.

column12: Assembly and method for monitoring at least one household appliance
column13: The invention refers to an assembly for monitoring at least one household appliance which comprises a control unit (11) which detects at least one product parameter (S 1  to S 6 ) with respect to goods (A, B), e.g. food or laundry, inserted into said household appliance, and/or an operational parameter (S 7 , S 8 ) of said household appliance. Said control unit (11) is linked with a monitoring unit (23) which generates a user profile (25) on the base of the detected parameter (S 1  to S 8 ). In said user profile (25) said parameter (S 1  to S 8 ) is stored depending on the time (t), wherein a deviation of user activities relating to said household appliance from said user profile (25) is detectable by said monitoring unit (23).

column12: Cooking field device (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)
column13: The invention relates to a cooking field device (10-c) with at least one cooking field plate (12a-c), which is provided to support at least one cooking battery in at least one cooking area. Support (14a-c) to be heated. In order to provide a generic cooking field device with better properties in relation to a durable embodiment, it is proposed that the cooking field device (10a-c) has at least one temperature compensation unit (16a- c), which is provided to considerably reduce at least the temperature gradient of the cooking field plate (12a-c) between the support area (14a-c) and at least the surrounding area (18a-c) at support area (14a-c). (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)

column12: PORTABLE DEVICE AND PROCEDURE FOR TAKING WASTEWATER SAMPLES (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)
column13: Portable device and procedure for taking wastewater samples that extracts and filters wastewater collected directly from urban sanitation collectors automatically, using hydraulic equipment and a filter cartridge that recirculates the water collected by a wastewater tank until obtaining a volume of water with a determined concentration to subsequently carry out the viral analysis of the filtered wastewater sample using the qRT-PCR assay. (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)

column12: HOTPLATE DEVICE
column13: Die Erfindung geht aus von einer Kochfeldvorrichtung (10a-c) mit zumindest einer Kochfeldplatte (12a-c), welche zu einem Aufstellen wenigstens eines Gargeschirrs in zumindest einem Aufstellbereich (14a-c) zu einer Beheizung vorgesehen ist. Um eine gattungsgemäße Vorrichtung mit verbesserten Eigenschaften hinsichtlich einer langlebigen Ausgestaltung bereitzustellen, wird vorgeschlagen, dass die Kochfeldvorrichtung (10a-c) zumindest eine Temperaturausgleichseinheit (16a-c) aufweist, die dazu vorgesehen ist, zumindest einen Temperaturgradienten der Kochfeldplatte (12a-c) zwischen dem Aufstellbereich (14a-c) und zumindest einem den Aufstellbereich (14a-c) umgebenden Bereich (18a-c) wesentlich zu reduzieren.
